[03]^b^66^eb^^b^.^eb^ Khaṇapabhaṅgutāya ^a^V2.0037^ea^^a^M2.0251^ea^ na niccā na dhuvāti ^b^aniccā^eb^. Tato eva paṇḍitehi na iccā na upagantabbātipi ^b^aniccā^eb^. So cāyaṃ aniccattho udayavayaparicchinnatāya veditabboti dassento, ^b^‘‘hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā’’^eb^ti āha; uppajjitvā vinassanatoti attho. Ayañca aniccatā vakkhamānā ca tucchāditā dvinnampi kāmānaṃ sādhāraṇoti āha – ^b^‘‘vatthukāmāpi kilesakāmāpī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rittā^eb^ vivittā, tesaṃ niccasārādīnaṃ attani abhāvato tehi visuṃbhūtā. Yathā pana sabbaso sabhāvarahitamākāsaṃ ‘‘tucchaṃ ritta’’nti vuccati, na evamete. Ete pana kevalaṃ niccasārādivirahato eva tucchā rittāti dassento ^b^‘‘na panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ‘‘Na hi tucchamuṭṭhi nāma natthī’’ti idaṃ lokasamaññāvasena vuttaṃ, lokasamaññā lokiyakathā na laṅghitabbā.

[03]Musāti ittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya na dissatīti āha ^b^‘‘musāti nāsanakā’’^eb^ti. Visaṃvādanaṭṭhena vā ^b^musā^eb^. Ete hi asubhādisabhāvāpi bālānaṃ subhādibhāvena upaṭṭhahantā subhādiggahaṇassa paccakkhabhāvena satte visaṃvādenti. ^b^Nassanasabhāvā^eb^ti khaṇabhaṅgattā ittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya dissamānā viyapi hutvā apaññāyanakapakatikā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khettaṃ viyā’’^eb^tiādi. Dhammasaddo cettha ‘‘jātidhammāna’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.398) viya pakatipariyāyo, tathā sabhāvasaddo cāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Mosadhammā^eb^ti mosanapakatikā, kusalabhaṇḍaharaṇasabhāvāti attho. ^b^Māyākata^eb^nti māyāya kataṃ udakādimaṇiādiākārena māyādinā upaṭṭhāpitaṃ; māyākataṃ viya māyākataṃ aññasabhāvā hutvā atathā upaṭṭhahanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi. Cakkhupathe eva katavijjāya, na tato paranti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘dassanūpacāre ṭhitasseva tathā paññāyatī’’^eb^ti. Tayidaṃ sambaravijjāvasena vuttaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ tāvakālikabhāvena kāmānaṃ māyākatabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni tato aññenapi pakārena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Aniccādisabhāvānaṃ kāmānaṃ niccādisabhāvadassanaṃ vipallāsasahagatatāya veditabbaṃ. ^b^Bālānaṃ lāpanato^eb^ti apariññātavatthukānaṃ andhabālānaṃ puggalānaṃ vipallāsahetuto. Manussaloke ṭhatvā ^a^M2.0252^ea^ manussānaṃ vā vasena bhagavatā bhāsitattā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammikā kāmāti mānusakā pañca kāmaguṇā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0038^ea^. Tato eva ca ^b^‘‘samparāyikāti te ṭhapetvā avasesā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhadhammā paccakkhasabhāvā ārammaṇabhūtā etāsaṃ atthīti ^b^diṭṭhadhammikā^eb^. Samparāyike kāme ārabbha uppannasaññā ^b^samparāyikā^eb^. Te samecca dhīyati ettha āṇāti dheyyaṃ, āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ. Mārassa dheyyanti ^b^māradheyyaṃ^eb^ tassa issariyapavattanattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yehī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Gahita^eb^nti visayavisayībhāvena gahitaṃ, ārammaṇavasena ārammaṇakaraṇavasena ca gahitanti attho. Tattha ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gahaṇaṃ nāma ‘‘idaṃ mayha’’nti avibhāgena pariggahakaraṇaṃ; ārammaṇavasena pana gahaṇaṃ bhāgaso ārammaṇānubhavananti vadanti. Ubhayassapi pana taṇhārāgavasena gahaṇaṃ sandhāya, ^b^‘‘ubhayametaṃ gahita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Māro^eb^ti kilesamāro. Yadaggena kilesamāro, tadaggena devaputtamāropi te attano vasaṃ vatteti. ^b^Taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti dhammamukhena puggalaggahaṇaṃ sandhāya.

[03]Appahīnavipallāsā hi puggalā kāmādhimuttā mārassa issariyavattanaṭṭhānatāya ‘‘māradheyya’’nti vuttā, tathā mārassa nivāpagocarapariyāyehipi te evaṃ vuttāti dassento, ^b^‘‘yathā coḷassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nivapatīti nivāpo, so eva bījanti ^b^nivāpabījaṃ. Te^eb^ti kāmaguṇā. ^b^Yatthā^eb^ti yasmiṃ padese.

[03]Manasi bhavāti ^b^mānasā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘cittasambhūtā’’^eb^ti. Te pana avijjādayo pāḷiyaṃ āgatā. Evañhi lohitasannissayo pubbo viya anurodhūpanissayo virodhoti dassento, ^b^‘‘mamāyite vatthusmi’’^eb^ntiādimāha. ^b^Tedhā^eb^ti ettha ^b^idhā^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ ‘‘idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assa’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.30) viya. ^b^Kāmaloka^eb^nti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ saṅkhāralokaṃ, yattha vā loke kāmaguṇavantaṃ lokaṃ. ^b^Cittena adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti jhānārammaṇaṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ bhāvanācittena uppādetvā. ^b^Parittaṃ nāma^eb^ vikkhambhanāsamatthattā kilesehi parito khaṇḍitaṃ viya hoti. ^b^Tassa paṭikkhepenā^eb^ti parittabhāvapaṭikkhepena. ^b^Pamāṇantipi kāmāvacarameva^eb^^a^M2.0253^ea^ pāpakānaṃ pamāṇakaraṇadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena appajahanato. Tappaṭikkhepavasena ^b^appamāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma mahaggatanti āha – ^b^‘‘rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacara’’^eb^nti. Samucchedavasena kilesānaṃ appahānena mahaggatajjhānampi subhāvitaṃ nāma na hoti, pageva parittajjhānanti āha – ^b^‘‘subhāvitanti…pe… lokuttarassevetaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. ^b^Etassa vasenā^eb^ti ‘‘subhāvita’’nti padassa vasena.

[03]^b^Tameva paṭipada^eb^nti tameva abhijjhādipahānāvahaṃ jhānapaṭipadaṃ. Arahatte tassa upāyabhūtāya ^a^V2.0039^ea^ vipassanāya vā catutthajjhāne tassa upāyabhūte upacāre vā sati cittaṃ pasannameva hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘arahattaṃ vā…pe… upacāraṃ vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Adhimokkhasampasādo^eb^ti ‘‘ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī’’ti vā vipassanāya vīthipaṭipannattā; ‘‘ajjeva catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattessāmī’’ti vā upacārasamādhinā cittassa samāhitattā adhimuccanabhūto sampasādo. ^b^Paṭilābhasampasādo^eb^ti arahattassa catutthajjhānassa vā adhigamasaṅkhāto sampasādo. Paṭilābhopi hi kilesakālusiyābhibhavanato cittassa suppasannabhāvāvahattā ‘‘sampasādo’’ti vutto. ^b^Paccayā^eb^ti nāmarūpapaccayā avijjādayo. ^b^Sabbathā^eb^ti samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato nissaraṇatoti sabbappakārena. ^b^Āsā^eb^ti adhimuccanavasena āsīsanā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘āsā santiṭṭhati, adhimokkhaṃ paṭilabhatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pādaka^eb^nti padaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Kilesā sannisīdantī^eb^ti nīvaraṇasahagatā eva kilesā vikkhambhanavasena vūpasamanti. ^b^Satī^eb^ti upacārajjhānāvahā sati ^b^santiṭṭhati. Saṅkhāragata^eb^nti bhāvanāya samatāya pavattamānattā, ime dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādayo ekarasā hutvā pavattantīti, bhāvanācittuppādapariyāpannaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ ^b^vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti. Cittuppādo^eb^ti bhāvanācittuppādo. ^b^Lepapiṇḍe^eb^ti silesapiṇḍe ^b^laggamāno viya^eb^ appito viya hoti. ^b^Upacārena samādhiyati^eb^ upacārajjhānena samādhiyati. ^b^Aya^eb^nti ayaṃ duvidhopi adhimuccanākāro adhimokkhasampasādo nāma. ^b^Tasmiṃ sampasāde satī^eb^ti etasmiṃ vipassanālakkhaṇe, upacārajjhāne vā adhimokkhasampasāde sati. ^b^Yo pana arahattaṃ vā paṭilabhati catutthajjhānaṃ vā, tassa cittaṃ vippasannaṃ hotiyeva,^eb^ ayaṃ nippariyāyato ^b^paṭilābhasampasādo,^eb^ evaṃ santepi idhāmippetameva dassetuṃ ^a^M2.0254^ea^, ^b^‘‘idha panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Vipassanā hī^eb^tiādi vuttassa samatthanaṃ. Tattha ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti arahattapaññāya. ^b^Adhimuccanassā^eb^ti saddahanaṃ ussukkāpajjanassa. ^b^Upacāra^eb^nti upacārajjhānaṃ. Āneñjasamāpattiyā adhimuccanassa kāraṇanti yojanā.

[03]^b^Etarahi vā^eb^ti idānimeva. ^b^Āneñjaṃ vā^eb^ti catutthajjhānaṃ vā. ^b^Samāpajjatī^eb^ti adhigacchati. ^b^Idaṃ hī^eb^tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarati. Arahattasacchikiriyā nāma aggamaggabhāvanāya sati atthato āpannā hoti, aggamaggapaññā eva tadatthaṃ adhimuccitabbāti dassento, ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^ti vikappantaramāha. Tattha yathā nāma pāsādassa atthāya samānītadabbasambhārāvayave appahonte kūṭāgāraṃ kātuṃ na pahontiyeva, evaṃsampadamidanti dassento, ^b^‘‘taṃ anabhisambhuṇanto āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Catusaccaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0040^ea^^b^vā sacchikaroti^eb^ heṭṭhimamaggādhigamanavasena āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjati ubhayassapi hetupariggahitattā.

[03]^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ ‘‘paññāya vā adhimuccati, āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatī’’ti yathāvutte visesādhigame ayaṃ idāni vuccamāno yojanānayo. ^b^Evaṃ hotī^eb^ti idāni vuccamānākārena cittābhinīhāro hoti. ^b^Kicca^eb^nti pabbajitakiccaṃ. ^b^Tato^eb^ti arahattādhigamanato. ^b^Osakkitamānaso^eb^ti saṃkucitacitto. ^b^Antarā na tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti asamāhitabhūmiyaṃ na tiṭṭhati. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho – yathā tassa purisassa vanamahiṃsaṃ gahetuṃ ussāhavato osakkantassa sasagodhādiggahaṇe vattabbameva natthi, evaṃ imassapi bhikkhuno arahattaṃ gahetuṃ ussāhavato tato osakkitvā catutthajjhānasamāpajjane vattabbameva natthīti. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ upamaṃ upamāsaṃsandanañca maggabhāvanāyojanāyaṃ catusaccasacchikiriyāyojanāyañca atidisati.

[03]Hetuatthajotano ^b^ya^eb^nti nipāto, karaṇe vā etaṃ paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. Tassa saṃvattanaṃ arahati, taṃ vā payojanaṃ etassāti ^b^taṃsaṃvattanikaṃ. Viññāṇa^eb^nti vipākaviññāṇaṃ. Āneñjasabhāvaṃ upagacchatīti ^b^āneñjūpagaṃ^eb^. Yathā kusalaṃ āneñjasabhāvaṃ, evaṃ taṃ vipākaviññāṇampi āneñjasabhāvaṃ upagataṃ assa bhaveyya. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘kādisameva bhaveyyāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino. ^b^Kusalaviññāṇa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0255^ea^ vipākaviññāṇampi taṃ kusalaṃ viya vadanti. ^b^Tannāmakamevā^eb^ti kusalaṃ viya āneñjanāmakameva siyā. Ettha ca purimavikappe ‘‘āneñjūpaga’’nti taṃsadisatā vuttā, dutiyavikappe tato eva taṃsamaññatā. ^b^So panāyamattho^eb^ti āneñjasadisatāya vipākakālepi taṃnāmakameva assāti yathāvutto attho. ^b^Iminā nayenā^eb^ti iminā vuttanayena. Ettha hi āneñjābhisaṅkhārahetuvipākaviññāṇaṃ ‘‘āneñjūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa’’nti vuttattā taṃnāmakameva katvā dīpitaṃ. ^b^Arahattassāpī^eb^ti ^b^api^eb^saddena aggamaggabhāvanāyapi heṭṭhimamaggabhāvanāyapīti attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Samādhivasena osakkanā kathitā^eb^ti ‘‘vipulena mahaggatena cetasā vihareyya’’nti samathanayaṃ dassetvā desanā kathitā.

[03]^b^67^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayañhi bhikkhū^eb^ti yaṃ uddissa ayaṃ dutiyāneñjasappāyadesanāya bhikkhu vutto. ^b^Paññavantataro^eb^ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘dvinnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhimassa hi ‘‘ye ca diṭṭhadhammikā kāmā’’tiādinā rūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbāneva rūpamukhena vipassanābhiniveso ^a^V2.0041^ea^ kato, imassa pana ‘‘yaṃ kiñci rūpa’’ntiādinā sakalarūpadhammavasena. Bhagavā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento kammaṭṭhānikassa bhikkhuno kāraṇabalānurūpameva paṭhamaṃ bhāvanābhinivesaṃ dasseti; so pacchā ñāṇe vipulaṃ gacchante anavasesato dhammaṃ pariggaṇhāti. ^b^Rūpapaṭibāhanenā^eb^ti rūpavirāgabhāvanāya sabbaso samatikkamena. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu tatiyāneñjādīsu.

[03]^b^Paññavantataro^eb^ti paññuttaro. ^b^Tiṇṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā^eb^ti kāmaguṇā sabbarūpadhammā kāmasaññāti evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ kammaṭṭhānavasena tidhā vutte sammasanūpagadhamme ekato katvā, ‘‘sabbametaṃ anicca’’nti ekajjhaṃ gahetvā, sammasati yathā – ‘‘yaṃ kiñci samudayadhammaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma’’nti (dī. ni. 1.298; saṃ. ni. 5.1081; mahāva. 16; cūḷani. ajitamāṇavapucchāniddesa 4, 7, 8; tissametteyyamāṇavapucchāniddesa 10, 11; paṭi. ma. 2.30). Tenāha – ^b^‘‘ubhayametaṃ anicca’’^eb^ntiādi. Kāmarūpasaññāvasena diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikabhedato aṭṭha ekekakoṭṭhāsāti evaṃ kataṃ ubhayanti vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘diṭṭhadhammika…pe… vasena saṅkhipitvā ubhayanti vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Taṇhādiṭṭhivasenā^eb^ti taṇhābhinandanāvasena ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’ti, diṭṭhābhinandanāvasena ^a^M2.0256^ea^ ‘‘eso me attā’’ti evaṃ ^b^abhinandituṃ. Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena ‘‘etaṃ mama, eso me attā’’ti abhinandituṃ ajjhosāya gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā ṭhātunti imamatthaṃ atidisati. ^b^Kāmapaṭibāhanenā^eb^ti idaṃ āgamanapaṭipadādassanatthaṃ, vaṇṇabhaṇanatthañca vuttaṃ. ^b^Rūpapaṭibāhanaṃ^eb^ hissa āsannaṃ, tatopi ākāsānañcāyatanasamatikkamo, taṃsamatikkamena saheva sabbe tā ^b^vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā^eb^ ‘‘ubhayametaṃ anicca’’ntiādivacanato.

[03]^b^68^eb^^b^.^eb^ Idha ^b^attano cā^eb^ti ākiñcaññāyatanakammaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Nirujjhanti^eb^ tappaṭibaddhachandarāganirodhena, samāpajjanakkhaṇe pana anuppādanenapi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atappakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti uḷāratarabhāvena jhānasamāpattiyā atittikarabhāvena. ^b^Tameva paṭipada^eb^nti ākiñcaññāyatanabhāvanamāha. ^b^Samādhivasena osakkanā kathitā^eb^ tatiyāruppakammaṭṭhānassa vuttattā ‘‘yatthetā’’tiādinā.

[03]Idha ^b^attano^eb^ti dvikoṭikasuññatāmanasikārasaṅkhātaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipada^eb^nti anantaraṃ vuttāakiñcaññāyatanakammaṭṭhānaṃ. Sati samathabhāvanāyaṃ suññatāmanasikārassa ^a^V2.0042^ea^ idha sātisayattā vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Dutiyākiñcaññāyatane vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^70^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyākiñcaññāyatane ^b^attano^eb^ti catukoṭikasuññatāmanasikārasaṅkhātaṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ suññatānupassanādhikāre. ^b^Kvacī^eb^ti katthaci ṭhāne, kāle, dhamme vā. Atha vā ^b^kvacī^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ, bahiddhā vā. ^b^Attano attāna^eb^nti sakattānaṃ. ‘‘Ayaṃ kho, bho brahmā…pe… vasī pitā bhūtabhabyāna’’ntiādinā (dī. ni. 1.42) paraparikappitaṃ attānañca kassaci kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento ^b^‘‘kassacī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^parassā^eb^ti ‘‘parā pajā’’ti ‘‘paro puriso’’ti ca evaṃ gahitassa. ^b^Na ca mama kvacanī^eb^ti ettha ^b^mama^eb^-saddo aṭṭhānapayuttoti āha ^b^‘‘mamasaddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parassa cā^eb^ti attato aññassa, ‘‘paro puriso nāma atthi mamatthāya sajito, tassa vasena mayhaṃ sabbaṃ ^a^M2.0257^ea^ ijjhatī’’ti evaṃ ekaccadiṭṭhigatikaparikappitavasena paraṃ attānaṃ, tañca attano kiñcanabhūtaṃ na passatīti dassento, ^b^‘‘na ca kvacanī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ettha ca ^b^nāhaṃ kvacanī^eb^ti sakāttano abhāvaṃ passati. ^b^Na kassaci kiñcanatasmi^eb^nti sakāttano eva kassaci anattaniyataṃ passati. ^b^Na ca, mamā^eb^ti etaṃ dvayaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sambandhitabbaṃ, ^b^atthī^eb^ti paccekaṃ. ‘‘Na ca kvacani parassa attā atthī’’ti parassa attano abhāvaṃ passati, ‘‘tassa parassa attano mama kismiñci kiñcanatā na catthī’’ti parassa attano anattaniyataṃ passati. Evaṃ ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ca khandhānaṃ attattaniyasuññatā suddhasaṅkhārapuñjatā catukoṭikasuññatāpariggaṇhanena diṭṭhā hoti. ^b^Heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipada^eb^nti idhāpi ākiñcaññāyatanakammaṭṭhānameva vadati. ^b^Vipassanāvaseneva osakkanā kathitā^eb^ catukoṭikasuññatādassanavisesabhāvato, tappadhānattā cassa manasikārassa.

[03]Idha ^b^attano^eb^ti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakammaṭṭhānamāha. ^b^Sabbasaññā^eb^ti rūpasaññā paṭighasaññā nānattasaññā heṭṭhimā tisso arūpasaññāti evaṃ sabbasaññā anavasesā nirujjhantīti vadanti. ^b^‘‘Heṭṭhā vuttā’’^eb^ti pana visesitattā imasmiṃ āgatā catutthajjhānasaññādayo api saññāti apare. ^b^Ta^eb^nti sammutimattaṃ kāmasaññāpaṭibāhanavaseneva tesaṃ nānattasaññādinirodhassa atthasiddhattā. ^b^Samādhivasena osakkanā kathitā^eb^ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhāvanāya samathakammaṭṭhānabhāvato.

[03]^b^71^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbe pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭa^eb^nti purimakammabhavasmiṃ moho avijjā āyūhanā saṅkhārā nikantitaṇhā ^a^V2.0043^ea^ upagamanaṃ upādānaṃ cetanā bhavoti evamāgato saparikkhāro kammappabandho. ^b^Na āyūhitaṃ assā^eb^ti na cetitaṃ pakappitaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Etarahi evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭa^eb^nti viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanāsaṅkhāto paccuppanno vipākappabandho ^b^nappavatteyya^eb^ kāraṇassa anipphannattā. ^b^Sace āyūhitaṃ na bhavissatī^eb^ti yadi cetitaṃ pakappitaṃ na siyā. ^b^Yaṃ atthī^eb^ti yaṃ paramatthato vijjamānakaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhūta’’^eb^nti. Tañhi paccayanibbattatāya ‘‘bhūta’’nti vuccati. ^b^Taṃ pajahāmī^eb^ti tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena tato eva āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanavasena pajahāmi pariccajāmi.

[03]^b^Parinibbāyī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0258^ea^ saha parikappanena atītattheti āha ^b^‘‘parinibbāyeyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parinibbāyeyya nu kho^eb^ti vā pāṭho, so evattho. ^b^Na kiñci kathita^eb^nti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvena ñāṇuttarasseva visayabhāvato sarūpato na kiñci kathitaṃ, nayena panassa visesaṃ ñāpetukāmattā. Bhagavato kira etadahosi – ‘‘imissaṃyeva parisati nisinno ānando anusandhikusalatāya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno paṭisandhiṃ arahattañca sandhāya pañhaṃ pucchissati, iminā pucchānusandhinā tamatthaṃ desessāmī’’ti. Osakkanāya ca idhādhippetattā bhinnarasadesanā hotīti pucchānusandhi pucchitā. Tasmiñhi asati anusandhibhedabhinnesā desanā, na ca buddhāciṇṇā bhinnarasadesanāti. ^b^Vipassanānissita^eb^nti tannissitaṃ. ^b^Tassa^eb^ bhikkhuno. Upādiyati etenāti ca ^b^upādānaṃ. Na parinibbāyati^eb^ pahātabbassa appajahanato. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘dhammāpi kho, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.240). ^b^Upādānaseṭṭha^eb^nti idaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhavassa sabbabhavaggatādassanaparaṃ, na pana ariyabhavaggassa upādānaseṭṭhatāpaṭisedhaparaṃ.
[03]^b^73^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nissāyā^eb^ti bhavapariyāpannaṃ nāma dhammaṃ nissāya tappariyāpannaṃ nāma nissāya oghanittharaṇā bhagavatā akkhātā; aho acchariyametaṃ, aho abbhutametanti.

[03]Navasupi ṭhānesu samathayānikasseva vasena desanāya āgatattā, idha ca kassacipi pādakajjhānassa anāmaṭṭhattā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘ariyasāvakoti sukkhavipassako ariyasāvako’’^eb^ti. ^b^Navannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasatī^eb^ti idaṃ jhānadhammepi anussavaladdhe gahetvā sammasanaṃ sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ; tebhūmakasaṅkhāragataṃ idha vuttanti anavasesato pariggahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘yāvatā sakkāyo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Etaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0044^ea^^b^amata^eb^nti amataṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha pavattiyā etaṃ arahattaṃ amatarasaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘etaṃ amataṃ santaṃ, etaṃ paṇīta’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Anupādāya kiñcipi aggahetvā cittaṃ vimuccī’’ti vuttattāpi ^b^anupādā cittassa vimokkho^eb^ nibbānaṃ aññattha sutte vuccati.

[03]^b^Tiṇṇaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0259^ea^^b^bhikkhūna^eb^nti abhinivesabhedena tividhānaṃ. Pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa osakkanāya abhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Samodhānetvā^eb^ti sammadeva odahitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne asaṅkarato vavatthapetvā. ^b^Sukathitaṃ nāma hoti^eb^ kathetabbassa anavasesetvā kathitattā.
[06]Āneñjasappāyasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^74^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā ^a^V2.0045^ea^ heṭṭhimasopānaphalakaṃ orohantassa pacchimaṃ nāma hoti, evaṃ ārohantassa paṭhamaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarāti yāva paṭhamasopānaphalakā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vatthuṃ sodhetvā^eb^ti vatthuvijjācariyena vuttavidhinā pāsādavatthuno sodhanavidhiṃ katvā. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti pāsādakaraṇe. Sattadhā bhinnassa vālaggassa aṃsukoṭivedhako ^b^vālavedhi^eb^ nāma. ^b^Ṭhānasampādana^eb^nti vesākhamaṇḍalādīnaṃ sampādanaṃ. ^b^Muṭṭhikaraṇādīhī^eb^ti usumuṭṭhikaraṇajiyāgāhajiyāvijjhādīhi. ^b^Evaṃ gaṇāpemā^eb^ti ekaṃ nāma ekameva, dve dukā cattāri, tīṇi tikāni nava, cattāri catukkāni soḷasātiādinā evaṃ gaṇanaṃ sikkhāpema.
[03]^b^75^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kerāṭikā hontī^eb^ti samayassa anupakkiliṭṭhakaraṇamāyāsāṭheyyena samannāgatā honti. ^b^Taṃ^eb^ damanaṃ ^b^jīvitahetupi nātikkamati,^eb^ ayamassa jātidosābhāvo.

[03]^b^76^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Satisampajaññāhi samaṅgibhāvatthāyā^eb^ti satatavihāribhāvasādhanehi satisampajaññehi samannāgamatthāya. Nanu ca khīṇāsavā sativepullappattā paññāvepullappattā ca, kathaṃ tassa satisampajaññaṃ payogasādhanīyaṃ pavattanti āha ^b^‘‘dve hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Satatavihārī^eb^ti satataṃ samāpattivihāribahulā, tasmā te icchiticchitakkhaṇe phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanti. Vuttavipariyāyena nosatatavihārino daṭṭhabbā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Appetuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ anāciṇṇabhāvato.

[03]^b^Taṃ vitakkento^eb^ti ‘‘sāmaṇerassa senāsanaṃ natthi, araññañca sīhādīhi saparissayaṃ, kiṃ nu kho tassa bhavissatī’’ti taṃ vitakkento. ^b^Evarūpo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0260^ea^ ediso yathāvuttasāmaṇerasadiso khīṇāsavo. ^b^Ime dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte āgate sīlādidhamme. ^b^Āvajjitvāvā^eb^ti attano parisuddhasīlatādiāvajjanahetu eva samāpajjituṃ sakkhissati.
[03]^b^78^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Yeme, bho gotamā’’^eb^ti vacanassa sambandhaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘tathāgate kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘yeme, bho gotamā’’tiādiākārehi ^b^vattumāraddho.^eb^

[03]^b^Ajjadhammesū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0046^ea^ apurātanadhammesu. Takkanamattāni hi tehi kappetvā sayaṃpaṭibhānaṃ viracitāni. Purātanatāya paripuṇṇatāya ekantaniyyānikatāya ca paramo uttamo. Tenāha – ‘‘tesu…pe… uttamoti attho’’ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Gaṇakamoggallānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^79^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kammaṃyeva ^a^V2.0047^ea^ kammanto, so ettha atthīti kammakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^‘‘kammanto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammantaṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tehi dhammehī^eb^ti buddhaguṇehi. Te pana sabbaññutaññāṇappamukhāti katvā āha ^b^‘‘sabbaññutaññāṇadhammehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbena sabba^eb^nti sabbappakārena anavasesaṃ, ettako guṇānaṃ pakārabhedo, tesu kiñcipi pakāraṃ anavasesetvā. ^b^Sabbakoṭṭhāsehi sabba^eb^nti yattakā guṇabhāgā, tehi sabbehi anavasesaṃ nissesameva katvā. ^b^Yopi ahosī^eb^ti yopi kosambivāsīnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasena kosambiyaṃ kalaho ahosi. ^b^Sopi tattheva^eb^ uppannaṭṭhāneyeva uppannamatto vūpasamito. ^b^Parinibbutakāle panassā^eb^ti assa sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutakāle pana. Bhiyyosomattāya bhikkhū samaggā jātā, kathañca saṃvego jātoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhasaṭṭhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Sātisayaṃ abhiṇhañca upasamappattiyā ^b^ativiya upasantupasantā. Anusaṃyāyamāno^eb^ti anu anu sammadeva jānanto vicārento vosāsamāno. ‘‘Anusaññāyamāno’’ti vā pāṭho. Tattha ya-kārassa ña-kāraṃ katvā niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘anuvicaramāno’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^80^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Heṭṭhimapucchamevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0261^ea^ gopakamoggallānena pucchitapucchameva. So hi ‘‘tehi dhammehī’’tiādinā, ‘‘atthi koci tumhākaṃ sāsanassa sārabhūto bhikkhū’’ti pucchi. Ayañca tameva ‘‘paṭisaraṇo’’ti pariyāyena pucchi. ^b^Appaṭisaraṇe^eb^ti yaṃ tumhe bhikkhuṃ paṭibodheyyātha, tādisassa abhāvena appaṭisaraṇe. Tathāgatena pavedito dhammo paṭisaraṇaṃ etesanti ^b^dhammapaṭisaraṇā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dhammo avassayo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^81^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āgacchatī^eb^ti vācuggatabhāvena āgacchati. Vatthuvītikkamasaṅkhāte garugarutaralahulahutarādibhede ajjhācāre āpattisamaññāti āha – ^b^‘‘āpatti…pe… āṇātikkamanamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yathādhamma^eb^nti dhammānurūpaṃ. ^b^Yathāsiṭṭha^eb^nti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Dhammo no^eb^ti ettha ^b^no^eb^-saddo avadhāraṇe ‘‘na no samaṃ atthi tathāgatenā’’tiādīsu (khu. pā. 6.3; su. ni. 226) viya. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dhammova kāretī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^83^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Yathā taṃ tumhādisehi rakkhakehi gopakehī’’ti evaṃ pasannavesena attānaṃ ukkaṃsāpetukāmo ^a^V2.0048^ea^. Ariyūpavādapāpaṃ khamāpane sati antarāyāya na hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘iccetaṃ kusala’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gonaṅgalamakkaṭo^eb^ti gonaṅguṭṭhamakkaṭo.

[03]^b^84^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ayaṃ ukkaṃsāpetuṃ icchitaṃ yathāraddhamatthaṃ visaṃvādeti avaṇṇitampi vaṇṇitaṃ katvā kathento; imassa vacanassa paṭikkhepena iminā dātabbapiṇḍapātassa antarāyo mā hotūti evaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ rakkhituṃ na kho pana sakkāti yojanā. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘na kho, brāhmaṇa, so bhagavā’’tiādidesanaṃ. ^b^Abbhantaraṃ karitvā^eb^ti nibbānantogadhaṃ katvā, antaraṃ vā tassa nijjhānassa kāraṇaṃ katvā. Kāmarāgavasena hi taṃ nijjhānaṃ hotīti. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ suttapadese. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikajjhāna^eb^nti lokiyalokuttarassa antarāyo mā hotūti evaṃ katvāpi rūpāvacarassa maggajhānassa phalajhānassāti sabbassapi saṅgaṇhanavasena desitattā sabbasaṅgāhakajjhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.

[03]^b^Yaṃ no maya^eb^nti ettha ^b^no^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ. ^b^Taṃ no^eb^ti ettha pana ^b^no^eb^ti amhākanti attho. ^b^Usūyati^eb^ rājakiccapasutatādhīnatāya ekatthābhinivesabhāvato ^a^M2.0262^ea^. Mandapaññatāya vassakāragataissābhibhūtacittatāya paripuṇṇaṃ katvā vuttampi atthaṃ anupadhārento āha – ^b^‘‘ekadesameva kathesī’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Gopakamoggallānasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^85^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0049^ea^^b^ahū^eb^ti tasmiṃ ahanīti āha ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ divase’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anasanenā^eb^ti sabbaso āhārassa abhuñjanena sāsanikasīlena bāhirakānasanena upetā hutvāti yojanā. ^b^Vā^eb^-saddena khīrapānamadhusāyanādividhiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Upecca vasitabbato ^b^uposatho,^eb^ pātimokkhuddeso. Upetena samannāgatena hutvā vasitabbato santāne vāsetabbato ^b^uposatho,^eb^ sīlaṃ. Anasanādidhammādiṃ vā upecca vasanaṃ upavāso ^b^uposatho^eb^. Tathārūpe hatthijātivisese uposathoti samaññāmattanti āha – ^b^‘‘uposatho nāma nāgarājātiādīsu paññattī’’^eb^ti. Vuttanayena upavasanti etthāti ^b^uposatho,^eb^ divaso. ^b^So panesa^eb^ uposatho. ^b^Māsapuṇṇatāyā^eb^ti māsassa pūritabhāvena. ^b^Sampuṇṇā^eb^ti sabbaso puṇṇā. Tāya hi rattiyā vasena māso anavasesato puṇṇo hoti. Māsaddhamāsādibhedaṃ kālaṃ māti minanto viya hotīti ca ^b^‘‘mā’’iti cando vuccati. Etthā^eb^ti etissā rattiyā. Puṇṇo paripuṇṇakalo jātoti ^b^puṇṇamā^eb^. Tañhi candapāripūriyā māsapāripūriyā evamāha. Etena tassa uposathabhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]Dissati phalaṃ sandissatīti ^b^deso,^eb^ hetūti āha ^b^‘‘desanti kāraṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sabbaṃ kathenti^eb^ sabbaṃ attanā pariggahitappakāraṃ kathenti. ^b^Kathetuṃ na sakkonti^eb^ avisayattā. ^b^Pāsādapariveṇe^eb^ti pāsādassa purato vivaṭaṅgaṇe. ^b^Heṭṭhā vuttanayenā^eb^ti sekhasutte (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 2.22) vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ.

[03]^b^86^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ime nu kho^eb^ti ettha nūti saṃsayajotanoti āha – ^b^‘‘vimatipucchā viya kathitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Jānantenā^eb^tiādi pucchāvattadassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na ^a^M2.0263^ea^ pucchakassa satthu attano ajānanabhāvadīpanaparaṃ. Jānāti hi bhagavā. ^b^Ajānantena viya hutvā^eb^ pucchite. Yathābhūtasabhāvaṃ ^b^jānanto viya pucchati^eb^ kohaññe ṭhatvā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘thero evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ karissatī’’^eb^ti kāraṇassa suppahīnattāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Chandamūlakā^eb^ti taṇhāchandamūlakā. Taṇhā hi dukkhasamudayo. Kusalasañño vā thiravisadanipuṇasañño vā, kusalasaṅkhāro vā tikhiṇathiravisadasaṅkhāro vā; suvisuddhavipulodāraviññāṇo ^a^V2.0050^ea^ vāti imamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘saññādīsupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā atidisati. Kasmā panettha anāgatakālavaseneva desanā āgatāti āha ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Khandhānaṃ khandhapaṇṇattī^eb^ti khandhasaddābhidheyyānaṃ ruppanānubhavanasañjānanābhisaṅkharavijānanasabhāvānaṃ atthānaṃ ‘‘khandho’’ti ayaṃ samaññā. ^b^Kittakenā^eb^ti kiṃparimāṇena atthena, rāsatthabhāgatthādīsu kīdisenāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Hetuhetū^eb^ti hetupaccayabhūto hetu. Yo hi lobhādīnaṃ sahajātadhammesu mūlaṭṭhenupakārakabhāvo nippariyāyena hetuttho; so pathavīādīsupi paccayabhāvamattena hetupariyāyadassanato dutiyena hetu-saddena visesetvā vutto ^b^‘‘hetuhetū’’^eb^ti. Avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ sādhāraṇapaccayattā sādhāraṇahetu, ‘‘atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ kammasamādānānaṃ ṭhānaso hetuso vipāka’’nti ettha vijjamānesupi aññesu paccayesu iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākaniyāmakattā kammaṃ tassa padhānakāraṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘kusalākusalaṃ attano attano vipākadāne uttamahetū’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Mahābhūtā hetū’’ti ayamevattho ‘‘mahābhūtā paccayo’’ti imināpi vuttoti hetusaddapaccayasaddānaṃ samānatthattā paccayo eva hetu ^b^paccayahetu,^eb^ yo ca rūpakkhandhassa hetu, so eva tassa paññāpanāya paccayoti vuttoti āha – ^b^‘‘idha paccayahetu adhippeto’’^eb^ti. Yadaggena paccayadhammo attano paccayuppannassa uppādāya ṭhitiyā ca paccayo, tadaggena tassa bhāvato samaññāto paññāpanāyapi so paccayoti vattabbataṃ arahatīti. Pāḷiyaṃ avibhāgena vuttamatthaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘tattha pathavīdhātū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^paññāpanāyā^eb^ti sahetuahetukantiādiākārehi bodhanāya ^a^M2.0264^ea^. Taṃ pana sabbodhanaṃ ñāṇena dassanaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dassanatthāyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Phasso^eb^ti phassasamaṅgībhāvo. So cettha sakiccanipphādanasamatthassa phassassa nibbatti. Nibbatto hi phasso tathārūpāya vedanāya paccayo hotīti. Etadatthamevettha bhagavatā puggalādhiṭṭhānā desanā katā, tasmā paccuppannātītakālavasena dvikāliko phassasaddo veditabbo. Phasse sati vedeti phassapaccayā vedanāicceva vuttaṃ hoti. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Yatheva hi vedanāya evaṃ saññāya saṅkhārānampi phasso visesapaccayo tasmiṃ asati abhāvato. Cetanāggahaṇena āyūhanānurūpatāya tappadhānattā saṅkhārakkhandhadhammā gahitā. Tathā hi suttantabhājanīye saṅkhārakkhandhabhājanīye (vibha. 21, 22) ca ‘‘cakkhusamphassajā cetanā’’tiādinā ^a^V2.0051^ea^ cetanāva niddiṭṭhā. ^b^Viññāṇakkhandhassā^eb^ti ettha ekasmiṃ bhave ādibhūtaviññāṇassa nāmarūpapaccayataṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘paṭisandhiviññāṇena tāvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha gabbhaseyyakassa sabhāvakassa rūpapavattiṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘uparimaparicchedenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ samatiṃsato upari paṭisandhikkhaṇe tassa rūpānaṃ asambhavato. Idāni pavattiviññāṇassa nāmarūpapaccayaṃ dvāravasena dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘cakkhudvāre’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Nanu ca viññāṇassapi phasso paccayo, kasmā tayo eva khandhā phassapaccayā vuttāti? Saccametaṃ, yathā pana viññāṇasahito phasso vedanādīnaṃ paccayo, na evaṃ viññāṇassa. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso’’ti (ma. ni. 1.204; ma. ni. 3.421, 425, 426; saṃ. ni. 2.44, 45; 2.4.60) phasso viya nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa visesapaccayo yathā nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇanti. Tasmā imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ nāmarūpasseva viññāṇapaccayatā vuttā, na phassassa.

[03]^b^87^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yāva sakkāyadiṭṭhi samuppajjati, tāva vaṭṭassa pariyanto natthevāti appahīnasakkāyadiṭṭhiko vaṭṭe paribbhamatīti āha – ^b^‘‘kathaṃ pana, bhanteti vaṭṭaṃ pucchanto’’^eb^ti. Yathā ca sakkāyadiṭṭhijotanā vaṭṭapucchā, evaṃ tabbhedanajotanā vivaṭṭapucchāti āha – ^b^‘‘sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti vivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^88^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0265^ea^^b^rūpe assādo^eb^ti yāthāvato dassanaṃ pariññābhisamayo, dukkhasaccapariyāpannañca rūpanti āha – ^b^‘‘iminā pariññāpaṭivedho ceva dukkhasaccañca kathita’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Yaṃ rūpaṃ anicca’’ntiādivacanato aniccādibhāvo tattha ādīnavo, so cassa paccayādhīnavuttitāya paccayo samudayasaccanti samudayappahānena ādīnavasamatikkamoti ādīnavaggahaṇena siddhamatthamāha – ^b^‘‘pahānapaṭivedho ceva samudayasaccañcā’’^eb^ti. Sabbasaṅkhatanissaraṇaṃ nibbānañca sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena paṭivijjhitabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘iminā sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho ceva nirodhasaccañcā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Imesu tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti yathāvuttesu dukkhādīsu tīsu abhisamayaṭṭhānesu. ^b^Ye sammādiṭṭhiādayo dhammā^eb^ti ye ariyamaggasaññitā sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha, satta vā dhammā. ^b^Bhāvanāpaṭivedho maggasacca^eb^nti bhāvanābhisamayavasena pavattaṃ maggasaccaṃ. ^b^Sesapadesupī^eb^ti, ‘‘ayaṃ vedanāya assādo’’tiādipadesupi.

[03]^b^89^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imasmi^eb^nti āsannapaccakkhatāya sakāttabhāvo gahito, tadeva ajjhattā khandhāti tappaṭiyogitāya, ^b^‘‘bahiddhāti parassa saviññāṇake kāye’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbanimittesū^eb^ti sabbesu rūpanimittādīsupi ^a^V2.0052^ea^. Tāni pana indriyabaddhānipi anindriyabaddhānipi taṃsabhāvānīti āha ^b^‘‘anindriyabaddhampi saṅgaṇhātī’’^eb^ti. Viññāṇaggahaṇenevettha vedanādayopi gahitā avinābhāvatoti, ^b^‘‘saviññāṇake kāye’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kāyo’’^eb^ti vā khandhasamūhoti attho.

[03]^b^90^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anattani ṭhatvā^eb^ti attarahite anattasabhāve khandhakoṭṭhāse ṭhatvā taṃ ādhāraṃ katvā ^b^katāni^eb^ kammāni. ^b^Katarasmiṃ attani ṭhatvā^eb^ti kīdise attani nissayavipākaṃ dassanti vipaccissanti. Etena kārakavedakarahitattā attapakkhakammakāni na yujjantīti dasseti, khandhānaṃ khaṇikattā ca katanāsākatabbhāgamadoso ca āpajjatīti.

[03]Tatrāyaṃ (itivu. aṭṭha. 74; sārattha. ṭī. 1.5) codanāsodhanāvidhi – pāṇātipātavasena tāva kammapathasambandhavibhāvanā, khaṇe khaṇe hi nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hanti, ko vā haññati, yadi cittacetasikasantāno, so arūpattā ^a^M2.0266^ea^ na chedanabhedanādivasena vikopanasamattho, napi vikopanīyo. Atha rūpasantāno, so acetanattā kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipātāpuññaṃ pasavati yathā matasarīre. Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappahārādiko atītesu vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya, anāgatesu, paccuppannesu vā, tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato, paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā, vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ, nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo? Khaṇikattā vadhādhippāyasamakālabhijjanakassa kiriyāpariyosānakālānavaṭṭhānato kassa pāṇātipātakammabaddhoti?

[03]Vuccateyathāvuttavadhakacetanāsahito saṅkhārapuñjo sattasaṅkhāto hanti. Tena pavattitavadhappayoganimittaṃ apagatausmāviññāṇajīvitindriyo matavohārapavattinibandhano yathāvuttavappayogakaraṇe uppajjanāraho rūpārūpadhammasamūho haññati, kevalo vā cittacetasikasantāno. Vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya rūpasantāne parena payojitajīvitindriyupacchedakapayogavasena tannibbattitavibandhakavisadirūpuppattiyā vigate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo; nāpi ahetuko pāṇātipāto, na ca payogo nippayojano paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katappayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito. Khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena sahetukabhāvato na ahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0053^ea^; na ca katturahito pāṇātipātappayogo nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano anurūpaphaluppādane niyatesu kāraṇesu kattuvohārasiddhito yathā – ‘‘padīpo pakāseti, nisākaro candimā’’ti. Na ca kevalassa vacādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchito santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato; santānavasena pavattamānānañca ^a^M2.0267^ea^ padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyasiddhi dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammunā baddho; tato eva yasmiṃ santāne pāṇātipātacetanā pavattā; tattheva santāne paccayantarasamavāyena bhavantare nirayādīsu tassā phalappavattīti nattheva katavināso akatabbhāgamo ca. Iminā nayena adinnādānādīnañca vasena yathārahaṃ kammapathasambandhavibhāvanā veditabbāti.

[03]Sabbo diṭṭhiggāho taṇhāvasagatasseva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘taṇhādhipateyyenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tesu tesu dhammesū^eb^ti mayā desiyamānadassanadhammesu. ^b^Pakatikammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti tassa therassa santike gahetvā parihariyamānakammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Aññaṃ navakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti bhagavato desanānusārena gahitaṃ aññaṃ navaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahāpuṇṇamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^91^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tuṇhībhūtaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0054^ea^^b^tuṇhībhūta^eb^nti āmeḍitavacanaṃ byāpanicchāvasena vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘yaṃ yaṃ disa’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Anuviloketvā^eb^ti ettha ^b^anu^eb^saddopi byāpanicchāyamevāti anu anu viloketvāti attho. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘tato tato viloketvā’’^eb^ti. Asanto nīco purisoti ^b^asappuriso^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘pāpapuriso lāmakapuriso’’^eb^ti. ^b^So^eb^ti asappuriso. ^b^Ta^eb^nti asappurisaṃ ^b^jānituṃ na sakkoti^eb^ asappurisadhammānaṃ yāthāvato ajānanato. ^b^Pāpadhammasamannāgato^eb^ti kāyaduccaritādiasantuṭṭhitādilāmakadhammasamannāgato. Asappurise bhatti etassāti ^b^asappurisabhatti^eb^. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘asappurisasevano’’^eb^ti. Asappurisadhammo asappuriso uttarapadalopena, tesaṃ cintanasīloti ^b^asappurisacintī^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asappurisacintāya cintako’’^eb^ti, duccintitacintīti attho. ^b^Asappurisamantana^eb^nti asādhujanavicāraṃ asappurisavīmaṃsaṃ. ^b^Asappurisavāca^eb^nti catubbidhaṃ dubbhāsitaṃ. ^b^Asappurisakammaṃ^eb^ nāma tividhampi kāyaduccaritaṃ. ^b^Asappurisadiṭṭhi^eb^ nāma visesato dasavatthukā micchādiṭṭhi, tāya samannāgato ^b^asappurisadiṭṭhiyā samannāgato, asappurisadānaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0268^ea^ nāma asakkaccadānādi. Sabbopāyamattho pāḷito eva viññāyati.

[03]‘‘Pāṇaṃ hanissāmī’’tiādikā cetanā kāmaṃ parabyābādhāyapi hotiyeva, yathā pana sā attano balavataradukkhatthāya hoti, tathā na parassāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘attano dukkhatthāya cinteti’’^eb^icceva vutto. ^b^Yathā asuko asuka^eb^ntiādīhi pāpako pāpavipākekadesaṃ balavaṃ garutaraṃ vā paccanubhontopi yathā paro paccanubhoti, na tathā sayanti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘parabyābādhāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gahetvā^eb^ti pāpakiriyāya sahāyabhāvena gahetvā.

[03]^b^Asakkacca^eb^nti anādaraṃ katvā. Deyyadhammassa asakkaraṇaṃ appasannākāro, puggalassa asakkaraṇaṃ agarukaraṇanti imamatthaṃ dassento, ^b^‘‘deyyadhammaṃ na sakkaroti nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Acittīkatvā^eb^ti na citte katvā, na pūjetvāti attho. Pūjento hi pūjetabbavatthuṃ citte ṭhapeti, tato na bahi karoti. Cittaṃ vā acchariyaṃ katvā paṭipatti ^b^cittīkaraṇaṃ,^eb^ sambhāvanakiriyā. Tappaṭikkhepato ^b^acittīkaraṇaṃ,^eb^ asambhāvanakiriyā. ^b^Apaviddha^eb^nti ucchiṭṭhādichaḍḍanīyadhammaṃ viya avakhittakaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘chaḍḍetukāmo viyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Rogaṃ pakkhipanto^eb^^a^V2.0055^ea^^b^viyā^eb^ti rogikasarīraṃ odanādīhi pamajjitvā vammike rogaṃ pakkhipanto viya. Addhā imassa dānassa phalaṃ mameva āgacchatīti evaṃ yassa tathā diṭṭhi atthi, so āgamanadiṭṭhiko, ayaṃ pana na tādisoti āha ^b^‘‘anāgamanadiṭṭhiko’’^eb^ti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘no phalapāṭikaṅkhī hutvā detī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Kāmañcāyaṃ yathāvuttapuggalo asaddhammādīhi pāpadhammehi samannāgato, tehi pana sabbehipi micchādassanaṃ mahāsāvajjanti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘tāya micchādiṭṭhiyā niraye upapajjatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttapaṭipakkhanayenā^eb^ti kaṇhapakkhe vuttassa atthassa vipariyāyena sukkapakkhe attho veditabbo. ‘‘Sadevakaṃ loka’’ntiādīsu (pārā. 1) devasaddo chakāmāvacaradevesu, evamidhāti āha ^b^‘‘chakāmāvacaradevā’’^eb^ti. Tattha brahmānaṃ visuṃ gahitattā kāmāvacaradevaggahaṇanti ce? Idha dānaphalassa adhippetattā kāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0269^ea^, tatthāpi chakāmāvacaraggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ devamahattatādivacanato. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ kulānaṃ sampattī^eb^ti khattiyamahattādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kulānaṃ sampatti, na kevalaṃ kulasampadā eva adhippetā, atha kho tattha āyuvaṇṇayasabhogaissariyādisampadāpi adhippetāti daṭṭhabbaṃ uḷārassa dānamayapuññassa vasena tesampi samijjhanato. ^b^Suddhavaṭṭavaseneva kathitaṃ^eb^ sukkapakkhepi sabbaso vivaṭṭassa anāmaṭṭhattā. Saddhādayo hi lokiyakusalasambhārā evettha adhippetāti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Cūḷapuṇṇamasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca devadahavaggavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^93^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iddhimāti^eb^^a^V2.0056^ea^^a^M2.0270^ea^^b^guṇo pākaṭo^eb^ paratoghosena vinā pāsādakampanadevacārikādīhi sayameva pakāsabhāvato; dhutavādādiguṇānampi tathābhāve eteneva nayena tesaṃ guṇānaṃ pākaṭayogato ca paresaṃ nicchitabhāvato ca. ^b^Paññavato guṇā^eb^ti paññāpabhedapabhāvite guṇavisese sandhāya vadati. Te hi yebhuyyena paresaṃ avisayā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘na sakkā akathitā jānitu’’^eb^nti. Visabhāgā sabhāgā nāma ayonisomanasikārabahulesu puthujjanesu, te pana appahīnarāgadosatāya parassa vijjamānampi guṇaṃ makkhetvā avijjamānaṃ avaṇṇameva ghosentīti āha – ^b^‘‘visabhāga…pe… kathentī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yā aṭṭhārasannaṃ dhātūnaṃ samudayato atthaṅgamato assādato ādīnavato yathābhūtaṃ pajānanā, ayaṃ ^b^dhātukusalatā. Āyatanakusalatāya^eb^pi eseva nayo. Avijjādīsu dvādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu kosallaṃ ^b^paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā^eb^. Idaṃ imassa phalassa ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ, idaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ akāraṇanti evaṃ ṭhānañca ṭhānato, aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ pajānanā, ayaṃ ^b^ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalatā^eb^. Yo pana imesu dhātuādīsu pariññābhisamayādivasena nissaṅgagatiyā paṇḍāti laddhanāmena ñāṇena ito gato pavatto, ayaṃ ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ nāmāti āha – ^b^‘‘imehi catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito’’^eb^ti. Mahantānaṃ atthānaṃ pariggaṇhanato mahatī paññā etassāti ^b^mahāpañño^eb^. Sesapadesupi eseva nayoti āha – ^b^‘‘mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Nānatta^eb^nti yāhi mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatattā thero ‘‘mahāpañño’’tiādinā kittīyati, tāsaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ idaṃ nānattaṃ ayaṃ vemattatā. Yassa kassaci (dī. ni. ṭī. 3.216; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.110; a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.584) visesato arūpadhammassa mahattaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassa kiccasiddhiyā dassento, ^b^‘‘mahante^eb^^a^V2.0057^ea^^b^sīlakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha hetumahantatāya paccayamahantatāya nissayamahantatāya pabhedamahantatāya kiccamahantatāya ^a^M2.0271^ea^ phalamahantatāya ānisaṃsamahantatāya ca sīlakkhandhassa mahantabhāvo veditabbo. Tattha ^b^hetū^eb^ alobhādayo, ^b^paccayā^eb^ hirottappasaddhāsativīriyādayo. ^b^Nissayā^eb^ sāvakabodhipaccekabodhisammāsambodhiniyatatā taṃsamaṅgino ca purisavisesā. ^b^Pabhedo^eb^ cārittādivibhāgo. ^b^Kiccaṃ^eb^ tadaṅgādivasena paṭipakkhassa vidhamanaṃ. ^b^Phalaṃ^eb^ saggasampadā nibbānasampadā ca. ^b^Ānisaṃso^eb^ piyamanāpatādi. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana visuddhimagge (visuddhi. 1.9) ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu (ma. ni. 1.64 ādayo) ca āgatanayena veditabbo. Iminā nayena ^b^samādhikkhandhā^eb^dīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā veditabbā, ^b^ṭhānāṭṭhānā^eb^dīnaṃ pana mahantabhāvo mahāvisayatāya veditabbo. Tattha ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ mahāvisayatā bahudhātukasutte (ma. ni. 3.124 ādayo) sayameva āgamissati. ^b^Vihārasamāpattīnaṃ^eb^ samādhikkhandhe niddhāritanayena veditabbā, ^b^ariyasaccānaṃ^eb^ sakalasāsanasaṅgahaṇato saccavibhaṅge (vibha. 189 ādayo) taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu (vibha. aṭṭha. 189 ādayo) āgatanayena. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānā^eb^dīnaṃ vibhaṅgādīsu (vibha. 355 ādayo) taṃsaṃvaṇṇanādīsu (vibha. aṭṭha. 355 ādayo) ca āgatanayena. ^b^Sāmaññaphalānaṃ^eb^ mahato hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato yogakkhemassa nipphattibhāvato santapaṇītanipuṇātakkāvacarapaṇḍitavedanīyabhāvato ca. ^b^Abhiññānaṃ^eb^ mahāsambhārato mahāvisayato mahākiccato mahānubhāvato mahānipphattito ca. ^b^Nibbānassa^eb^ madanimmadanādimahatthasiddhito mahantatā veditabbā.

[03]^b^Puthupaññā^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – ^b^nānākhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatī^eb^ti, ‘‘ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāmā’’ti, evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tesupi ‘‘ekavidhena rūpakkhandho, ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho, ekavidhena vedanākkhandho, bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho, ekavidhena saññākkhandho…pe… ekavidhena viññāṇakkhandho, bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho’’ti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādibhedavasenapi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tathā ‘‘idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma. Tattha dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakā’’ti evaṃ āyatananānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.

[03]^b^Nānādhātūsū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0272^ea^ ‘‘ayaṃ cakkhudhātu nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma. Tattha soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve catubhūmakā’’ti evaṃ nānādhātūsu paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tayidaṃ ^a^V2.0058^ea^ upādiṇṇakadhātuvasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnañca aggasāvakānaṃ upādiṇṇakadhātūsuyeva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati. Tañca kho ekadesatova, no nippadesato, anupādiṇṇakadhātūnaṃ pana nānākaraṇaṃ na jānantiyeva. Sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva pana, ‘‘imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti, imassa kaṇho, imassa bahalattaco, imassa tanuttaco, imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ, imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ, phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ susaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ ambilaṃ kaṭukaṃ kasāvaṃ, kaṇṭako tikhiṇo atikhiṇo ujuko kuṭilo lohito odāto hotī’’ti dhātunānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.

[03]^b^Atthesū^eb^ti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu. ^b^Nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesū^eb^ti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato santānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu. Avijjādiaṅgānañhi paccekaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasaññitāti. Tenāha – saṅkhārapiṭake ‘‘dvādasa paccayā dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā’’ti. ^b^Nānāsuññatamanupalabbhesū^eb^ti nānāsabhāvesu niccasārādivirahato suññasabhāvesu, tato eva itthipurisāttāttaniyādivasena anupalabbhesu sabhāvesu. Ma-kāro hettha padasandhikaro. ^b^Nānāatthesū^eb^ti atthapaṭisambhidāvisayesu paccayuppannādinānāatthesu. ^b^Dhammesū^eb^ti dhammapaṭisambhidāvisayesu paccayādinānādhammesu. ^b^Niruttīsū^eb^ti tesaṃyeva atthadhammānaṃ niddhāraṇavacanasaṅkhātāsu nānāniruttīsu. ^b^Paṭibhānesū^eb^ti ettha atthapaṭisambhidādīsu visayabhūtesu, ‘‘imāni idamatthajotakānī’’ti (vibha. 725-745) tathā tathā paṭibhānato paṭibhānānīti laddhanāmesu ñāṇesu. ^b^Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesū^eb^tiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva. Itaresaṃ pana vuttanayānusārena suviññeyyattā pākaṭameva. Yaṃ pana abhinnaṃ ekameva nibbānaṃ, tattha upacāravasena puthuttaṃ gahetabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkammā’’^eb^ti. Tenassa madanimmadanādipariyāyena puthuttaṃ paridīpitaṃ hoti.

[03]Evaṃ ^a^M2.0273^ea^ visayavasena paññāya mahattaṃ puthuttañca dassetvā idāni sampayuttadhammavasena hāsabhāvaṃ, pavattiākāravasena javanabhāvaṃ, kiccavasena tikkhādibhāvañca dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘katamā hāsapaññā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^hāsabahulo^eb^ti pītibahulo. Sesapadāni tasseva vevacanāni. ^b^Sīlaṃ paripūretī^eb^ti haṭṭhapahaṭṭho udaggudaggo hutvā pītisahagatāya paññāya. Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena ārammaṇe phullā vikasitā viya pavattati; na upekkhāsahagatāti pātimokkhasīlaṃ ṭhapetvā hāsanīyaṃ paraṃ tividhampi sīlaṃ paripūretīti attho. Visuṃ vuttattā puna ^b^sīlakkhandha^eb^māha. ^b^Samādhikkhandha^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Rūpaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0059^ea^^b^aniccato khippaṃ javatī^eb^ti rūpakkhandhaṃ aniccanti sīghaṃ vegena pavattiyā paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena vissaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhantī adandhāyantī rūpakkhandhe aniccalakkhaṇaṃ vegasā paṭivijjhati, tasmā sā ^b^javanapaññā^eb^ nāmāti attho. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘rūpa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^khayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti yattha yattha uppajjati, tattha tattheva bhijjanato khayasabhāvattā. ^b^Bhayaṭṭhenā^eb^ti bhayānakabhāvato. ^b^Asārakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti attasāravirahato niccasārādivirahato ca. ^b^Tulayitvā^eb^ti tulābhūtāya vipassanāpaññāya tuletvā. ^b^Tīrayitvā^eb^ti tāya eva tīraṇabhūtāya tīretvā. ^b^Vibhāvayitvā^eb^ti yāthāvato pakāsetvā pañcakkhandhaṃ ^b^vibhūtaṃ katvā. Rūpanirodhe^eb^ti rūpakkhandhassa nirodhabhūte ^b^nibbāne^eb^ ninnapoṇapabbhāravasena. Idāni sikhāppattavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetuṃ, puna ^b^‘‘rūpa’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāvasenāti keci.

[03]Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindanena veditabboti, ^b^‘‘khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā’’^eb^ti vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento, ^b^‘‘uppannaṃ kāmavitakka’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tikkhapañño hi khippābhiñño hoti, paṭipadā cassa na calatīti āha – ^b^‘‘ekasmiṃ āsane cattāro ariyamaggā adhigatā hontī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]‘‘Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā nirodhadhammā’’ti yāthāvato dassanena saccasampaṭivedho ijjhati, na aññathāti kāraṇamukhena nibbedhikapaññaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘sabbasaṅkhāresu^eb^^a^M2.0274^ea^^b^ubbegabahulo hotī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^ubbegabahulo^eb^ti vuttanayena sabbasaṅkhāresu abhiṇhaṃ pavattasaṃvego. ^b^Uttāsabahulo^eb^ti ñāṇutrāsavasena sabbasaṅkhāresu bahuso utrastamānaso. Tena ādīnavānupassanamāha. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhanabahulo^eb^ti pana iminā nibbidānupassanaṃ āha – ^b^aratibahulo^eb^tiādinā tassā eva aparāparuppattiṃ. ^b^Bahimukho^eb^ti sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho, tathā vā pavattitavimokkhamukho. Nibbijjhanaṃ nibbedho, so etissā atthi, nibbijjhatīti vā nibbedhā, sāva paññā ^b^nibbedhikā^eb^. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.

[03]Pajjati etena vipassanādikoti ^b^padaṃ,^eb^ samāpatti, tasmā ^b^anupada^eb^nti anusamāpattiyoti attho. ^b^Padaṃ^eb^ vā sammasanupagā dhammā vipassanāya pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘samāpattivasena vā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0060^ea^. ^b^Jhānaṅgavasena vā^eb^ti jhānaṅgavasenāti ca attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kamattho idha padasaddo, tasmā anupadaṃ anukkamenāti ayamettha atthoti āha ^b^‘‘anupaṭipāṭiyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammavipassana^eb^nti taṃtaṃsamāpatticittuppādapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipassanaṃ. ^b^Vipassatī^eb^ti samāpattiyo jhānamukhena te te dhamme yāthāvato pariggahetvā, ‘‘itipi dukkhā’’tiādinā sammasati. ^b^Addhamāsena arahattaṃ patto^eb^ ukkaṃsagatassa sāvakānaṃ sammasanacārassa nippadesena pavattiyamānattā, sāvakapāramīñāṇassa ca tathā paṭipādetabbattā. ^b^Evaṃ santepī^eb^ti yadipi mahāmoggallānatthero na cirasseva arahattaṃ patto; dhammasenāpati pana tato cirena, evaṃ santepi yasmā moggallānattheropi mahāpaññova, tasmā sāriputtattherova mahāpaññataroti. Idāni tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ, ^b^‘‘mahāmoggallānatthero hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Sammasanaṃ carati etthāti sammasanacāro, vipassanābhūmi, taṃ ^b^sammasanacāraṃ. Ekadesamevā^eb^ti sakāttabhāve saṅkhāre anavasesato pariggahetuñca sammasituñca asakkontaṃ attano abhinīhārasamudāgatañāṇabalānurūpaṃ ekadesameva pariggahetvā sammasanto. Nanu ca ‘‘sabbaṃ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.26) vacanato vaṭṭadukkhato muccitukāmena sabbaṃ pariññeyyaṃ parijānitabbameva? Saccametaṃ, tañca kho sammasanupagadhammavasena vuttaṃ. Tasmā sasantānagate sabbadhamme ^a^M2.0275^ea^, parasantānagate ca tesaṃ santānavibhāgaṃ akatvā bahiddhābhāvasāmaññato sammasanaṃ, ayaṃ sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāro. Thero pana bahiddhādhammepi santānavibhāgena keci keci uddharitvā sammasi, tañca kho ñāṇena phuṭṭhamattaṃ katvā. Tena vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto’’^eb^ti. Tattha ñāṇena nāma yāvatā neyyaṃ pavattitabbaṃ, tathā apavattanato ^b^‘‘yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viyā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Anupadadhammavipassanāya abhāvato ^b^‘‘ekadesameva sammasanto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Buddhānaṃ sammasanacāro dasasahassilokadhātuyaṃ sattasantānagatā, anindriyabaddhā ca saṅkhārāti vadanti, koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷesūti apare. Tathā hi addhattayavasena paṭiccasamuppādanayaṃ osaritvā chattiṃsakoṭisatasahassamukhena buddhānaṃ mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pavattaṃ. Paccekabuddhānaṃ sasantānagatehi saddhiṃ majjhimadesavāsisattasantānagatā anindriyabaddhā ca sammasanacāroti vadanti, jambudīpavāsisattasantānagatāti keci. Dhammasenāpatinopi yathāvuttasāvakānaṃ vipassanābhūmiyeva sammasanacāro. Tattha pana thero sātisayaṃ niravasesaṃ anupadadhammaṃ vipassi. Tena vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ nippadesaṃ sammasī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Tattha ‘‘sāvakānaṃ vipassanābhūmī’’ti ettha sukkhavipassakā lokiyābhiññappattā pakatisāvakā ^a^V2.0061^ea^ aggasāvakā paccekabuddhā sammāsambuddhāti chasu janesu sukkhavipassakānaṃ jhānābhiññāhi anadhigatapaññānepuññattā andhānaṃ viya icchitapadesokkamanaṃ vipassanākāle icchikicchitadhammavipassanā natthi. Te yathāpariggahitadhammamatteyeva ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhenti. Lokiyābhiññappattā pana pakatisāvakā yena mukhena vipassanaṃ ārabhanti; tato aññena vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti vipulañāṇattā. Mahāsāvakā abhinīhārasampannattā tato sātisayaṃ vipassanaṃ vitthārikaṃ kātuṃ sakkonti. Aggasāvakesu dutiyo abhinīhārasampattiyā samādhānassa sātisayattā vipassanaṃ tatopi vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paṭhamo pana tato mahāpaññatāya sāvakehi asādhāraṇaṃ vitthārikaṃ karoti. Paccekabuddho tehipi mahābhinīhāratāya attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ tatopi vitthārikavipassanaṃ karonti. Buddhānaṃ, sammadeva, paripūritapaññāpāramipabhāvita-sabbaññutaññāṇādhigamanassa anurūpāyāti. Yathā ^a^M2.0276^ea^ nāma katavālavedhaparicayena sarabhaṅgasadisena dhanuggahena khitto saro antarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkhaṇeyeva patati; na sajjati na virajjhati, evaṃ antarā asajjamānā avirajjhamānā vipassanā sammasanīyadhammesu yāthāvato nānānayehi pavattati. Yaṃ mahāñāṇanti vuccati, tassa pavattiākārabhedo gaṇato vuttoyeva.

[03]Etesu ca sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro khajjotapabhāsadiso, abhiññappattapakatisāvakānaṃ dīpapabhāsadiso, mahāsāvakānaṃ okkāpabhāsadiso, aggasāvakānaṃ osadhitārakāpabhāsadiso, paccekabuddhānaṃ candapabhāsadiso, sammāsambuddhānaṃ rasmisahassapaṭimaṇḍitasaradasūriyamaṇḍalasadiso upaṭṭhāsi. Tathā sukkhavipassakānaṃ vipassanācāro andhānaṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā gamanasadiso, lokiyābhiññappattapakatisāvakānaṃ daṇḍakasetugamanasadiso, mahāsāvakānaṃ jaṅghasetugamanasadiso, aggasāvakānaṃ sakaṭasetugamanasadiso, paccekabuddhānaṃ mahājaṅghamaggagamanasadiso, sammāsambuddhānaṃ mahāsakamaggagamanasadisoti veditabbo.

[03]^b^Arahattañca kira patvā^eb^ti ettha ^b^kira^eb^-saddo anussavaladdhoyamatthoti dīpetuṃ vutto. ^b^Patvā aññāsi^eb^ attano vipassanācārassa mahāvisayattā tikkhavisadasūrabhāvassa ca sallakkhaṇena. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ mahāthero dandhaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇanto sīghaṃ arahattaṃ pattato paññāya attānaṃ sātisayaṃ katvā aññāsīti āha – ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Mahājaṭa^eb^nti mahājālasākhaṃ ativiya sibbitajālaṃ. ^b^Yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhati^eb^ veṇuggahaṇe anuccinitvā veṇussa gahitattā. ^b^Evaṃsampada^eb^nti yathā tesu purisesu eko veḷuggahaṇe anuccinitvā veḷuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti, eko uccinitvā, evaṃ nipphattikaṃ. ^b^Padhāna^eb^nti bhāvanānuyuñjanaṃ.

[03]^b^Sattasaṭṭhi^eb^^a^V2.0062^ea^^b^ñāṇānī^eb^ti paṭisambhidāmagge (paṭi. ma. 1.73 mātikā) āgatesu tesattatiyā ñāṇesu ṭhapetvā cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sutamayañāṇādīni paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāñāṇapariyosānāni sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni. Tāni hi sāvakehi pavicitabbāni, na itarāni. ^b^Soḷasavidhaṃ pañña^eb^nti (saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 3.5.379; saṃ. ni. ṭī. 3.5.379) mahāpaññādikā, navānupubbavihārasamāpattipaññāti idaṃ soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ.
[03]^b^Tatrā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0277^ea^ tassa. ^b^Idaṃ hotī^eb^ti idaṃ dāni vuccamānaṃ anupubbasammasanaṃ hoti. ^b^Vipassanākoṭṭhāsa^eb^nti vitakkādisammasitabbadhammavibhāgena vibhattavipassanābhāgaṃ.

[03]^b^94^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭhame jhāne^eb^ti upasilese bhummaṃ, tasmā ^b^ye paṭhame jhāne dhammā^eb^ti ye paṭhamajjhānasaṃsaṭṭhā dhammāti attho. ^b^Antosamāpattiya^eb^nti ca samāpattisahagate cittuppāde samāpattisamaññaṃ āropetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Vavatthitā^eb^ti katavavatthanā nicchitā. ^b^Paricchinnā^eb^ti ñāṇena paricchinnā salakkhaṇato paricchijja ñātā. ^b^Olokento^eb^ti ñāṇacakkhunā paccakkhato passanto. ^b^Abhiniropanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇe cittassa āropanaṃ. ^b^Anumajjanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇe cittassa anuvicāraṇaṃ. ^b^Pharaṇaṃ^eb^ paṇītarūpehi kāyassa byāpanaṃ, vipphārikabhāvo vā. ^b^Sāta^eb^nti sātamadhuratā. ^b^Adhikkhepo^eb^ vikkhepassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ samādhānaṃ. ^b^Phusanaṃ^eb^ indriyavisayaviññāṇassa tato uppajjitvā ārammaṇe phusanākārena viya pavatti. ^b^Vedayitaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇānubhavanaṃ. ^b^Sañjānanaṃ^eb^ nīlādivasena ārammaṇassa sallakkhaṇaṃ. ^b^Cetayitaṃ^eb^ cetaso byāpāro. ^b^Vijānanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇūpaladdhi. ^b^Kattukamyatā^eb^ cittassa ārammaṇena atthikatā. Tasmiṃ ārammaṇe adhimuccanaṃ, sanniṭṭhānaṃ vā ^b^adhimokkho^eb^. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā cittassa paggaṇhanaṃ ^b^paggāho,^eb^ adhiggahoti attho. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Samappavattesu assesu sārathi viya sakiccapasutesu sampayuttesu ajjhupekkhanaṃ ^b^majjhattatā^eb^. Sampayuttadhammānaṃ ārammaṇe anunayanaṃ saṃcaraṇaṃ ^b^anunayo. Sabhāvato^eb^ti yathābhūtasabhāvato. Soḷasannaṃ eva cettha dhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tesaṃyeva therena vavatthāpitabhāvato, te evassa tadā upaṭṭhahiṃsu, na itareti vadanti. Vīriyasatiggahaṇena cettha indriyabhāvasāmaññato saddhāpaññā; satiggahaṇeneva ekantānavajjabhāvasāmaññato passaddhiādayo cha yugaḷā; alobhādosā ca saṅgahitā jhānacittuppādapariyāpannattā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ. Therena ca dhammā vavatthānasāmaññato āraddhā. Te na upaṭṭhahiṃsūti na sakkā vattunti apare.

[03]^b^Viditā uppajjantī^eb^ti uppādepi nesaṃ vedanānaṃ pajānanaṃ hotiyevāti attho. Sesapadadvayepi ^a^V2.0063^ea^ eseva nayo. Taṃ jānātīti taṃñāṇo, tassa ^a^M2.0278^ea^ bhāvo ^b^taṃñāṇatā,^eb^ ñāṇassa attasaṃvedananti attho. Taṃsamānayogakkhamāhi sampayuttadhammā. ^b^Ñāṇabahutā^eb^ti ñāṇassa bahubhāvo, ekacittuppāde anekañāṇatāti attho. Idāni tamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ, ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na sakkā jānituṃ^eb^ ārammaṇakaraṇassa abhāvato. Asammohāvabodho ca īdisassa ñāṇassa natthi. ^b^Ekekameva^eb^ ñāṇaṃ ^b^uppajjati^eb^ tasmiṃ khaṇe ekasseva āvajjanassa uppajjanato, na ca āvajjanena vinā cittuppatti atthi. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Cullāsītisahassāni, kappā tiṭṭhanti ye marū;
[22]Na tveva tepi jīvanti, dvīhi cittehi saṃyutā’’ti. (mahāni. 10, 39) ca,
[08]‘‘Natthi citte yugā gahī’’ti ca –

[03]^b^Vatthārammaṇānaṃ pariggahitatāyā^eb^ti yasmiñca ārammaṇe ye jhānadhammā pavattanti, tesaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ pageva ñāṇena paricchijja gahitattā. Yathā nāma migasūkarādīnaṃ āsayepariggahite tatra ṭhitā migā vā sūkarā vā tato uṭṭhānatopi āgamanatopi nesādassa sukhaggahaṇā honti, evaṃsampadamidaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘therena hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti vatthārammaṇānaṃ pariggahitabhāvena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti therassa. ^b^Tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti jhānacittuppādapariyāpannānaṃ dhammānaṃ. ^b^Uppādaṃ āvajjantassā^eb^tiādinā uppādādīsu yaṃ yadeva ārabbha ñāṇaṃ uppajjati; tasmiṃ tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa tasseva cassa pākaṭabhāvo dīpito. Na hi āvajjanena vinā ñāṇaṃ uppajjati. ^b^Ahutvā sambhontī^eb^ti pubbe avijjamānā hutvā sambhavanti, anuppannā uppajjantīti attho. ^b^Udayaṃ passati^eb^ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ, ‘‘ahutvā sambhontī’’ti uppādakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvadassanato. Pubbe abhāvabodhako hi attalābho dhammānaṃ udayo. ^b^Hutvā^eb^ti uppajjitvā. ^b^Paṭiventī^eb^ti paṭi khaṇe khaṇe vinassanti. ^b^Vayaṃ passati,^eb^ ‘‘hutvā paṭiventī’’ti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇasamaṅgibhāvadassanato. Viddhaṃsabhāvabodhako hi dhammānaṃ vijjamānato vayo.

[03]Tesu dhammesu natthi etassa upayo rāgavasena upagamananti ^b^anupayo,^eb^ ananurodho. Hutvā viharatīti yojanā. Tathā natthi etassa apāyo paṭighavasena apagamananti ^b^anapāyo,^eb^ avirodho. ‘‘Etaṃ mama, ^a^M2.0279^ea^ eso me atthā’’ti tassa taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinivesābhāvato taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi ^a^V2.0064^ea^^b^anissito. Appaṭibaddho^eb^ti anupayānissitabhāvato vipassanāya paribandhavasena chandarāgena na paṭibaddho na vibandhito. ^b^Vippamutto^eb^ti tato eva vikkhambhanavimuttivasena kāmarāgato vimutto. ^b^Visaṃyutto^eb^ vikkhambhanavaseneva paṭipakkhadhammehi visaṃyutto.

[03]^b^Kilesamariyādā tena katā bhaveyyā^eb^ti antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte soḷasa dhamme ārabbha pavattamānaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ bhinditvā sace rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ; tassa vipassanāvīthiyā kilesamariyādā tena cittena, cittasamaṅginā vā katā bhaveyya. ^b^Tesū^eb^ti tesu dhammesu. ^b^Assā^eb^ti therassa. ^b^Ekopī^eb^ti rāgādīsu ekopīti ca vadanti. Vuttākārena ekaccānaṃ anāpāthagamane sati vipassanā na tesu dhammesu nirantarappavattāti ^b^ārammaṇamariyādā bhaveyya. Vikkhambhitapaccanīkattā^eb^ti vipassanāya paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ pageva vikkhambhitattā idānipi vikkhambhetabbā kilesā natthīti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ito^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānato. ^b^Anantaro^eb^ti uparimo jhānādiviseso. ^b^Tassa pajānanassā^eb^ti, ‘‘atthi uttari nissaraṇa’’nti evaṃ pavattajānanassa. ^b^Bahulīkaraṇenā^eb^ti punappunaṃ uppādanena.
[03]^b^Sampasādanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti kilesakālusiyāpagamanena, tassa vicārakkhobhavigamena vā cetaso sammadeva pāsādikabhāvena.

[03]Vīriyaṃ sati upekkhāti āgataṭṭhāne pārisuddhiupekkhā, adukkhamasukhāvedanāti ettha jhānupekkhāti, ^b^‘‘sukhaṭṭhāne vedanupekkhāvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sukhaṭṭhāne^eb^ti ca paṭhamajjhānādīsu sukhassa vuttaṭṭhāne. ^b^Passaddhattā^eb^ti samadhuracetayitabhāvena ārammaṇe visaṭavitthatabhāvato yo so cetaso ābhogo vutto. Sāmaññaphalādīsu satiyā pārisuddhi, sā thana atthato sativinimuttā natthīti āha ^b^‘‘parisuddhāsatiyevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pārisuddhiupekkhā,^eb^ na jhānupekkhādayo.

[03]^b^95^eb^^b^.^eb^ Īdisesu ṭhānesu satiyā na kadācipi ñāṇaviraho atthīti āha – ^b^‘‘ñāṇena sampajāno hutvā’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi tatiyajjhāne, ‘‘satimā sukhavihārī’’ti ettha sampajānoti ayamattho vutto eva hoti ^a^M2.0280^ea^. ^b^Na sāvakānaṃ anupadadhammavipassanā hoti^eb^ saṅkhārāvasesasukhumappavattiyā duviññeyyattā vinibbhujitvā gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘kalāpavipassanaṃ dassento evamāhā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^96^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paññāya^eb^^a^V2.0065^ea^^b^cassadisvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī^eb^ti dassanasamakālaṃ khīyamānā āsavā, ‘‘disvā parikkhīṇā hontī’’ti vuttā. Samānakālepi hi ediso saddappayogo dissati –
[03]‘‘Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’’nti (ma. ni. 1.204, 400; 3.421, 425, 426; saṃ. ni. 2.43-45; 2.4.60; kathā. 465, 467).
[21]‘‘Nihantvā timiraṃ sabbaṃ, uggatejo samuggato;
[22]Verocano rasmimālī, lokacakkhupabhaṅkaro’’ti. (paṭṭhā. anuṭī. 1.25-34; visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.580) ca –

[03]Evamādīsu. Hetuattho vā ayaṃ ^b^disvā^eb^saddo asamānakattuko yathā – ‘‘ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī’’ti (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.802). Dassanahetuko hi āsavānaṃ parikkhayo pariññāsacchikiriyābhāvanābhisamaye sati pahānābhisamayassa labbhanato. ^b^Yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha jhānadhamme sammasanto samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāveti. Evaṃ yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha sammasanto samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ katvā yathā thero arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘arahattaṃ pattavāro idha gahito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte. Dīghanakhasuttadesanāya (ma. ni. 2.205-206) hi thero arahattaṃ patto. Tadā ca anāgāmī hutvā nirodhaṃ samāpajjatīti vacanāvasaro natthi, tasmā vuttaṃ – ‘‘arahattaṃ pattavāro idha gahito’’ti. Yadi evaṃ – ‘‘sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharatī’’ti idaṃ kasmā vuttanti? There vijjamāne paṇḍitaguṇe anavasesato dassetvā arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetuṃ. Nirodhasamāpajjanaṃ pana therassa āciṇṇasamāciṇṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nirodhaṃ pana…pe… vadantī’’^eb^ti. Tena phalasamāpattimpi antarā samāpajjatiyevāti dasseti.

[03]Vomissaṃ ^a^M2.0281^ea^ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘tatthassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ‘‘nirodhaṃ samāpajjissāmī’’ti ābhogena samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā ṭhitassa ^b^nirodhasamāpatti sīsaṃ^eb^ nāma hoti, tassa ābhogavasena ^b^nirodhassa vāro āgacchati. Phalasamāpatti gūḷho hoti,^eb^ ‘‘phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjissāmī’’ti ābhogassa abhāvato. ^b^Phalasamāpatti sīsaṃ hotī^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayena attho ^a^V2.0066^ea^ veditabbo. Etena ābhogapaṭibaddhametesaṃ āgamananti dīpitanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Jambudīpavāsino therā panā^eb^tiādi aṭṭhakathāruḷhameva taṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Antosamāpattiya^eb^nti nirodhaṃ samāpannakāle. ^b^Tisamuṭṭhānikarūpadhamme^eb^ti utukammāhāravasena tisamuṭṭhānikarūpadhamme.

[03]^b^97^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ciṇṇavasita^eb^nti paṭipakkhadūribhāvena subhāvitavasībhāvaṃ. ^b^Nipphattiṃ patto^eb^ti ukkaṃsaparinipphattiṃ patto. Ure vāyāmajanitāya ^b^oraso. Pabhāvita^eb^nti uppāditaṃ. ^b^Dhammenā^eb^ti ariyamaggadhammena. Tassa hi adhigamena ariyāya jātiyā jāto nibbattoti katvā, ^b^‘‘dhammajo dhammanimmito’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Dhammadāyassā^eb^ti navavidhassa lokuttaradhammadāyassa. ^b^Ādiyanato^eb^ti gaṇhanato, sasantāne uppādanatoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Anupadasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^98^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Khīṇā^eb^^a^V2.0067^ea^^b^jātī^eb^ti attano jātikkhayaṃ paṭijānantena arahattaṃ byākataṃ hoti arahato tadabhāvato. Tathā ^b^vusitaṃ brahmacariya^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyavāso me pariyositoti paṭijānantenapi. ^b^Kataṃ karaṇīya^eb^nti catūhi maggehi catūsu saccesu pariññādivasena soḷasavidhassapi kiccassa attanā niṭṭhāpitabhāvaṃ paṭijānantenapi. ^b^Nāparaṃ itthattāyā^eb^ti āyatiṃ punabbhavābhāvaṃ, āyatiṃ vā pariññādikaraṇīyābhāvaṃ paṭijānantenapīti āha – ^b^‘‘ekenapi padena aññā byākatāva hotī’’^eb^ti. Dvikkhattuṃ baddhaṃ pana subaddhaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ. ^b^Idha pana aññābyākaraṇaṃ catūhi padehi āgataṃ,^eb^ tasmā vattabbameva cettha natthīti ^a^M2.0282^ea^ adhippāyo. ^b^Cetanāya diṭṭhavāditā nāma^eb^ ariyavohāro. ^b^Sabhāvo^eb^ti pakatiattho hi ayaṃ dhammasaddo, ‘‘jātidhammā jarādhammā’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.274-275) viya tasmā, ^b^anudhammo^eb^ti ariyabhāvaṃ anugatā pakatīti attho. Paramappicchatāya ariyā attano guṇe anāvikarontāpi sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvapavedanatthañceva sabrahmacārīnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ ussāhajananatthañca tādisānaṃ parinibbānasamayeyeva āvikarontīti adhippāyenāha – ^b^‘‘parinibbutassa…pe… kātabbo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^99^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dubbala^eb^nti pheggu viya subhejjanīyaṃ balavirahitaṃ, asāranti attho. ^b^Virāguta^eb^nti palujjanasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Vigacchanasabhāva^eb^nti vināsagamanasabhāvaṃ. Aniccadukkhavipariṇāmattā assāsalesassapi abhāvato ^b^assāsavirahitaṃ^eb^. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena samannāgamanavasena ca yathārahaṃ upenti upagacchantīti ^b^upayā,^eb^ ‘‘etaṃ mama, eso me attā’’ti upādiyanti daḷhaggāhaṃ gaṇhantīti ^b^upādānā^eb^. Adhitiṭṭhati cetaso abhinandanabhūtāti ^b^cetaso adhiṭṭhānaṃ. Tāhī^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi. ^b^Ta^eb^nti cittaṃ. ^b^Abhinivisatī^eb^ti abhirativasena nivisati, ayañhettha attho – sakkāyadhammesu cittaṃ abhinivisati ‘‘etaṃ mamaṃ, eso me attā’’ti ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati etāhi abhinivesāhi, tathā sakkāyadhammesu cittaṃ anuseti etāhīti ^b^anusayā,^eb^ taṇhādiṭṭhiyo. Yadaggena hi tebhūmakadhammesu rāgādayo anusenti, tadaggena taṃsahagatadhammā tattha anusentīti pariyāyena, ^b^‘‘taṃ anusetī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Khayā virāgā^eb^ti hetumhi nissakkavacananti ^b^‘‘khayena virāgenā’’^eb^ti hetumhi karaṇavasena attho vutto. ^b^Virāgenā^eb^ti ca ^b^iti^eb^saddo ādi attho ^a^V2.0068^ea^. Tena ‘‘nirodhenā’’ti evamādikaṃ gahitaṃ hoti. ^b^Aññamaññavevacanāneva^eb^ upayādīnaṃ samucchedasseva bodhanato.

[03]^b^100^eb^^b^.^eb^ Patiṭṭhāti ettha sesabhūtattayaṃ upādārūpañcāti patiṭṭhānā, nijjīvaṭṭhena dhātucāti ^b^patiṭṭhānadhātu^eb^. Nhānīyacuṇṇaṃ bāhiraudakaṃ viya sesabhūtattayaṃ ābandhatīti ^b^ābandhanaṃ^eb^. Pacanīyabhattaṃ bāhiratejo viya sesabhūtattayaṃ paripācetīti ^b^paripācanaṃ^eb^. Bāhiravāto viya sesabhūtattayaṃ vitthambhetīti ^b^vitthambhanaṃ^eb^. Dhātusaddattho vuttoyeva. ^b^Asamphuṭṭhadhātū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0283^ea^ asamphusitabhāvo tesaṃ viparimaṭṭhatābhāvato. ^b^Vijānanaṃ^eb^ ārammaṇūpaladdhi. ^b^Ahaṃ attā^eb^ti ahaṃ, ‘‘rūpadhammo me attā’’ti ^b^attakoṭṭhāsena^eb^ attabhāvena ^b^na upagamiṃ^eb^ na gaṇhiṃ. Nissitanissitāpi nissitā eva nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘pathavīdhātunissitāvā’’^eb^ti. Attanā vā pana tannissitāti ^b^‘‘ekena pariyāyenā’’^eb^ti. Upādārupampi kāmaṃ nissitampi hoti. Tathāpi taṃ nissitaṃ hotiyevāti taṃ na uddhaṭaṃ. Paricchedakarattā paricchedākāsassa ^b^‘‘avinibbhogavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tena ca tathā paricchinnattā ^b^sabbampi bhūtupādārūpaṃ ākāsadhātunissitaṃ nāma^eb^. Taṃ nissāya pavattiyā upādārūpaṃ viya bhūtarūpāni, arūpakkhandhā viya ca vatthurūpāni, ^b^‘‘taṃnissitarūpavatthukā arūpakkhandhā’’^eb^ti vuttanayena ākāsadhātunissitacakkhādirūpadhammavatthukā vedanādayo arūpakkhandhā ākāsadhātunissitā nāmāti imamatthaṃ ^b^tathā^eb^-saddena upasaṃharati. ^b^Idhāpī^eb^ti ākāsadhātunissitapadepi, na pathavīdhātunissitapadādīsu eva. ^b^Rūpārūpa^eb^nti sabbampi rūpārūpaṃ ^b^gahitameva hoti,^eb^ aggahitaṃ natthi. ^b^Sahajātā…pe… nissita^eb^nti idaṃ nippariyāyasiddhaṃ nissayattaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. Heṭṭhā vuttanayena pariyāyasiddhe nissayatte gayhamāne – ‘‘pacchājātapaccayoti pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.11) vacanato sabbaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ, ^b^‘‘viññāṇadhātunissita’’^eb^nti vattabbaṃ. Tathā anantaraviññāṇadhātupaccayā pavattanato, ‘‘viññāṇadhātunissita’’nti vattabbaṃ.

[03]^b^101^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ruppati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti ^b^rūpa^eb^nti ayamattho cakkhudvāre āpāthagate rūpāyatane nippariyāyato labbhati, na āpāthamanāgate. Cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbabhāvo pana āpāthamanāgatepi tasmiṃ labbhateva taṃsabhāvānativatthanato. Rūpāyatanaṃ ^b^dvidhā^eb^ vibhajitvā. Thero pana āpāthaṃ anāgatassāpi rūpāyatanassa rūpabhāvaṃ na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti dvidhākaraṇaṃ nānujānanto channovādaṃ nidasseti, ^b^‘‘upari channovāde kinti karissathā’’^eb^ti. Tattha hi ‘‘cakkhuṃ, āvuso channa, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbe ^a^V2.0069^ea^ dhamme’’ti (ma. ni. 3.391) āgataṃ, na cettha cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgatameva rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbapadena gahitaṃ, na āpāthaṃ anāgatanti sakkā viññātuṃ ^a^M2.0284^ea^ aviseseneva rūpāyatanena taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhābhāvassa jotitattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na yidaṃ labbhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rūpamevā^eb^ti rūpāyatanameva. Yadi evaṃ ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesū’’ti padaṃ kathaṃ netabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ viññātabbesū^eb^ti yena manoviññāṇena cakkhuviññāṇaṃ aniccantiādinā cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ tena viññātabbesu taṃsampayuttadhammesūti attho. ^b^Taṇhāchando^eb^ti tassanasabhāvo chando, na kattukamyatā chandoyevāti taṇhāchando. ^b^Rajjanavasenā^eb^ti vatthaṃ viya raṅgajātaṃ cittassa anurañjanavasena. ^b^Abhinandanavasenā^eb^ti ārammaṇe abhiramitvā nandanavasena. Sappītikataṇhā hi ^b^nandī^eb^ti vuccati. Taṇhāyanavasena ^b^taṇhā^eb^.

[03]^b^102^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ahaṅkāro^eb^ti ‘‘seyyohamasmī’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 1121, 1239; vibha. 832, 866; saṃ. ni. 4.108; mahāni. 21, 178) ahaṃkaraṇaṃ. Yena hi mamaṃ karoti, etaṃ ^b^mamaṅkāro. Svevā^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṅkāro’’ti vuttamāno. Evaṃ catutthajjhāne niddiṭṭhe sabbāsu lokiyābhiññāsu vuccamānāsu heṭṭhā vijjādvayaṃ vattabbanti adhippāyena, ^b^‘‘pubbenivāsaṃ dibbacakkhuñca avatvā kasmā vutta’’^eb^nti āha? Itaro idha sabbavāresupi lokuttaradhammapucchā adhikatā tasmā ‘‘so evaṃ samāhite’’tiādinā tatiyā vijjā kathitāti dassento, ^b^‘‘bhikkhū lokiyadhammaṃ na pucchantī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Ekavissajjitasuttaṃ nāmetaṃ^eb^ tatiyavijjāya eva āgatattā. Ariyadhammavasenapissa samaññā atthevāti dassento, ^b^‘‘chabbisodhanantipissa nāma’’^eb^nti vatvā tesu dhammesu bhedaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘ettha hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Visuddhā^eb^ti tassā codanāya sodhanavasena visodhitā. ^b^Ekameva katvā^eb^ti ekavāravaseneva pāḷiyaṃ ekajjhaṃ āgatattā ekameva koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ vā chabbisodhanatāti āha – ^b^‘‘catūhi āhārehi saddhi’’^eb^nti kathaṃ panettha cattāro āhārā gahetabbāti? Keci tāva āhu – ‘‘sādhūti bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttari pañho pucchitabbo’’ti heṭṭhā āgatena nayena āhāravāro āharitvā vattabboti. ‘‘Bahiddhā sabbanimittesū’’ti ettha āhārānampi saṅgahitattā āhārā atthato āgatā evāti aññe. Apare pana rūpakkhandhaggahaṇena kabaḷīkāro āhāro ^a^M2.0285^ea^, saṅkhārakkhandhaggahaṇena phassāhāro, manosañcetanāhāraggahaṇena viññāṇāhāro sarūpatopi gahitoti vadanti.

[03]‘‘Chabbisodhana’’nti imassa suttassa samaññāya anvatthataṃ dassetvā āyatimpi tādisena byākaraṇena ^a^V2.0070^ea^ bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipattimpi dassanatthaṃ, ^b^‘‘ime panā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Vinayaniddesapariyāyenā^eb^ti vinayaniddese āgatena kāraṇena. ^b^Vinaye^eb^ vā āgataniddesānukkamena.
[03]Adhigantabbato ^b^adhigamo,^eb^ jhānādiadhigamapucchā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘jhānavimokkhādīsū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Upāyapucchā^eb^ti adhigamopāyapucchā. ^b^Kintī^eb^ti kena pakārena vidhināti attho.

[03]^b^Katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī^eb^ti idaṃ pana pubbe ‘‘kiṃ te adhigata’’nti aniddhāritabhedā jhānādivisesā pucchitāti idāni tesaṃ niddhāretvā pucchanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā yathāvuttehi ākārehi adhigamabyākaraṇaṃ sodhetabbaṃ, tasmā. ^b^Ettāvatāvā^eb^ti ettakena byākaraṇamatteneva na sakkāro kātabbo. Byākaraṇañhi ekaccassa ayāthāvatopi hoti, yathā nāma jātarūpapatirūpaṃ jātarūpaṃ viya khāyatīti jātarūpaṃ nighaṃsanatāpanachedanehi sodhetabbaṃ evamevaṃ ^b^imesu^eb^ idāneva vuttesu ^b^chasu ṭhānesu^eb^ pakkhipitvā ^b^sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo vimokkhādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samādhi-samāpatti-ñāṇadassana-maggabhāvanā-phalasacchikiriyā saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Pākaṭo hoti^eb^ adhigatavisesassa satisammosābhāvato. Sesapucchāsupi ‘‘pākaṭo hotī’’ti pade eseva nayo. ^b^Uggahaparipucchākusalā^eb^ti sajjhāyamaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu nipuṇā. Yāya paṭipadāya yassa ariyamaggo āgacchati, sā pubbabhāgapaṭipatti ^b^āgamanapaṭipadā. Sodhetabbā^eb^ti suddhā udāhu asuddhāti vicāraṇavasena sodhetabbā. ^b^Na sujjhatī^eb^ti tattha tattha pamādapaṭipattibhāvato. ^b^Apanetabbo^eb^ attano paṭiññāya. ^b^‘‘Sujjhatī’’^eb^ti vatvā sujjhanākāraṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘dīgharatta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Paññāyatī^eb^ti ettha ‘‘yadī’’ti padaṃ ānetvā yadi so bhikkhu tāya paṭipadāya yadi paññāyatīti sambandho. ^b^Khīṇāsavapaṭipattisadisā paṭipadā hoti^eb^ dīgharattaṃ vikkhambhitakilesattā.
[03]Nadiyā ^a^M2.0286^ea^ samuddaṃ pakkhandanaṭṭhānaṃ ^b^nadīmukhadvāraṃ. Maddamāno^eb^ti badarasāḷavaṃ sarasaṃ patte pakkhitto hutvā maddamāno. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Chabbisodhanasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^105^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sappurisadhamma^eb^nti ^a^V2.0071^ea^ sappurisabhāvakaraṃ dhammaṃ. So pana yasmā sappurisānaṃ paveṇiko dhammo hoti. Tasmā āha – ^b^‘‘sappurisānaṃ dhamma’’^eb^nti, esa nayo ^b^asappurisadhamma^eb^nti etthāpi. Evaṃ padhānaṃ anuṭṭhātabbañca sappurisadhammaṃ ādiṃ katvā mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā ayathānupubbiyā niddisanto ^b^‘‘katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammo’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tathā pana niddisanto udāharaṇapubbakaṃ hetuṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena icchitabbapariccāgapubbakaṃ gahetabbaggahaṇaṃ nāma ñāyapaṭipatti, tasmā sappurisadhammā sampādetabbāti dīpento satthā ayathānupubbiyā niddhārīyatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Tathā aññatthāpi ‘‘asevanā ca bālānaṃ, paṇḍitānañca sevanā’’ti. ^b^Etadeva hi kuladvayaṃ ‘‘uccakula’’nti vuccati^eb^ nippariyāyato. Tathāhi antimabhavikā bodhisattā tattheva paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti. ^b^So^eb^ti sāmīcippaṭipanno bhikkhu. ^b^Antaraṃ karitvā^eb^ti taṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā. Paṭipadā hi viññūnaṃ pūjāya kāraṇaṃ, na uccakulīnatā. ^b^Mahākulā^eb^ti vipulakulā upāditoditakulasampavattikāti attho.

[03]^b^106^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yasa^eb^saddo parivāravācako. ^b^Yasassī^eb^ti ca sātisayaparivāravantatā vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘parivārasampanno’’^eb^ti. Ādhipateyyābhāvato paresaṃ uparinatti etesaṃ īso īsanaṃ issariyanti akkhātabbāti ^b^appesakkhā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appaparivārā’’^eb^ti. Abhāvattho hi idha ^b^appa^eb^-saddo.

[03]^b^107^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Naveva dhutaṅgāni āgatānī^eb^ti ettha yathā ukkaṭṭhapaṃsukūlikassa tecīvarikatā sukarā. Evaṃ ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātikassa sapadānacārikatā sukarā. Ekāsanikassa ca pattapiṇḍikakhalupacchābhattikatā sukarā evāti – ‘‘paṃsukūliko hotī’’tiādivacaneneva pāḷiyā anāgatānampi āgatabhāvo veditabbo pariharaṇasukaratāya tesampi samādānasambhavato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘terasa hontī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^108^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmataṇhādikāya ^a^V2.0072^ea^^a^M2.0287^ea^ tāya taṇhāya nibbattāti tammayā, puthujjanā, pakatibhāvūpagamanena tesaṃ bhāvo tammayatā, tappaṭikkhepato ^b^atammayatā,^eb^ nittaṇhatā. ^b^Taṃyeva kāraṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānepi taṇhāpahānaṃyeva kāraṇaṃ katvā. ^b^Citte uppādetvā^eb^ti atammayatāpariyāyena vutte taṇhāya paṭipakkhadhamme sampādetvā. ^b^Na maññatī^eb^ti maññanānaṃ ariyamaggena sabbaso samucchinnattā kismiñci okāse kāmabhavādike kenaci vatthunā hatthiassakhettavatthādinā pattacīvaravihārapariveṇādinā ca puggalaṃ na maññati. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Sappurisadhammasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^109^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññamañña^eb^nti ^a^V2.0073^ea^ aññaṃ aññaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññaṃ sevitabba’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Sattahi padehī^eb^ti sattahi vākyehi. Pajjati etena yathādhippeto atthoti padaṃ, vākyaṃ. ^b^Sāriputtattherassa okāsakaraṇaṃ^eb^ dhammadāyāde (ma. ni. 1.31) vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^113^eb^^b^.^eb^ Diṭṭhiyeva paccayavasena paṭiladdhatāya ^b^diṭṭhipaṭilābho. Saññāpaṭilābhepi^eb^ eseva nayo. ^b^Micchādiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhiyo…pe… na gahitā^eb^ kammapathappattānaṃ tesaṃ manosamācārabhāvena gahitattā. Yadi evaṃ kasmā diṭṭhi cittuppādavāre na gahitāti? Kāmaṃ micchādiṭṭhiyā avayavibhāvo labbhati, tathāpi cittuppādakkhaṇe lokiyalokuttaracittuppādesu kammapathakoṭṭhāso na uddhaṭo.

[03]^b^115^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāmasaññādīna^eb^nti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yathā byāpādavihiṃsāsaññā saṅgahitā, evaṃ anabhijjhāabyāpādāvihiṃsāsaññā saṅgahitā paṭhamena ādisaddena ‘‘anabhijjhāsahagatāya saññāyā’’tiādipāṭhassa saṅgahitattā.

[03]^b^117^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ti kāmabhavādīnaṃ apariyosānāya pariyosānaṃ icchatopi tādisassa bhavānaṃ apariyosānameva hoti ^a^M2.0288^ea^. ^b^Cattāro honti^eb^ puggalavasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puthujjanopi hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Akusalā dhammā vaḍḍhantī^eb^ti tesaṃ pahānāya appaṭipajjamānassāti adhippāyo, tato eva ^b^kusalā dhammā parihāyanti^eb^. Tenassa kilesadukkhena vipākadukkhena ca ^b^sadukkhameva attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti^eb^. Orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni pahāya suddhāvāsesu nibbattanāraho ^b^anāgāmī kathaṃ…pe… abhivaḍḍhantī^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘anāgāmīpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sadukkhameva attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti,^eb^ yāya labbhamānākusalābhivuddhiṃ kusalaparihāniñca gahetvā anāgāminopi sabyābajjhāttabhāvābhinibbattanaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ yathālabbhamānaṃ akusalaparihāniṃ kusalābhivuddhiñca gahetvā puthujjanassapi antimabhavikassa abyābajjhāttabhāvābhinibbattanaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puthujjanopī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Akusalameva hāyati,^eb^na kusalaṃ tassa buddhipakkhe ṭhitattā. Tatthāpi ^b^vipassanameva gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti,^eb^ na vaṭṭagabbhaṃ antimabhavikatāya vivaṭṭūpanissitattā ajjhāsayassa, ñāṇassa ca pākagamanato.

[03]^b^119^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaccassā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0074^ea^ sāmivacanaṃ ‘‘abhinandatī’’tiādīsu paccattavasena pariṇāmetabbaṃ, tathā ‘‘nibbindatī’’tiādīsupi. ^b^Uggaṇhitvāpī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo luttaniddiṭṭho. Bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṃ ajānantā tāva dīgharattaṃ hitasukhato paribāhirā hontu jānantānampi sabbesaṃ dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotīti anekaṃsikataṃ codento ^b^‘‘evaṃ santepī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Itaro sabbesampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotiyevāti, ^b^‘‘appaṭisandhikā’’^eb^tiādinā anekaṃsikataṃ pariharati. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Sevitabbāsevitabbasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^124^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhaya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0075^ea^ (a. ni. ṭī. 2.3.1) cittasaṃsappatāti āha ^b^‘‘cittutrāso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upaddavo^eb^ti antarāyo. Tassa pana vikkhepakāraṇattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anekaggatākāro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upasaggo^eb^ti upasajjanaṃ. Tato appatīkāravighātāpatti ^a^M2.0289^ea^ yasmā patīkārābhāvena vihaññamānassa kiñci kātuṃ asamatthassa osīdanakāraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘tattha tattha lagganākāro’’^eb^ti. Vañcetvā āgantuṃ ^b^yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesu^eb^. Bahi anikkhamanatthāya ^b^dvāre aggiṃ datvā^eb^.

[03]^b^Naḷehī^eb^ti naḷacchannasaṅkhepena upari chādetvā tehiyeva dārukacchadananiyāmena paritopi chāditā. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā tiṇehi channataṃ, sesasambhārānaṃ rukkhamayatañca atidisati. ^b^Vidhavāputte^eb^ti adantabhāvopalakkhaṇaṃ. Te hi nippitikā avinītā asaṃyatā akiccakārino honti.

[03]^b^Matthakaṃ apāpetvāva niṭṭhāpitā^eb^ti kasmā bhagavā evamakāsīti? Ānandattherassa pucchākosalladīpanatthameva, tattha nisinnānaṃ sannipatitabhikkhūnaṃ desanāya jānanatthañca. Te kira saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ ajānantā andhakāraṃ paviṭṭhā viya ṭhitā. Pucchānusandhivasena pariggayha jānissantīti.

[03]^b^125^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rūpapariggahova kathito,^eb^ na aññaṃ kiñcīti attho. Idāni tato saccāni niddhāretvā catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘sabbāpī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pañcakkhandhā hontī^eb^ti addhekādasa dhātuyo rūpakkhandho, addhaṭṭhamā dhātuyo yathārahaṃ vedanādayo cattāro arūpino khandhāti evaṃ aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo pañcakkhandhā honti. ^b^Pañcapi khandhā^eb^ taṇhāvajjā ^b^dukkhasaccaṃ. Appavattī^eb^ti appavattinimittaṃ. ^b^Nirodhapajānanā^eb^ti paññāsīsena maggakiccamāha. Sammādiṭṭhipamukho hi ariyamaggo. ^b^Matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti^eb^ sammasanassa bhūmiyā nipphattiyā ca kathitattā. ^b^Jānāti passatī^eb^ti iminā ñāṇadassanaṃ kathitaṃ taṃ pana lokiyaṃ lokuttaranti duvidhanti tadubhayampi dassento āha – ^b^‘‘saha vipassanāya maggo vutto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ettāvatāpi kho^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddaggahaṇena aññena pariyāyena satthā dhātukosallaṃ desetukāmoti thero ^a^V2.0076^ea^, ‘‘siyā pana, bhante’’ti pucchatīti bhagavā pathavīdhātuādivasenapi dhātukosallaṃ vibhāveti. Tattha pathavīdhātuādisaddena desanākāraṇaṃ vibhāvento, ^b^‘‘pathavīdhātu…pe… vuttā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tāpi^eb^ hi ādito cha dhātuyo. ^b^‘‘Viññāṇadhātuto^eb^^a^M2.0290^ea^^b^nīharitvā pūretabbā’’^eb^ti vatvā kathaṃ rūpadhātuyo nīharīyantīti codanaṃ sandhāya taṃ nayaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘viññāṇadhātū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbadhātupathavīdhātu ādivasena desanāruḷameva, kāyadhātu pana nīharitabbāti ekaṃsameva nīharaṇavidhiṃ dassento, ^b^‘‘esa nayo sabbatthā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Purimapacchimavasena manodhātū^eb^ti pacchimabhāgavasena kiriyāmanodhātu gahetabbā tassānurūpabhāvato. Nanu cettha manodhātu nāmāyaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuyā asaṃsaṭṭhā, visuṃyeva cesā dhātūti? Saccametaṃ aṭṭhārasadhātudesanāya, cittavibhattiniddese chaviññāṇakāyadesanāyaṃ pana sā manoviññāṇakāyasaṅgahitāvāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yaṃ panettha vattabbaṃ taṃ ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.517) vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. Atha vā ^b^purimapacchimavasenā^eb^ti purecarānucaravasena. ^b^Manodhātū^eb^ti vipākamanodhātu gahetabbā purecaraṇato, parato uppajjanakiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā anantaraṃ manodhātuyā, kiriyāmanodhātuyā anantaraṃ manoviññāṇadhātuyā anuppajjanato ca.

[03]Dhammānaṃ yāvadeva nissattanijjīvavibhāvanatthāya satthu dhātudesanāti aññesu sabhāvadhāraṇādiatthesu labbhamānesupi ayamettha attho padhānoti āha – ^b^‘‘esanayo sabbatthā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sappaṭipakkhavasenā^eb^ti sappaṭibhāgavasena sukhaṃ dukkhena sappaṭibhāgaṃ, dukkhaṃ sukhena, evaṃ somanassadomanassāti. Yathā sukhādīnaṃyeva samudācāro vibhūto, na upekkhāya, evaṃ rāgādīnaṃyeva samudācāro vibhūto, na mohassa, tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avibhūtabhāvenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāyaviññāṇadhātu pariggahitāva hoti^eb^ tadavinābhāvato. ^b^Sesāsu^eb^ somanassadhātuādīsu, ^b^pariggahitāva hoti^eb^ avinābhāvato eva. Na hi somanassādayo manodhātuyā vinā vattanti. ^b^Upekkhādhātuto nīharitvā^eb^ti ettha cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādayo catasso viññāṇadhātuyo tāsaṃ vatthārammaṇabhūtā cakkhudhātuādayo cāti aṭṭha rūpadhātuyo, manodhātu, upekkhāsahagatā manoviññāṇadhātu, upekkhāsahagatā eva dhammadhātūti evaṃ pannarasa dhātuyo upekkhādhātuto nīharitabbā. Somanassadhātuādayo pana catasso dhātuyo dhammadhātuantogadhā ^a^M2.0291^ea^, evaṃ sukhadhātuto kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā tassā vatthārammaṇabhūtānaṃ kāyadhātuphoṭṭhabbadhātūnañca nīharaṇā heṭṭhā dassitanayāti, ^b^‘‘upekkhādhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ.

[03]Kāmavitakkādayo idha kāmadhātuādipariyāyena vuttāti ^b^‘‘kāmadhātuādīnaṃ dvedhāvitakke kāmavitakkādīsu ^a^V2.0077^ea^ vuttanayena attho veditabbo’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha hi ‘‘kāmavitakkoti kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, byāpādavitakkoti byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, vihiṃsāvitakkoti vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko, nekkhammapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko nekkhammavitakko, so yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati.
