Abyāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vitakko abyāpādavitakko, so mettāpubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭati. Avihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko avihiṃsāvitakko, so karuṇāya pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya yāva paṭhamajjhānā vaṭṭatī’’ti vuttaṃ. Ayaṃ panattho abhidhamme vitthārato āgato evāti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘abhidhamme’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Kāmadhātuto nīharitvā^eb^ti ettha ^b^kāma^eb^ggahaṇena gahitā rūpadhātuādayo cha, taṃvisayā sattaviññāṇadhātuyo, tattha pañcannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ cakkhudhātuādayo pañcāti aṭṭhārasa. Nekkhammadhātuādayo pana dhammadhātuantogadhā eva.

[03]Kāmataṇhāya visayabhūtā dhammā kāmadhātūti āha – ^b^‘‘pañca kāmāvacarakkhandhā kāmadhātū’’^eb^ti. Tathā rūpataṇhāya visayabhūtā dhammā rūpadhātu, arūpataṇhāya visayabhūtā dhammā arūpadhātūti āha – ^b^‘‘cattāro arūpāvacarakkhandhā’’^eb^tiādi. Kāmataṇhā kāmo uttarapadalopena, evaṃ rūpārūpataṇhā rūpārūpaṃ. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena tā yattha avacaranti, te kāmāvacarādayoti evaṃ kāmāvacarakkhandhādīnaṃ kāmataṇhādibhāvo veditabbo. ^b^Ādinā nayenā^eb^ti etena ‘‘uparito paranimmitavasavattideve antokaritvā etthāvacarā’’tiādipāḷiṃ (vibha. 1020) saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Etthāvacarā^eb^ti avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tadokāsatā ca taṇhāya tanninnattā veditabbā. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Paripuṇṇāṭṭhārasadhātukattā kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ ^b^‘‘kāmadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0292^ea^ vuttaṃ. Manoviññāṇadhātudhammadhātu ekadesamattameva hi rūpārūpāvacaradhammāti.

[03]^b^Samāgantvā^eb^ti sahitā hutvā. Yattakañhi paccayadhammā attano phalassa kāraṇaṃ, tattha tannibbattane samāgatā viya hoti vekalle tadanibbattanato. ^b^Saṅkhatadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā^eb^ asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā dhammadhātuekadesabhāvato.

[03]^b^126^eb^^b^.^eb^ Evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ attāti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmāti iminā viya adhippāyena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā ajjhattā, tesu bhavā tappariyāpannattāti ^b^ajjhattikāni^eb^. Tato bahibhūtāni ^b^bāhirāni^eb^. Āyatanakathā paṭiccasamuppādakathā ca ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.510, 570, 571) vuttanayeneva veditabbāti na vitthāritā.

[03]^b^127^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avijjamānaṃ ^a^V2.0078^ea^ ṭhānaṃ ^b^aṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ (a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.268; vibha. mūlaṭī. 809), natthi ṭhānanti vā ^b^aṭṭhānaṃ. Anavakāso^eb^ti ettha eseva nayo. Tadatthanigamanameva hi ‘‘netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī’’ti vacananti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ubhayenapī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ya^eb^nti kāraṇe paccattavacanaṃ, hetuattho ca kāraṇatthoti āha – ^b^‘‘yanti yena kāraṇenā’’^eb^ti. Ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ettha diṭṭhisampatti veditabbāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘maggadiṭṭhiyā sampanno’’^eb^ti. Kuto panāyamattho labbhatīti? Liṅgato. Liṅgañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ niccato upagamanapaṭikkhepo. ^b^Catubhūmakesū^eb^ti idaṃ catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārānaṃ ariyasāvakassa visayabhāvūpagamanato vuttaṃ; na pana te ārabbha niccato upagamanasabbhāvato. Vakkhati ca ‘‘catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārā panā’’tiādinā. Abhisaṅkhatasaṅkhārābhisaṅkharaṇakasaṅkhārānaṃ sappadesattā nippadesasaṅkhāraggahaṇatthaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅkhatasaṅkhāresū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Lokuttarasaṅkhārānaṃ pana nivattane kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati. ^b^Etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi^eb^ setughātattā. ^b^Tejussadattā^eb^ti saṃkilesavidhamanatejassa adhikabhāvato. Tathā hi te gambhīrabhāvena duddasā. ^b^Akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hontī^eb^ti idaṃ pakaraṇavasena vuttaṃ. Appahīnavipallāsānaṃ sattānaṃ kusaladhammānampi te ārammaṇaṃ na honti.

[03]Asukhe ‘‘sukha’’nti vipallāso ca idha sukhato upagamanassa ṭhānanti adhippetanti dassento, ^b^‘‘ekanta…pe… vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Attadiṭṭhivasenā^eb^ti padhānadiṭṭhimāha ^a^M2.0293^ea^. Diṭṭhiyā nibbānassa avisayabhāvo heṭṭhā vutto evāti ^b^‘‘kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahattha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paricchedo^eb^ti saṅkhārānaṃ paricchedo saṅkhārānaṃ paricchijjagahaṇaṃ. Svāyaṃ yesaṃ niccādito upagamanaṃ bhavati tesaṃyeva vasena kātabboti dassento ^b^‘‘sabbavāresū’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Sabbavāresū^eb^ti niccādisabbavāresu. ^b^Puthujjano hī^eb^ti ^b^hi^eb^-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā yaṃ yaṃ saṅkhāraṃ niccādivasena puthujjanakāle upagacchati, taṃ taṃ ariyamaggādhigamena aniccādivasena gaṇhanto yāthāvato jānanto taṃ gāhaṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ viniveṭheti vissajjeti. Tasmā yattha gāho tattha vissajjanāti catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārā idha saṅkhāraggahaṇena na gayhatīti attho.

[03]^b^128^eb^^b^.^eb^ Puttasambandhena mātāpitusamaññā, dattakittimādivasenapi puttavohāro loke dissati, so ca kho pariyāyato nippariyāyasiddhaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘janikā va mātā janako pitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tathā ānantariyakammassa adhippetattā ^b^‘‘manussabhūtova khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Aṭṭhānameta’’ntiādinā mātuādīnaṃyeva jīvitā voropane ariyasāvakassa abhabbabhāvadassanato tadaññaṃ ariyasāvako jīvitā voropetīti idaṃ atthato āpannamevāti maññamāno vadati – ^b^‘‘kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyā’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0079^ea^? ‘‘Aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī’’ti vacanato, ^b^‘‘etampi aṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sacepi hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Baladīpanattha^eb^nti saddhādibalasamannāgamadīpanatthaṃ. Ariyamaggenāgatasaddhādibalavasena hi ariyasāvako tādisaṃ sāvajjaṃ na karoti.

[03]^b^Pañcahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti idaṃ atthanipphādakāni tesaṃ pubbabhāgiyāni ca kāraṇāni kāraṇabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ, na pana sabbesaṃ pañcannaṃ sahayogakkhamato. ^b^Ākārehī^eb^ti kāraṇehi. ^b^Anussāvanenā^eb^ti anurūpaṃ sāvanena. Bhedassa anurūpaṃ yathā bhedo hoti, evaṃ bhinditabbānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attano vacanassa sāvanena viññāpanena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nanu tumhe’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvā^eb^ti etena ^a^M2.0294^ea^ ‘‘pākaṭaṃ katvā bhedakaravatthudīpanaṃ ^b^vohāro,^eb^ tattha attano nicchitamatthaṃ rahassavasena viññāpanaṃ ^b^anussāvana’’^eb^nti dasseti.

[03]^b^Kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇa^eb^nti tehi saṅghabhedasiddhito vuttaṃ, itare pana tesaṃ pubbabhāgabhūtā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vohārā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti vohāre. Cutianantaraṃ phalaṃ anantaraṃ nāma, tasmiṃ anantare niyuttāni tannibbattanena anantarakaraṇasīlāni, anantarappayojanāni cāti ānantariyāni, tāni eva ^b^‘‘ānantariyakammānī’’^eb^ti vuttāni.

[03]^b^Kammato^eb^ti ‘‘evaṃ ānantariyakammaṃ hoti, evaṃ anantariyakammasadisa’’nti evaṃ kammavibhāgato. ^b^Dvārato^eb^ti kāyādidvārato. ^b^Kappaṭṭhitiyato^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ kappaṭṭhitikavipākaṃ, idaṃ na kappaṭṭhitikavipāka’’nti evaṃ kappaṭṭhitiyavibhāgato. ^b^Pākā^eb^ti ‘‘idamettha vipaccati, idaṃ na vipaccatī’’ti vipaccanavibhāgato. ^b^Sādhāraṇādīhī^eb^ti gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato, ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vedanādivibhāgato ca.

[03]Yasmā manussattabhāve ṭhitasseva ca kusaladhammānaṃ tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpatti, yathā taṃ tiṇṇampi bodhisattānaṃ bodhittayanibbattiyaṃ, evaṃ manussabhāve ṭhitasseva akusaladhammānampi tikkhavisadasūrabhāvāpattīti āha ^b^‘‘manussabhūtassevā’’^eb^ti. Pākatikamanussānampi ca kusaladhammānaṃ visesappatti ^b^vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ (vi. va. aṭṭha. 3) vuttanayena veditabbā. Yathā vutto ca attho samānajātiyassa vikopane kammaṃ garutaraṃ, na tathā vijātiyassāti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Liṅge parivatte ca so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho, jīvitindriyappabandho ca, na aññoti āha ^b^‘‘api parivattaliṅga’’^eb^nti. Arahantepi ^a^V2.0080^ea^ eseva nayo. ^b^Tassa vipāka^eb^ntiādi kammassa ānantariyabhāvasamatthanaṃ, catukoṭikañcettha sambhavati. Tattha paṭhamā koṭi dassitā, itarāsu visaṅketaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘yo panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yadipi tattha visaṅketo, kammaṃ pana garutaraṃ ānantariyasadisaṃ bhāyitabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘ānantariyaṃ āhacceva tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ayaṃ pañho^eb^ti ñāpanicchānibbattā kathā.

[03]^b^Ānantariyaṃ phusati^eb^ maraṇādhippāyeneva ānantariyavatthuno vikopitattā. ^b^Ānantariyaṃ na phusati^eb^ ānantariyavatthuabhāvato. Sabbattha ^a^M2.0295^ea^ hi purimaṃ abhisandhicittaṃ appamāṇaṃ, vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇaṃ jīvitindriyañca ānantariyanānantariyabhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Saṅgāmacatukkaṃ sampattavasena yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Tenevā^eb^ti teneva payogena. ^b^Arahantaghāto hotiyeva^eb^ arahato māritattā. ^b^Puthujjanasseva dinnaṃ hotī^eb^ti yasmā yathā vadhakacittaṃ paccuppannārammaṇampi pabandhavicchedavasena ca jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati, na evaṃ cāgacetanā, sā hi cajitabbavatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cajanamattameva hoti, aññasantakabhāvakaraṇañca tassa cajanaṃ, tasmā yassa taṃ santakaṃ kataṃ. Tasseva dinnaṃ hotīti.
[03]^b^Lohitaṃ samo saratī^eb^ti abhighātena pakuppamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti. ^b^Mahantatara^eb^nti garutaraṃ. ^b^Sarīrapaṭijaggane viyā^eb^ti satthurūpakāyapaṭijaggane viya.

[03]^b^Asannipatite^eb^ti idaṃ sāmaggiyadīpanaṃ. ^b^Bhedo ca hotī^eb^ti saṅghassa bhedo hoti. ^b^Vaṭṭatīti saññāyā^eb^ti īdisakaraṇaṃ saṅghassa bhedāya na hotīti saññāya. ^b^Navato ūnaparisāyaṃ^eb^ karontassa tathāti yojetabbaṃ, ^b^tathā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘na ānantariyakammanti’’ imaṃ ākaḍḍhati, na pana ‘‘bhedo hotī’’ti idaṃ. Heṭṭhimantena hi navannameva vasena saṅghabhedo. ^b^Dhammavādino anavajjā^eb^ yathādhammaṃ avaṭṭhānato. Saṅghabhedassa pubbabhāgo ^b^saṅgharāji^eb^.
[03]^b^Kāyadvārameva pūrenti^eb^ kāyakammabhāveneva lakkhitabbato.

[03]^b^‘‘Saṇṭhahante hi…pe… muccatī’’^eb^ti idaṃ kappaṭṭhakathāya na sameti. Tathā hi kappaṭṭhakathāyaṃ (kathā. aṭṭha. 654-657) vuttaṃ – ‘‘āpāyikoti idaṃ suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ ^a^V2.0081^ea^ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya, taṃ āyukappaṃ sandhāya vutta’’nti. ^b^Kappavināseyevā^eb^ti pana āyukappavināseyevāti atthe sati natthi virodho. Ettha ca ^b^saṇṭhahante^eb^ti idampi ‘‘svevavinassissatī’’ti viya abhūtaparikappavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekadivasameva niraye paccati^eb^ tato paraṃ kappābhāve āyukappassapi abhāvatoti avirodhato ^a^M2.0296^ea^ atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Sesānī^eb^ti saṅghabhedato aññāni ānantariyakammāni.

[03]^b^Ahosikammaṃ…pe… saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti,^eb^ evaṃ sati kathaṃ nesaṃ ānantariyatā cutianantaraṃ vipākadānābhāvato. Atha sati phaladāne cutianantaro eva etesaṃ phalakālo, na aññoti phalakālaniyamena niyatatā nicchitā, na phaladānaniyamena, evampi niyataphalakālānaṃ aññesampi upapajjavedanīyānaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānañca niyatatā āpajjeyya. Tasmā vipākadhammadhammānaṃ paccayantaravikalatādīhi avipaccamānānampi attano sabhāvena vipākadhammatā viya balavatā ānantariyena vipāke dinne avipaccamānānampi ānantariyānaṃ phaladāne niyatasabhāvā ānantariyasabhāvā ca pavattīti attano sabhāvena phaladānaniyameneva niyatatā ānantariyatā ca veditabbā. Avassañca ānantariyasabhāvā tato eva niyatasabhāvā ca tesaṃ pavattīti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ aññassa balavato ānantariyassa abhāve cutianantaraṃ ekantena phaladānato.

[03]Nanu evaṃ aññesampi upapajjavedanīyānaṃ aññasmiṃ vipākadāyake asati cutianantaramekantena phaladānato niyatasabhāvā anantariyasabhāvā ca pavatti āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati. Asamānajātikena cetopaṇidhivasena upaghātakena ca nivattetabbavipākattā anantare ekantaphaladāyakattābhāvā. Na pana ānantariyakānaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ dutiyajjhānādīni viya asamānajātikaṃ phalanivattakaṃ atthi sabbānantariyānaṃ avīciphalattā. Na ca heṭṭhūpapattiṃ icchato sīlavato cetopaṇidhi viya uparūpapattijanakakammaphalaṃ ānantariyaphalaṃ nivattetuṃ samattho cetopaṇidhi atthi anicchantasseva avīcipātanato, na ca ānantariyopaghātakaṃ kiñci kammaṃ atthi, tasmā tesaṃyeva anantare ekantavipākajanakasabhāvā pavattīti. Anekāni ca ānantariyāni katāni ekanteneva vipāke niyatasabhāvattā uparatāvipaccanasabhāvāsaṅkattā nicchitāni sabhāvato niyatāneva. Tesu pana samānasabhāvesu ekena vipāke dinne itarāni attanā kātabbakiccassa teneva katattā na dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ karonti. Na samatthatāvighātattāti natthi tesaṃ ānantariyakatā nivatti; garutarabhāvo pana tesu labbhatevāti saṅghabhedassa ^a^V2.0082^ea^ siyā ^a^M2.0297^ea^ garutarabhāvoti, ^b^‘‘yena…pe… vipaccatī’’^eb^ti āha. Ekassa pana aññāni upatthambhakāni hontīti daṭṭhabbāni. ^b^Paṭisandhivasena vipaccatī^eb^ti vacanena itaresaṃ pavattivipākadāyitā anuññātā viya dissati. ^b^No vā tathā sīlavatī^eb^ti yathā pitā sīlavā, tathā sīlavatī no vā hotīti yojanā. Sace mātā sīlavatī, mātughāto paṭisandhivasena vipaccatīti yojanā.
[03]^b^Pakatatto^eb^ti anukkhitto. ^b^Samānasaṃvāsako^eb^ti apārājiko. ^b^Samānasīmāya^eb^nti ekasīmāyaṃ.
[03]^b^Satthukiccaṃ kātuṃ asamattho^eb^ti yaṃ satthārā kātabbakiccaṃ anusāsanādi, taṃ kātuṃ asamatthoti bhagavantaṃ paccakkhāya. ^b^Aññaṃ titthakara^eb^nti aññaṃ satthāraṃ.

[03]^b^129^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhijātiādisu (a. ni. ṭī. 1.1.277) pakappanena devatūpasaṅkamanādinā jātacakkavāḷena samānayogakkhemaṃ dasasahassaparimāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^jātikhettaṃ,^eb^ saraseneva āṇāpavattiṭṭhānaṃ ^b^āṇākhettaṃ,^eb^ visayabhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^visayakhettaṃ. Dasasahassī lokadhātū^eb^ti imāya lokadhātuyā saddhiṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā dasasahassī lokadhātu. Tattakānaṃyeva jātikhettabhāvo dhammatāvasena veditabbo. ‘‘Pariggahavasenā’’ti keci. ‘‘Sabbesampi buddhānaṃ tattakaṃ eva jātikhettaṃ tannivāsīnaṃyeva ca devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo’’ti ca vadanti. Mātukucchiokkamanakālādīnaṃ channaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ mahābhinīhārādikālepi tassa pakampanassa labbhamānato. ^b^Āṇākhettaṃ nāma^eb^ yaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṃvaṭṭati ca vivaṭṭati ca. ^b^Āṇā vattati^eb^ āṇāya tannivāsīnaṃ devatānaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanena, tañca kho kevalaṃ buddhānaṃ ānubhāveneva, na adhippāyavasena, adhippāyavasena pana ‘‘yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā’’ti (a. ni. 3.81) vacanato tato parampi āṇā pavatteyya.

[03]^b^Na uppajjantīti pana atthī^eb^ti, ‘‘na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjatī’’tiādiṃ (ma. ni. 1.285; 2.341; mahāva. 11; kathā. 405; mi. pa. 4.5.11) imissaṃ lokadhātuyaṃ ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā, ‘‘kiṃ panāvuso sāriputta, atthetarahi aññe samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ^a^M2.0298^ea^ bhagavatā samasamā sambodhiyanti, evaṃ puṭṭho ahaṃ, bhante, noti vadeyya’’nti (dī. ni. 3.161), vatvā tassa kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ, ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso, yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā’’ti imaṃ suttaṃ (dī. ni. 3.161; mi. pa. 5.1.1) dassentena ^a^V2.0083^ea^ dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhakhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Ekato^eb^ti saha, ekasmiṃ kāleti attho. So pana kālo kathaṃ paricchinnoti carimabhave paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dhātuparinibbānāti dassento ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Nisinnakālato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti paṭilomakkamena vadati. ^b^Parinibbānato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Etthantare^eb^ti carimabhave bodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ dhātuparinibbānanti etesaṃ antare.

[03]Aññassa buddhassa uppatti na nivāritā, tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tīṇi hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipattiantaradhānena hi sāsanassa osakkitattā aparassa buddhassa uppatti laddhāvasarā hoti. ^b^Paṭipadā^eb^ti paṭivedhāvahā pubbabhāgapaṭipadā. ^b^‘‘Pariyatti pamāṇa’’^eb^nti vatvā tamatthaṃ bodhisattaṃ nidassanaṃ katvā dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘yathā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ tayidaṃ hīnaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Niyyānikadhammassa ṭhitiñhi dassento aniyyānikadhammaṃ nidasseti.

[03]^b^Mātikāya antarahitāyā^eb^ti, ‘‘yo pana bhikkhū’’tiādinayappattā sikkhāpadapāḷi mātikā, tāya antarahitāya nidānuddesasaṅkhāte pātimokkhuddese pabbajjāyupasampadākammesu ca sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho. Atha vā pātimokkhe dharanteyeva pabbajjā upasampadā ca, evaṃ sati tadubhayaṃ pātimokkhe antogadhaṃ tadubhayābhāve pātimokkhābhāvato, tasmā tayidaṃ tayaṃ sāsanassa ṭhitihetūti āha – ^b^‘‘pātimokkhapabbajjāupasampadāsu ṭhitāsu sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā vā upasampadādhīnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ, upasampadā ca pabbajjādhīnā, tasmā pātimokkhe siddhe, siddhāsu pabbajjāupasampadāsu ca sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati. Pacchimapaṭivedhato hi paraṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ, pacchimasīlato ca paraṃ paṭipattisāsanaṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^Osakkitaṃ nāmā^eb^ti pacchimakapaṭivedhasīlabhedadvayaṃ ekato katvā tato paraṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti attho.

[03]Tena ^a^M2.0299^ea^ kāmaṃ ‘‘sāsanaṭṭhitiyā pariyatti pamāṇa’’nti vuttaṃ, pariyatti pana paṭipattihetukāti paṭipattiyā asati appatiṭṭhā hoti, tasmā paṭipattiantaradhānaṃ sāsanosakkanassa visesakāraṇanti dassetvā tayidaṃ sāsanosakkanaṃ dhātuparinibbānosānanti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘tīṇi parinibbānānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Kāruñña^eb^nti ^a^V2.0084^ea^ paridevanakāruññaṃ. Jambudīpe dīpantaresu devanāgabrahmalokesu ca vippakiritvā ṭhitānaṃ dhātūnaṃ mahābodhipallaṅke ekajjhaṃ sannipatanaṃ, rasmivissajjanaṃ, tattha tejodhātuyā uṭṭhānaṃ, ekajālībhāvo cāti sabbametaṃ satthu adhiṭṭhānavaseneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Anacchariyattā^eb^ti dvīsupi uppajjamānesu acchariyattābhāvadosatoti attho. Buddhā nāma majjhe bhinnaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti tesaṃ desanāpi ekarasā evāti āha – ^b^‘‘desanāya ca visesābhāvato’’^eb^ti. Etenapi anacchariyattameva sādheti. ^b^Vivādabhāvato^eb^ti etena vivādābhāvatthaṃ dve ekato na uppajjantīti dasseti.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti milindapañhe. Ekaṃ buddhaṃ dhāretīti ^b^ekabuddhadhāraṇī^eb^. Etena evaṃ sabhāvā ete buddhaguṇā, yena dutiyabuddhaguṇe dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti. Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi guṇadhammānaṃ bhāriyo viseso na sakkā dhāretunti, ^b^‘‘na dhāreyyā’’^eb^ti vatvā tameva adhāraṇaṃ pariyāyantarenapi pakāsento ^b^‘‘caleyyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^caleyyā^eb^ti paripphandeyya. ^b^Kampeyyā^eb^ti pavedheyya. ^b^Nameyyā^eb^ti ekapassena nameyya. ^b^Onameyyā^eb^ti osīdeyya. ^b^Vinameyyā^eb^ti vividhaṃ itocito ca nameyya. ^b^Vikireyyā^eb^ti vātena thusamuṭṭhi viya vippakireyya. ^b^Vidhameyyā^eb^ti vinasseyya. ^b^Viddhaṃseyyā^eb^ti sabbaso viddhastā bhaveyya. Tathābhūtā ca katthaci na tiṭṭheyyāti āha ^b^‘‘na ṭhānamupagaccheyyā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Idāni tattha nidassanaṃ dassento, ^b^‘‘yathā, mahārājā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^samupādikā^eb^ti samaṃ uddhaṃ pajjati pavattatīti samupādikā, udakassa upari samaṃ gāminīti attho. ^b^Vaṇṇenā^eb^ti saṇṭhānena. ^b^Pamāṇenā^eb^ti ārohena ^a^M2.0300^ea^. ^b^Kisathūlenā^eb^ti kisathūlabhāvena, pariṇāhenāti attho.

[03]^b^Chādenta^eb^nti rocentaṃ ruciṃ uppādentaṃ. ^b^Tandīkato^eb^ti tena bhojanena tandībhūto. ^b^Anonamitadaṇḍajāto^eb^ti yāvadatthaṃ bhojanena onamituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya anonamitadaṇḍo viya jāto. ^b^Sakiṃ bhutto vameyyā^eb^ti ekampi ālopaṃ ajjhoharitvā vameyyāti attho.

[03]^b^Atidhammabhārena pathavī calatī^eb^ti dhammena nāma pathavī tiṭṭheyya. Sā kiṃ teneva calati vinassatīti adhippāyena pucchati. Puna thero ‘‘ratanaṃ nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ abhimatañca lokena attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ diṭṭhaṃ. Evaṃdhammo ^a^V2.0085^ea^ ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅginaṃ dhārento abhimato ca viññūnaṃ gambhīrappameyyabhāvena garusabhāvattā atibhārabhūto pathavīcalanassa kāraṇaṃ hotī’’ti dassento, ^b^‘‘idha, mahārāja, dve sakaṭā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Eteneva tathāgatassa mātukucchiokkamanādikāle pathavīkampanakāraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ekasakaṭato ratana^eb^nti ekasmā, ekassa vā sakaṭassa ratanaṃ, tasmā sakaṭato gahetvāti attho.
[03]^b^Osārita^eb^nti uccāritaṃ, vuttanti attho. ^b^Aggo^eb^ti sabbasattehi aggo.

[03]^b^Sabhāvapakatī^eb^ti sabhāvabhūtā akittimā pakati. ^b^Kāraṇamahantatāyā^eb^ti mahantehi buddhakārakadhammehi pāramitāsaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti vuttaṃ hoti. Pathaviādīni mahantāni vatthūni, mahantā ca sakkabhāvādayo attano attano visaye ekekā eva, sammāsambuddhopi mahanto attano visaye ekova, ko ca tassa visayo? Buddhabhūmi, yāvatakaṃ vā ñeyyaṃ. Evaṃ ‘‘ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā ekova hotī’’ti vadanto paracakkavāḷesu dutiyassa buddhassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Imināva^eb^^a^M2.0301^ea^^b^padenā^eb^ti ‘‘ekissā lokadhātuyā’’ti iminā eva padena. ^b^Dasacakkavāḷasahassāni gahitāni^eb^ jātikhettattā. ^b^Ekacakkavāḷenevā^eb^ti iminā ekacakkavāḷeneva. Yathā – ^b^‘‘imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjantī’’^eb^ti vutte imasmimpi cakkavāḷe jambudīpeyeva, tatthapi majjhimapadese evāti paricchindituṃ vaṭṭati; evaṃ ‘‘ekissā lokadhātuyā’’ti jātikhette adhippetepi imināva cakkavāḷena paricchindituṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Vivādūpacchedato^eb^ti vivādūpacchedakāraṇā. Dvīsu uppannesu yo vivādo bhaveyya, tassa anuppādoyevettha vivādupacchedo. ^b^Ekasmiṃ dīpe^eb^tiādinā dīpantarepi ekajjhaṃ na uppajjanti, pageva ekadīpeti dasseti. ^b^So parihāyethā^eb^ti cakkavāḷassa padese eva vattitabbattā parihāyeyya.

[03]^b^130^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Manussatta^eb^nti manussabhāvo tasseva pabbajjādiguṇasampattiādīnaṃ yoggabhāvato. ^b^Liṅgasampattī^eb^ti purisabhāvo. ^b^Hetū^eb^ti manovacīpaṇidhānapubbikā hetusampadā. ^b^Satthāradassana^eb^nti satthusammukhībhāvo. ^b^Pabbajjā^eb^ti kammakiriyavādīsu tāpasesu, bhikkhūsu vā pabbajjā. ^b^Guṇasampattī^eb^ti abhiññādiguṇasampadā. ^b^Adhikāro^eb^ti buddhaṃ uddissa adhiko sakkāro. ^b^Chandatā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0086^ea^ sammāsambodhiṃ uddissa sātisayo kattukamyatākusalacchando. ^b^Aṭṭhadhammasamodhānā^eb^ti etesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ dhammānaṃ samāyogena. ^b^Abhinīhāro^eb^ti kāyapaṇidhānaṃ. ^b^Samijjhatī^eb^ti nipphajjatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyā ^b^cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāya^eb^ (cariyā. aṭṭha. pakiṇṇakakathā) vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]^b^Sabbākāraparipūramevā^eb^ti paripuṇṇalakkhaṇatāya sattussadādīhi sabbākārehi sampannameva. Na hi itthiyā kosohitavatthaguyhatā sambhavati, dutiyapakati ca nāma paṭhamapakatito nihīnā eva. Tenevāha anantaravāre ^b^‘‘yasmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Idha purisassa tattha nibbattanato^eb^ti imasmiṃ manussaloke purisabhūtassa tattha brahmaloke brahmattabhāvena nibbattanato. Tena asatipi purisaliṅge purisākārā brahmāno hontīti dasseti. Taṃyeva hi purisākāraṃ ^a^M2.0302^ea^ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘yaṃ puriso brahmattaṃ kareyyā’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘samānepī’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi evaṃ itthiyo brahmaloke na uppajjantīti āha ^b^‘‘brahmatta’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^131^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāyaduccaritassā^eb^tiādipāḷiyā kammaniyāmo nāma kathito. Samañjanaṃ samaṅgo, so etassa atthīti ^b^samaṅgī,^eb^ samannāgato. Samañjanasīlo vā ^b^samaṅgī^eb^. Pubbabhāge ^b^āyūhanasamaṅgitā,^eb^ sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena ^b^cetanāsamaṅgitā^eb^. Cetanāsantativasena vā ^b^āyūhanasamaṅgitā,^eb^ taṃtaṃcetanākhaṇavasena ^b^cetanāsamaṅgitā^eb^. Katūpacitassa avipakkavipākassa kammassa vasena ^b^kammasamaṅgitā,^eb^ kamme pana vipaccituṃ āraddhe vipākappavattivasena ^b^vipākasamaṅgitā^eb^. Kammādīnaṃ upaṭṭhānakālavasena ^b^upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitā. Kusalākusalakammāyūhanakkhaṇe^eb^ti kusalakammassa ca akusalakammassa ca samīhanakkhaṇe. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti iminā kusalākusalakammapadaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Yathā kataṃ kammaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ hoti, tathā kataṃ ^b^upacitaṃ. Vipākāraha^eb^nti dutiyabhavādīsu vipaccanārahaṃ. Uppajjamānānaṃ upapattinimittaṃ upaṭṭhātīti yojanā. ^b^Calatī^eb^ti parivattati. Ekena hi kammunā tajje nimitte upaṭṭhāpite paccayavisesavasena tato aññena kammunā aññassa nimittassa upaṭṭhānaṃ parivattanaṃ.

[03]^b^Sunakhajīviko^eb^ti sunakhehi jīvanasīlo. ^b^Talasantharaṇapūja^eb^nti bhūmitalassa pupphehi santaraṇapūjaṃ. ^b^Āyūhanacetanākammasamaṅgitāvasenā^eb^ti kāyaduccaritassa aparāparaṃ āyūhanena sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya ^a^V2.0087^ea^ tasseva pakappane kammakkhayakarañāṇena akhepitattā yathūpacitakammunā ca samaṅgibhāvassa vasena.
[03]^b^132^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Evaṃ sassirika^eb^nti vuttappakārena anekadhātuvibhajanādinā nānānayavicittatāya paramanipuṇagambhīratāya ca atthato byañjanato ca sasobhaṃ katvā.

[03]^b^Naṃ dhārehī^eb^ti ettha ^b^na^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. Dhātuādivasena parivaṭṭīyanti atthā etehīti parivaṭṭā, desanābhedā. Cattāro parivaṭṭā etassa, etasmiṃ vāti ^b^catuparivaṭṭo,^eb^ dhammapariyāyo. Dhammo ca so pariyattibhāvato yathāvuttenatthena ādāsoti ^b^dhammādāso^eb^. Upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena yathādhammānaṃ ādāsotipi ^b^dhammādāso^eb^. Yathā hi ādāsena ^a^M2.0303^ea^ sattānaṃ mukhe maladosaharaṇaṃ, evaṃ imināpi suttena yogīnaṃ mukhe maladosaharaṇaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā iminā suttena kilese madditvā samathādhigamena yogino jayappattā; tasmā amatapurappavesane ugghosanamahābheritāya ca ^b^amatadundubhi. Idha vutta^eb^nti imasmiṃ sutte vuttaṃ. ^b^Anuttaro saṅgāmavijayo^eb^ti anuttarabhāvato kilesasaṅgāmavijayo, ‘‘vijeti etenā’’ti katvā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Bahudhātukasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^133^eb^^b^.^eb^ Samaññāyati ^a^V2.0088^ea^ etāyāti ^b^samaññā,^eb^ nāmanti attho. Ayamayaṃ nāmāti paññāpenti etāya, tathāpaññāpanamattanti vā ^b^paññatti,^eb^ nāmameva. Tenāha ^b^‘‘purimapadasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sesesupī^eb^ti ‘‘paṇḍavassa pabbatassā’’tiādīsu tīsu vāresupi.

[03]Samuṭṭhānaṃ tāva suttassa kathetvā atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘tadā kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na pabbatehi attho^eb^ti na bhagavato pabbatehi kathitehi attho atthi. ^b^Isigilibhāvo^eb^ti isigilināmatā. ^b^Itī^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena, imaṃ aṭṭhuppattiṃ avekkhantoti attho.

[03]^b^Cetiyagabbhe^eb^ti cetiyaghare cetiyassa abbhantare. ^b^Yamakamahādvāra^eb^nti yamakakavāṭayuttaṃ mahantaṃ dvāraṃ. ^b^Dvedhā katvā^eb^ti pabbatassa abbhantare maṇḍapasaṅkhepena leṇaṃ nimminitvā dvedhā katvā tadā te tattha vasiṃsu.

[03]Vasitakālañca kathento tesaṃ mātuyā yāva tatiyabhavato paṭṭhāya samudāgamaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘atīte kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Patthesī^eb^ti tassā kira khettakuṭiyā vīhayo bhajjantiyā tattha mahākarañjapupphappamāṇā mahantā manoharā pañcasatamattā lājā jāyiṃsu. Sā tā gahetvā mahante paduminipatte ṭhapesi. Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekabuddho tassā anuggahatthaṃ avidūre khettapāḷiyā gacchati. Sā taṃ disvā ^a^M2.0304^ea^ pasannamānasā supupphitaṃ mahantaṃ ekaṃ padumaṃ gahetvā tattha lāje pakkhipitvā paccekabuddhaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā, ‘‘imassa, bhante, puññassa ānubhāvena ānubhāvasampanne pañcasataputte labheyya’’nti pañca puttasatāni patthesi. ^b^Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe^eb^ti yadā sā yathāvuttaṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi; tasmiṃyeva khaṇe pañcasatā migaluddakā sambhatasambhārā paripakkapaccekabodhiñāṇā tasseva paccekabuddhassa madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā, ‘‘etissā puttā bhaveyyāmā’’ti patthayiṃsu. Atītāsu anekajātīsu tassā puttabhāvena āgatattā tathā tesaṃ ahosīti vadanti. ^b^Pāduddhāre^eb^ti pāduddhāre pāduddhāre. Pāduddhārasīsena cettha nikkhipanaṃ āha.

[03]^b^Gabbhamalaṃ nissāyā^eb^ti bahi nikkhantaṃ gabbhamalaṃ nissayaṃ katvā saṃsedajabhāvena nibbattā ^a^V2.0089^ea^. Opapātikabhāvenāti keci. ^b^Khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā. ^b^Vipassanā^eb^ti aniccānupassanāpubbikā sappaccayanāmarūpadassanapubbikā ca, saṅkhāre sammasantassa aniccalakkhaṇe diṭṭhe, ‘‘yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā’’ti sesalakkhaṇāni suviññeyyāneva honti. ^b^Paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattayiṃsū^eb^ti dve asaṅkhyeyyāni kappānaṃ satasahassañca paccekabodhipāramitāya parinipphannattā ñāṇassa paripākattā vuttanayena sayameva vipassanaṃ pavattetvā matthakaṃ pāpetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ adhigacchiṃsu. Sabbepi te taṃyeva gāthaṃ abhāsiṃsūti āha – ^b^‘‘ayaṃ tesaṃ byākaraṇagāthā ahosī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Saroruha^eb^nti sarasi jātaṃ. ^b^Padumapalāsapattaja^eb^nti khuddakamahantehi kamaladalehi sahajātaṃ. Khuddakamahantakamaladalasaṅkhātāni vā padumapalāsapattāni ettha santīti padumapalāsapattaṃ, padumagacchaṃ. Tattha jātanti ^b^padumapalāsapattajaṃ. Supupphita^eb^nti suṭṭhu pupphitaṃ sammā vikasitaṃ. ^b^Bhamaragaṇānuciṇṇa^eb^nti bhamaragaṇehi anukulañceva anuparibbhamitañca. ^b^Aniccatāyupagata^eb^nti khaṇe khaṇe vaṇṇabhedādivasena aniccatāya upagataṃ. ^b^Viditvā^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya jānitvā. ^b^Eko care^eb^ti tasmā aññopi mādiso hotukāmo evaṃ paṭipajjitvā eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.

[03]^b^135^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satisārasīlasārādisamannāgamanena ^a^M2.0305^ea^ sattesu ^b^sārabhūtā^eb^. Sabbaso vaṭṭadukkhassa vigatattā ^b^niddukkhā^eb^. Samucchinnataṇhatāya ^b^nittaṇhā. Mānacchidoti^eb^ thutivacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Etesaṃ ekanāmakāyevā^eb^ti etesaṃ āgatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā aññe paccekabuddhā samānanāmakā eva. Vuttamevatthaṃ pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṃ ^b^‘‘imesu hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Visuṃ visuṃ avatvā^eb^ti paccekaṃ sarūpato avatvā. ^b^Aññe cā^eb^ti asādhāraṇattā āha. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Isigilisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^136^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dosehi ^a^V2.0090^ea^ ārakāti ^b^ariyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niddosa’’^eb^nti. Sā pana niddosatā lokuttarabhāvena savisesāti āha ^b^‘‘lokuttara’’^eb^nti. Sammā sundaro pasattho niyyāniko samādhi ^b^sammāsamādhī^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘sammāsamādhinti maggasamādhi’’^eb^nti. Upanisīdati ettha phalaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāyāti ^b^upanisaṃ,^eb^ kāraṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘saupanisanti sappaccaya’’^eb^nti. Parikaroti parivāretīti ^b^parikkhāro^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘saparikkhāranti saparivāra’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Parivāritā^eb^ti sahajātādipaccayabhāvena parivārantehi viya upagatā. ^b^Purecārikā^eb^ti vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvanā sahajātādipaccayavasena paccayattā purassarā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi cā’’^eb^ti. Idāni tāni kiccato dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘vipassanāsammādiṭṭhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^parivīmaṃsa^eb^ggahaṇaṃ tattha tattha cittuppāde vīmaṃsādhipateyyena pavattiyā sammādiṭṭhiyā pubbaṅgamabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tenassa maggasamādhissa nānākhaṇikaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Vīmaṃsanapariyosāne^eb^ti tathāpavattānulomañāṇassa osāne. ^b^Bhūmiladdhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ samugghāṭayamānā^eb^ti attano santāne dīgharattaṃ anusayitaṃ kilesavaṭṭaṃ samucchindanti. ^b^Vūpasamayamānā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Vūpasamayamānā^eb^ti vā tato eva avasiṭṭhampi vaṭṭaṃ appavattikaraṇavasena vūpasamenti. Tenevāha – ^b^‘‘maggasammādiṭṭhi…pe… uppajjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sā^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhi. ^b^Duvidhāpī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0306^ea^ yathāvuttā duvidhāpi. ^b^Idha adhippetā^eb^ vipassanāpaññāsahitāya maggapaññāya kiccassa dassitattā.

[03]Lakkhaṇe paṭivijjhamāne lakkhaṇiko dhammo paṭividdho hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘micchādiṭṭhiṃ…pe… ārammaṇato pajānātī’’^eb^ti. Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiyampi eseva nayo. ^b^Kiccato^eb^ti bhāvanākiccato. Sammādiṭṭhiyaṃ tadadhigatāsammohatāya ^b^asammohato pajānāti. Kiccato^eb^ti paṭivedhakiccato. Taṃ pana sabbathā asammuyhanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘asammohato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evaṃ pajānanā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhīti yāthāvato avabodho. ^b^Assā^eb^ti taṃsamaṅgino puggalassa.

[03]^b^Dvāya^eb^nti -kāro dīghaṃ katvā vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dvayaṃ vadāmī’’^eb^ti. Dve avayavā etassāti dvayaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘duvidhakoṭṭhāsaṃ vadāmī’’^eb^ti. Puññassa eko bhāgo so eva puññabhāgiko ^a^V2.0091^ea^, ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā itthiliṅgavasena ^b^‘‘puññabhāgiyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Upadhisaṅkhātassā^eb^ti khandhapabandhasaṅkhātassa.

[03]^b^Amatadvāra^eb^nti ariyamaggaṃ. ^b^Paññapetī^eb^ti niyyānādipakārato paññapeti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vibhajitvā dassetī’’^eb^ti. Tattha sammohassa viddhaṃsanena asammohato dasseti. ^b^Tasmiṃ atthe^eb^ti amatadvārapaññāpane atthe. ^b^Bojjhaṅgappattā^eb^ti bojjhaṅgabhāvappattā. Maggabhāvena niyyānabhāvena pavattiyā maggapaññāya aṭṭhannampi sādhāraṇattā samudāyassa ca avayavo aṅganti katvā sesadhamme aṅgikabhāvena dassento ^b^‘‘ariyamaggassa aṅga’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^So bhikkhū^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhiṃ ‘‘micchādiṭṭhī’’ti sammādiṭṭhiṃ ‘‘sammādiṭṭhī’’ti jānanto bhikkhu. ^b^Pajahanatthāyā^eb^ti samucchedavasena pajahanāya. ^b^Paṭilābhatthāyā^eb^ti maggasammādiṭṭhiyā adhigamāya. ^b^Kusalavāyāmo^eb^ti vipassanāsampayuttova kosallasambhūto vāyāmo. Saratīti ^b^sato,^eb^ taṃ panassa saraṇaṃ satisamaṅgitāyāti āha ^b^‘‘satiyā samannāgato’’^eb^ti. Kāmañcettha vipassanāsammādiṭṭhiṃ yathābhūtā sammāvāyāmasatiyo sahajātā ca purejātā ca hutvā parivārenti, ‘‘itiyime tayo dhammā sammādiṭṭhiṃ anuparidhāvanti anuparivattantī’’ti pana vacanato, ‘‘ettha hī’’tiādinā maggasammādiṭṭhiyā eva sesadhammānaṃ yathārahaṃ sahacaraṇabhāvena parivāraṇaṃ yojitaṃ. ^b^Sammāsaṅkappādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ gahaṇaṃ itaresaṃ parivārabhāvena gahitattā ^a^M2.0307^ea^. Na hi sakkā te eva parivāre parivāravante ca katvā vattuṃ saṅkarato sammohajananato ca. ^b^Tayo^eb^ti sammādiṭṭhivāyāmasatiyo ^b^sahajātaparivārāva honti^eb^ maggakkhaṇikānaṃ tesaṃ adhippetattā vipassanākhaṇaviratīnaṃ asambhavato.

[03]^b^137^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Takkanavasena^eb^ lokasiddhenāti adhippāyo. ‘‘Evañcevañca bhavitabba’’nti vividhaṃ takkanaṃ kūpe viya udakassa ārammaṇassa ākaḍḍhanaṃ vitakkanaṃ ^b^vitakko. Saṅkappanavasenā^eb^ti taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kappanavasena. Takkanaṃ kappananti ca ataṃsahajātānamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ekaggo^eb^ti iminā samādhinā laddhupakārasseva vitakkassa appanāpariyāyo hotīti dasseti. Visesena vā appanā vitakkassa vasena cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhiropeti, vitakke asati kathanti āha ^b^‘‘vitakke panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Attanoyeva dhammatāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhiruhatī^eb^ti, etena ārammaṇadhammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ nāma sabhāvasiddhaṃ, na dhammantaramapekkhati, vitakko pana pavattamāno ārammaṇābhiniropanavaseneva pavattatīti dasseti. Evaṃ santepi sabhāvāvitakkacittuppādato savitakkacittuppādassa ārammaṇaggahaṇaviseso vitakkena jātoti katvā vitakko cittassa ārammaṇaggahaṇe visesapaccayoti pākaṭoyamattho. Apare pana bhaṇanti ^a^V2.0092^ea^ – yathā koci rājavallabhaṃ, taṃsambandhīnaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati, evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati vitakkassa ārammaṇābhiniropanasabhāvattā, aññesaṃ dhammānañca avitakkasabhāvato. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘cetaso abhiniropanā’’ti (dha. sa. 7).

[03]Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti? Vitakkabaleneva. Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati, evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati. ^b^Paricayenā^eb^ti ca santāne pavattavitakkabhāvanāsaṅkhātena paricayena. Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ; tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva; yathā ñāṇasahagataṃ cittaṃ sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ^a^M2.0308^ea^ ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati; yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati, evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vācaṃ saṅkharotī^eb^ti vācaṃ uppādeti, vacīghosuppattiyā visesapaccayo hotīti attho. ^b^Lokiyavitakko^eb^ dvattiṃsacittasahagato ^b^vācaṃ saṅkharoti^eb^ vacīviññattijananato. ^b^Vacīsaṅkhārotveva panassa nāmaṃ hoti^eb^ ruḷhito, taṃsamatthatānirodhato vā sambhavato pana saṅkhāroti. ^b^‘‘Lokuttarasammāsaṅkappaṃ parivārentī’’^eb^ti vatvā tividhe sammāsaṅkappe kadāci katamaṃ parivārentīti? Codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘etthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nānācittesu labbhanti^eb^ nānāsamannāhārahetukattā, pubbabhāgeyeva ca te uppajjantīti. ^b^Tīṇi nāmāni labhati^eb^ tividhassapi paṭipakkhassa samucchindanena sātisayaṃ tiṇṇampi kiccakaraṇato. Esa nayo sammāvācādīsupi.

[03]^b^138^eb^^b^.^eb^ Viramati etāyāti ^b^veramaṇī^eb^ virati vuccati. Sā musāvādato viramaṇassa kāraṇabhāvato cetanāpi verassa maṇanato vināsanato viratipīti āha – ^b^‘‘viratipi cetanāpi vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ārakā ramatī^eb^ti samucchinnehi dūrato samussāreti. ^b^Vinā tehi ramatī^eb^ti accantameva tehi vinā bhavati. ^b^Tato tato^eb^ti diṭṭhe adiṭṭhavādādito musāvādā. Visesato anuppattidhammattā ^b^paṭinivattā hutvā^eb^.

[03]^b^140^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tividhena kuhanavatthunā^eb^ti paccayapaṭisevana-sāmantajappana-iriyāpathapavattanasaṅkhātena pāpicchatā nibbattena tividhena kuhanavatthunā. ^b^Etāya^eb^ kuhanāya karaṇabhūtāya paccayuppādanatthaṃ ^b^nimittaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0093^ea^ sīlaṃ etesanti yojanā. Attavisayalābhahetu akkosanakhuṃsanavambhanādivasena pisanaṃ ghaṭṭanaṃ viheṭhanaṃ ^b^nippeso^eb^. Ito laddhaṃ aññassa, tato laddhaṃ parassa datvā evaṃ lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīṃsatīti ^b^lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīṃsanā. Pāḷiyaṃ āgato^eb^ kuhanādivasena ^b^micchāājīvo^eb^. Ko pana soti āha ^b^‘‘ājīvahetū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tāsaṃyevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ, ‘‘ājīvo kuppamāno kāyavacīdvāresu eva kuppatī’’ti katvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^141^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sammā ^a^M2.0309^ea^ pasatthā sobhanā niyyānikā diṭṭhi etassāti ^b^sammādiṭṭhi,^eb^ puggalo. Tassa pana yasmā sammādiṭṭhi saccābhisamayassa nibbānasacchikiriyāya avassayo, tasmā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘maggasammādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paho^eb^ti bhavati tāya saheva uppajjati pavattati. Paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ yāthāvato jānanaṭṭhena sammāñāṇanti idhādhippetaṃ, tañca kho maggasamādhimhi ṭhite eva hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ āha – ^b^‘‘maggasammāsamādhimhi…pe… sammāñāṇaṃ pahotī’’^eb^tiādi. Iminā kiṃ dassetīti? Yathā maggasammādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhito puggalo, ‘‘sammādiṭṭhī’’ti vutto, evaṃ maggaphalapaccavekkhaṇañāṇe ṭhito, ‘‘sammāñāṇo’’ti vutto, tassa ca maggaphalasammāsamādhipavattiyā pahoti sammāñāṇassa sammāvimuttiyā pahotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Phalasamādhi tāva pavattatu, maggasamādhi pana kathanti? Tampi akuppabhāvatāya accantasamādhibhāvato kiccanipphattiyā pavattatevāti vattabbataṃ labhati. ^b^Ṭhapetvā aṭṭhaphalaṅgānī^eb^ti phalabhūtāni sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni, ‘‘sammādiṭṭhissa sammāsaṅkappo pahotī’’tiādinā visuṃ gahitattā ṭhapetvā. ^b^Sammāñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sammāñāṇaṃ katvā. ^b^Phalaṃ kātu^eb^nti phaladhammasahacaritatāya vipākasabhāvatāya ca ‘‘phala’’nti laddhanāme phalasampayuttadhamme sammāvimuttiṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Tathā ca vuttaṃ ^b^sallekhasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.83) ‘‘phalasampayuttāni pana sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni ṭhapetvā sesadhammā sammāvimuttīti veditabbā’’ti.

[03]^b^142^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nijjiṇṇā^eb^ti nijjīritā, viddhastā vināsitāti attho. ^b^Phalaṃ kathita^eb^nti ‘‘sammādiṭṭhissa, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotī’’ti iminā vārena sāmaññaphalaṃ kathitanti vadanti, nijjīraṇaṃ paṭippassambhananti adhippāyo. Nijjīraṇaṃ pana samucchindananti katvā, ^b^majjhimabhāṇakā…pe… maggo kathitoti vadanti. Dassanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti pariññābhisamayādivasena catunnaṃ saccānaṃ paccakkhato dassanaṭṭhena. ^b^Viditakaraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti paccakkhena yathādiṭṭhānaṃ maggaphalānaṃ pākaṭakaraṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Tadadhimuttaṭṭhenā^eb^ti tasmiṃ yathāsacchikate nibbāne adhimuccanabhāvena.
[03]^b^Kusalapakkhā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0094^ea^ anavajjakoṭṭhāsā. ^b^Mahāvipākadānenā^eb^ti mahato vipulassa lokuttarassa sukhavipākassa ceva kāyikādidukkhavipākassa ca dānena.

[03]Yathā ^a^M2.0310^ea^ mahāvipākassa dānena mahācattārīsakaṃ, tathā bahutāyapi mahācattārīsakoti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘imasmiñca pana sutte pañca sammādiṭṭhiyo kathitā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Bahuatthopi hi ^b^mahā^eb^-saddo hoti ‘‘mahājano’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 2.65). Ettha ca ‘‘natthi dinna’’ntiādinā vatthubhedena dasa micchādiṭṭhidhammā kathitā, vatthubhedeneva, ‘‘atthi dinna’’ntiādinā dasa sammādiṭṭhidhammāti vīsati hoti. Yathā ‘‘sammādiṭṭhissa, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo pahotī’’tiādinā maggavasena dasa sammattadhammā, tappaṭipakkhabhūtā ‘‘micchādiṭṭhissa micchāsaṅkappo pahotī’’tiādinā atthato dasa micchattadhammāti vīsati, tathā phalavasena tesu evaṃ vīsati. Kathaṃ vārepi sammādiṭṭhiādayo dasāti vīsati? Evamete dve cattārīsakāni purimena saddhiṃ tayo cattārīsakā vibhāvitāti veditabbā.

[03]^b^143^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pasaṃsiyassa ujuvipaccanīkaṃ nindiyaṃ pasaṃsantopi atthato pasaṃsiyaṃ nindanto nāma hoti. Pasaṃsiyassa guṇaparidhaṃsanamukheneva hi nindiyassa pasaṃsāya pavattanatoti āha – ^b^‘‘micchādiṭṭhināmāyaṃ sobhanāti vadantopi sammādiṭṭhiṃ garahati nāmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Evamādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^saddena ‘‘natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.168; ma. ni. 2.227) evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti; tasmā ^b^evaṃvādino^eb^ti evaṃ hetu paṭikkhepavādinoti attho. ^b^Okkantaniyāmā^eb^ti ogāḷhamicchattaniyāmā. ^b^Evarūpaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^cūḷapuṇṇamasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ vuttanayameva tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Ediso hi ‘‘buddhānampi atekiccho’’tiādi vuttasadiso.

[03]^b^Attano nindābhayenā^eb^ti ‘‘sammādiṭṭhiñca nāmete garahantī’’ādinā upari parehi vattabbanindābhayena. ^b^Ghaṭṭanabhayenā^eb^ti tathā paresaṃ āsādanābhayena. Sahadhammena parena attano upari kātabbaniggaho upārambho, garahato parittāso upārambhabhayaṃ, taṃ pana atthato upavādabhayaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘upavādabhayenā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahācattārīsakasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^144^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0095^ea^^a^M2.0311^ea^ nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. ‘‘Aparaṃ visesa’’nti vuttattā visesavisayo ca pubbasaddoti āha – ^b^‘‘sīlaparipūraṇādito pubbavisesato’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^145^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āraddho^eb^ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipattiyā ārādhito. Yadatthāya sāsane pabbajjā, visesāpatti ca, tadevettha appattanti adhippetaṃ, taṃ jhānavipassanānimittanti āha – ^b^‘‘appattassa arahattassā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Komudī^eb^ti kumudavatī. Tadā kira kumudāni supupphitāni honti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘kumudānaṃ atthitāya komudī’’^eb^ti. Kumudānaṃ samūho, kumudāni eva vā komudā, te ettha atthīti ^b^komudī^eb^ti. ^b^Pavāraṇasaṅgaha^eb^nti mahāpavāraṇaṃ akatvā āgamanīyasaṅgahaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Āraddhavipassakassā^eb^ti ārabhitavipassanassa, vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ussukkāpetvā vipassissa. ^b^Bhikkhū idha osarissanti^eb^ vutthavassā pavāritapavāraṇā ‘‘bhagavantaṃ vandissāma, kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhessāma, yathāladdhaṃ visesañca pavedissāmā’’ti ajjhāsayena. ^b^Ime bhikkhū^eb^ti ime taruṇasamathavipassanā bhikkhū. ^b^Visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkhissanti^eb^ senāsanasappāyādialābhena. ^b^Apalibuddha^eb^nti aññehi anupaddutaṃ. ^b^Senāsanaṃ gahetuṃ na labhanti^eb^ antovassabhāvato. ^b^Ekassa dinnopi sabbesaṃ dinnoyeva hoti,^eb^ tasmā sutasutaṭṭhāneyeva ekamāsaṃ vasitvā osariṃsu.

[03]^b^146^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Alanti yuttaṃ,^eb^ opāyikanti attho, ‘‘alameva nibbinditu’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.272; saṃ. ni. 2.124, 128, 134, 143) viya. Puṭabaddhaṃ pariharitvā asitaṃ ^b^puṭosaṃ^eb^ a-kārassa o-kāraṃ katvā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pātheyya’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^147^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vipassanā kathitā^eb^ti aniccasaññāmukheneva vipassanābhāvanā kathitā. Na hi kevalāya aniccānupassanāya vipassanākiccaṃ samijjhati. ^b^Bahū bhikkhū^eb^ te ca vitthārarucikāti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0312^ea^ sabbavāresu. ‘‘Tasmā tiha, bhikkhave, vedanānupassī’’tiādīsupi pītipaṭisaṃveditādivaseneva ^a^V2.0096^ea^ vedanānupassanāya vuttattā, ^b^‘‘sukhavedanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti āha. Satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāmanasikāratāya vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘sādhukaṃ manasikāra’’^eb^nti. ^b^Saññānāmena paññā vuttā^eb^ tesaṃ payogattā. ^b^Manasikāranāmena vedanā vuttā,^eb^ bhāvanāya paricitattā ārammaṇassa manasikāranti katvā. ^b^Vitakkavicāre ṭhapetvā^eb^ti vuttaṃ vacīsaṅkhārattā tesaṃ.

[03]^b^Evaṃ santepī^eb^ti yadipi manasikārapariyāpannatāya ‘‘manasikāro’’ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ sante vedanānupassanābhāvo na yujjati, assāsapassāsā hissa ārammaṇaṃ. ^b^Vatthu^eb^nti sukhādīnaṃ vedanānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vatthuṃ ^b^ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vediyati,^eb^ vedanāya ekantabhāvadassanena tassa vedanānupassanābhāvo yujjati evāti imamatthaṃ dasseti. ^b^Etassa^eb^ anuyogassa.

[03]^b^Dvīhākārehī^eb^ti ye sandhāya vuttaṃ, te dassento ^b^‘‘ārammaṇato asammohato cā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Sappītike dve jhāne^eb^ti pītisahagatāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā ^b^samāpajjati. Samāpattikkhaṇe^eb^ti samāpajjanakkhaṇe. ^b^Jhānapaṭilābhenā^eb^ti jhānena samaṅgībhāvena. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā ^b^pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti^eb^ ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā. Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃviditova hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā; evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā eva hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā. ^b^Vipassanākkhaṇe^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāpubbaṅgamāya maggapaññāya visesato dassanakkhaṇe. ^b^Lakkhaṇapaṭivedhā^eb^ti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena. Yañhi pītiyā visesato sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ vidite sā yāthāvato viditā hoti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā vibhāvetuṃ, ^b^‘‘vuttampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^dīghaṃ assāsavasenā^eb^ti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena. ^b^Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato^eb^ti jhānapariyāpannaṃ avikkhepoti laddhanāmaṃ ^a^M2.0313^ea^ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato. Yatheva hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva honti. ^b^Sati upaṭṭhitā hotī^eb^ti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tasmiṃ ārammaṇe upaṭṭhite ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā eva nāma hoti. ^b^Tāya satiyā^eb^ti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena ^b^tena ñāṇena^eb^ suppaṭividitattā ^a^V2.0097^ea^ ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā ^b^sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Avasesapadānipī^eb^ti ‘‘dīghaṃ passāsavasenā’’tiādipadānipi.

[03]Evaṃ ^b^paṭisambhidāmagge^eb^ vuttamatthaṃ imasmiṃ sutte yojetvā dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘itī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Imināpi yoginā manasikārena paṭilabhitabbato paṭilābhoti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘jhānasampayutte vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Assāsapassāsanimitta^eb^nti assāsapassāse nissāya paṭiladdhapaṭibhāganimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kiñcāpi karoti; satiñca sampajaññañca upaṭṭhapetvā pavattanato ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā citte cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti. Evaṃ cittānupassanāpi satisampajaññabaleneva hotīti āha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. Pajahati etena, sayaṃ vā pajahatīti ^b^pahānaṃ,^eb^ ñāṇaṃ. ^b^Domanassavasena byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ dassitaṃ^eb^ tadekaṭṭhabhāvato. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti nīvaraṇapabbassa. ^b^Pahānakarañāṇa^eb^nti pajahanañāṇaṃ. ^b^Vipassanāparampara^eb^nti paṭipāṭiyā vipassanamāha. ^b^Samathapaṭipanna^eb^nti majjhimasamathanimittaṃ paṭipannacittaṃ ajjhupekkhati. ^b^Ekato upaṭṭhāna^eb^nti paṭipakkhavigamena ekabhāvena upaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Sahajātānaṃ ajjhupekkhanā hotī^eb^ti paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāpārassa anāpajjitattā ārammaṇānaṃ ajjhupekkhanā, ‘‘yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ pajahati upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī’’ti, evaṃ vuttājjhupekkhanā pavattāti paṭipannā. ^b^Kevalaṃ nīvaraṇādidhamme^eb^ti nīvaraṇādidhamme eva pahīne disvā, atha kho tesaṃ pajahanañāṇampi yāthāvato paññāya disvā ajjhupekkhitā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ‘‘dhammāpi kho, bhikkhave, pahātabbā, pageva adhammā’’ti (ma. ni. 1.240).

[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aniccādivasena^eb^^a^M2.0314^ea^^b^pavicinatī^eb^ti aniccādippakārehi vicinati passati. ^b^Nirāmisā^eb^ti kilesāmisarahitā. ^b^Kāyikacetasikadarathapaṭippassaddhiyā^eb^ti kāyacittānaṃ sādhubhāvūpagamanena vikkhambhitattā. Sahajātadhammānaṃ ekasabhāvena pavattiyā ^b^sahajātājjhupekkhanāya ajjhupekkhitā hoti^eb^.

[03]^b^Tasmiṃ kāye^eb^ pavattā kāyārammaṇā ^b^sati,^eb^ pubbabhāgiyo ^b^satisambojjhaṅgo^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. Somanassasahagatacittuppādavasena cetaṃ okkamanaṃ oliyanaṃ kosajjaṃ, tato ativattanaṃ atidhāvanaṃ uddhaccaṃ, tadubhayavidhurā bojjhaṅgupekkhābhūtā anosakkanānativattanasaṅkhātā majjhattākāratā. Idāni ^b^yatheva^eb^ hītiādinā tameva majjhattākāraṃ ^a^V2.0098^ea^ upamāya vibhāveti. ^b^Tudanaṃ vā^eb^ patodena. ^b^Ākaḍḍhanaṃ vā^eb^ rasminā. ^b^Natthi^eb^ na kātabbaṃ atthi. ^b^Ekacittakkhaṇikā^eb^ti ekekasmiṃ citte vipassanāvasena saha uppajjanakā. ^b^Nānārasalakkhaṇā^eb^ti nānākiccā ceva nānāsabhāvā ca.

[03]^b^152^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vuttatthāneva^eb^ sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ (ma. ni. aṭṭha. 27) ānāpānārammaṇā aparāparaṃ pavattasatiyo ārammaṇasīsena tadārammaṇā dhammā gahitā, tā panekasantāne lokiyacittasampayuttāti ^b^lokiyā,^eb^ tā vaḍḍhamānā ^b^lokiyaṃ^eb^ catubbidhampi ^b^satipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūrenti. Vijjāvimuttiphalanibbāna^eb^nti vimuttīnaṃ phalabhūtaṃ tehiyeva veditabbaṃ kilesanibbānaṃ, amatamahānibbānameva vijjāvimuttīnaṃ adhigamena adhigantabbatāya tathā vuttaṃ. Paripūraṇañcassa ārammaṇaṃ katvā amatassānubhavanameva. Idha sutte lokiyāpi bojjhaṅgā kathitā lokuttarāpīti ettakaṃ gahetvā, ^b^‘‘iti lokiyassa āgataṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti ca atthavaṇṇanāvasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ kathitaṃ. ^b^Thero^eb^ti mahādhammarakkhitatthero. ^b^Aññattha evaṃ hotī^eb^ti aññasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ tattha tattha vomissakanayena āgatasutte evaṃ lokiyaṃ āgataṃ, idha lokuttaraṃ āgatanti kathetabbaṃ hoti. ^b^Lokuttaraṃ upari āgata^eb^nti vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentīti evaṃ lokuttaraṃ upari desanāyaṃ āgataṃ; tasmā lokiyā eva bojjhaṅgā vijjāvimutti paripūrikā kathetabbā ^a^M2.0315^ea^ lokuttarānaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ vijjāgahaṇena gahitattā, tasmā therena vuttoyevettha attho gahetabbo. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
[06]Ānāpānassatisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^153-4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tappaṭisaraṇānaṃ ^a^V2.0099^ea^ kāmāvacarasattānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṭṭhena gehā kāmaguṇā, gehe sitā ārabbha pavattiyā allīnāti ^b^gehassitā. Sarantī^eb^ti vegasā pavattanti. Vegena hi pavatti dhāvatīti vuccati. ^b^Saṅkappā^eb^ti ye keci micchāsaṅkappā, byāpādavihiṃsāsaṅkappādayopi kāmaguṇasitā evāti. ^b^Gocarajjhattasmiṃyevā^eb^ti pariggahite kammaṭṭhāne eva vattanti. Tañhi dhammavasena upaṭṭhitāya bhāvanāya gocarabhāvato ‘‘gocarajjhatta’’nti vuttaṃ. Assāsapassāsakāye gatā pavattāti kāyagatā, taṃ ^b^kāyagatāsatiṃ^eb^. Satisīsena taṃsahagate bhāvanādhamme vadati assāsapassāsakāyādike taṃtaṃkoṭṭhāse samathavatthubhāvena pariggahetvā satiyā pariggahitattā; tathāpariggahite vā te ārabbha aniccādimanasikāravasena pavattā kāyārammaṇā satī satibhāvena vatvā ekajjhaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘kāyapariggāhika’’^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03]^b^Satipaṭṭhāne^eb^ti mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte (dī. ni. 2.378; ma. ni. 1.111), ^b^cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanā kathitā,^eb^ cuṇṇakajātāni aṭṭhikāni pariyosānaṃ katvā kāyānupassanā niddiṭṭhā, idha pana kesādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇavasena nibbattitānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena uparidesanāya vaḍḍhitattā aṭṭhārasavidhena kāyagatāsatibhāvanā.

[03]^b^156^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassa bhikkhuno^eb^ti yo kāyagatāsatibhāvanāya vasībhūto, tassa bhikkhuno. ^b^Sampayogavasena vijjaṃ bhajantī^eb^ti sahajāta-aññamañña-nissaya-sampayutta-atthi-avigatapaccayavasena vijjaṃ bhajanti, tāya saha ekībhāvamiva gacchantīti attho. ^b^Vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse^eb^^a^M2.0316^ea^^b^vattantī^eb^ti vijjāsabhāgatāya tadekadese vijjākoṭṭhāse vattanti. ^b^Tāhi sampayuttadhammā^eb^ phassādayo. Nanu cettha vijjānaṃ vijjābhāgiyatā na sambhavatīti? No na sambhavati. Yāya hi vijjāya vijjāsampayuttānaṃ vijjābhāgiyatā, sā taṃnimittāya vijjāya upacarīyatīti. ^b^Ekā vijjā vijjā, sesā vijjābhāgiyā^eb^ti aṭṭhasu vijjāsu ekaṃ ‘‘vijjā’’ti gahetvā itarā tassā bhāgatāya ‘‘vijjābhāgiyā’’ti veditabbā. Saddhiṃ pavattanasabhāvāsu ayameva vijjāti vattabbāti niyamassa abhāvato vijjābhāgo viya vijjābhāgiyāpi pavattati evāti vattabbaṃ. ^b^Āpopharaṇa^eb^nti paṭibhāganimittabhūtena āpokasiṇena sabbaso mahāsamuddapharaṇaṃ āpopharaṇaṃ nāma. Dibbacakkhuñāṇassa kiccaṃ pharaṇanti katvā, dibbacakkhuatthaṃ vā ālokapharaṇaṃ ^a^V2.0100^ea^^b^dibbacakkhupharaṇa^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ubhayasmimpi pakkhe samuddaṅgamānaṃ kunnadīnaṃ samuddantogadhattā tesaṃ cetasā phuṭatā veditabbā. ^b^Kunnadi^eb^ggahaṇañcettha kañcimeva kālaṃ sanditvā tāsaṃ udakassa samuddapariyāpannabhāvūpagamanattā, na bahi mahānadiyo viya parittakālaṭṭhitikāti.
[03]^b^Otāra^eb^nti kilesuppattiyā avasaraṃ, taṃ pana vivaraṃ chiddanti ca vuttaṃ. ^b^Ārammaṇa^eb^nti kilesuppattiyā olambanaṃ. ^b^Yāva pariyosānā^eb^ti mattikāpuñjassa yāva pariyosānā.

[03]^b^158^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiññāyā^eb^ti iddhividhādiabhiññāya. ^b^Sacchikātabbassā^eb^ti paccakkhato kātabbassa adhiṭṭhānavikubbanādidhammassa. ^b^Abhiññāva kāraṇa^eb^nti āha – ‘‘sacchikiriyāpekkhāya, abhiññākāraṇassa pana siddhiyā pākaṭā’’ti. ^b^Mariyādabaddhā^eb^ti udakamātikāmukhe katā.

[03]^b^Yuttayānaṃ viya katāya^eb^ icchiticchite kāle sukhena paccavekkhitabbattā. ^b^Patiṭṭhākatāyā^eb^ti sampattīnaṃ patiṭṭhābhāvaṃ pāpitāya. ^b^Anuppavattitāyā^eb^ti bhāvanābahulīkārehi anuppavattitāya. ^b^Paricayakatāyā^eb^ti āsevanadaḷhatāya suciraṃ paricayāya. ^b^Susampaggahitāyā^eb^ti sabbaso ukkaṃsaṃ pāpitāya. ^b^Susamāraddhāyā^eb^ti ativiya sammadeva nibbattikatāya. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Kāyagatāsatisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^160^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṅkhārupapatti^eb^nti ^a^V2.0101^ea^^a^M2.0317^ea^ vipākakkhandhasaññitānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ uppattiṃ, nibbattinti attho. Yasmā avadhāraṇaṃ etasmiṃ pade icchitabbanti, ^b^‘‘saṅkhārānaṃyeva upapatti’’^eb^nti vatvā tena nivattitaṃ dassento, ^b^‘‘na sattassā’’^eb^ti āha. Tena satto jīvo uppajjatīti micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipati. Evaṃ uppajjanakadhammavasena uppattiṃ dassetvā idāni uppattijanakadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘puññābhisaṅkhārena vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kāmesu puññābhisaṅkhārenapi upapatti hoti, sā pana imasmiṃ sutte gahitāti. ^b^Puññābhisaṅkhārena vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddo avuttatthāpekkhaṇavikappattho, avuttatthāpekkhāya pana na āgato ‘‘āneñjābhisaṅkhārenā’’ti. Atha vā upapatti āgatā, evaṃ kiccaṃ āgataṃ, āneñjābhisaṅkhāro panettha sarūpena anāgatopi puññābhisaṅkhāraggahaṇeneva gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārenā’’ti paṭhanti. ^b^Bhavūpagakkhandhāna^eb^nti sugatibhavūpagānaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ.

[03]^b^161^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lokikā vaṭṭanti^eb^ kammavaṭṭassa gahaṇato. Bhavūpapattihetubhūtā okappanīyasaddhā catupārisuddhisīlaṃ tādisaṃ buddhavacanabāhusaccaṃ āmisapariccāgo kammassakatāñāṇaṃ kammaphaladiṭṭhi ca ime ^b^saddhādayo^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^Ṭhapetī^eb^ti paṇidahanavasena ṭhapeti. Paṇidahatīti hi ayamettha attho. ^b^Patiṭṭhāpetī^eb^ti tattha suppatiṭṭhitaṃ katvā ṭhapeti. ^b^Sahapatthanāyā^eb^ti, ‘‘aho vatāhaṃ…pe… upapajjeyya’’nti evaṃ pavattapatthanāya saha. ^b^Saddhādayovā^eb^ti yathāvuttā saddhādayo eva ^b^pañca dhammā^eb^ upapattiyā saṅkharaṇaṭṭhena saṅkhārā, tasmā eva aññehi visiṭṭhabhavūpaharaṇaṭṭhena vihārā nāmāti. ^b^Tasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti tasmiṃ upapattiṭṭhāne.

[03]^b^Pañcadhammāva^eb^ taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo upapattiṃ maggati gavesati etenāti ^b^maggo^eb^. Paṭipajjati etāyāti ^b^paṭipadā^eb^. Cetanā panettha suddhasaṅkhāratāya saddhādiggahaṇeneva gahitā, tasmā avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ. Upapattipakappanavaseneva pavattiyā patthanāgahaṇeneva tassā gahaṇanti keci. Cittakarayuttagatinibbattanadhammavasena avadhāraṇassa katattā. Cetanā hi nāma kammaṃ, tassā upapattinibbattane vattabbameva natthi, tassā pana kiccakaraṇā saddhādayo patthanā cāti ime dhammā sahakārino bhavūpapattiyā niyāmakā hontīti tatrūpapattiyā pavattantīti tesaṃ maggādibhāvo vutto. Tenāha ^a^M2.0318^ea^^b^‘‘yassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tena saddhā patthanā cāti ubhaye dhammā sahitā ^a^V2.0102^ea^ hutvā kammaṃ visesentā gatiṃ niyamentīti dasseti, paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ aniyataṃ kevalassa kammassa vasenāti adhippāyo. Kāmañcettha ‘‘kammaṃ katvā’’ti vuttaṃ, kammāyūhanato pana pageva patthanaṃ ṭhapetumpi vaṭṭatiyeva. ^b^Kammaṃ katvā^eb^ti cettha ‘‘tāpetvā bhuñjati, bhutvā sayatī’’tiādīsu viya na kālaniyamo, kammaṃ katvā yadā kadāci patthanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti ca idaṃ cārittadassanaṃ viya vuttaṃ. Yathā hi bhavapatthanā yāva maggena na samucchijjati, tāva anuppannābhinavakatūpacitassa kammassa paccayo hotiyeva. Puna tathā visesapaccayo, yathā niyametvā uppāditā. Tena vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘yassa pañca dhammā atthi, na patthanā tassa gati anibaddhā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^165^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabbasovā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ kāḷakaṃ sāmaṃ setaṃ haritaṃ maṇḍalaṃ aparimaṇḍalaṃ caturaṃsaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ khuddakaṃ mahanta’’ntiādinā sabbasova ^b^pākaṭaṃ hoti^eb^.
[03]^b^167^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sundaro^eb^ti kāḷakādidosarahitatāya sobhano. ^b^Ākarasampanno^eb^ sampannāakaruppattiyā. ^b^Dhovanādīhī^eb^ti dhovanatāpanamajjanādīhi.

[03]^b^168^eb^^b^.^eb^ Lokadhātūnaṃ satasahassaṃ attano vase vattanato ^b^satasahasso^eb^. Tassa pana tattha obhāsakaraṇaṃ pākaṭanti āha ^b^‘‘ālokapharaṇabrahmā’’^eb^ti. Ayameva nayo heṭṭhā ‘‘sahasso brahmā’’tiādīsupi. ^b^Nikkhena kata^eb^nti nikkhaparimāṇena jambonadena kataṃ. Nikkhaṃ pana vīsatisuvaṇṇanti keci. Pañcavīsatisuvaṇṇanti apare. Suvaṇṇaṃ nāma catudharaṇanti vadanti. ^b^Ghaṭṭanamajjanakkhamaṃ na hoti^eb^ parittabhāvato. ^b^Atirekenā^eb^ti pañcasuvaṇṇātirekena nikkhappamāṇaṃ asampattena. ^b^Vaṇṇavantaṃ pana na hoti^eb^ avipulatāya uḷāraṃ hutvā anupaṭṭhānato. Avaṇṇavantatāya eva ^b^pharusadhātukaṃ khāyati. Tāsū^eb^ti tāsu bhūmīsu, yattha sākhā vaḍḍhitvā ṭhitā. ^b^Te^eb^ti suvaṇṇaṅkurā. ^b^Pacitvā^eb^ti tāpetvā. ^b^Sampahaṭṭha^eb^nti samujjalīkatanti āha – ^b^‘‘dhotaghaṭṭitapamajjita’’^eb^nti, tambamattikalepaṃ katvā dhotañceva pāsāṇādinā ghaṭṭitañca eḷakalomādinā pamajjitañcāti attho.

[03]^b^Etadevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0319^ea^ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ettha ālokapharaṇameva. Atha vā yaṃ dibbacakkhupharaṇaṃ, ālokapharaṇampi ^b^etadeva^eb^. Yattakañhi ṭhānaṃ yogī kasiṇālokena pharati; tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ phusatīti dibbacakkhupharaṇe dassite ālokapharaṇaṃ dassitamevāti attho. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbasmiṃ ‘‘pharitvā’’ti āgataṭṭhāne. ^b^Avināsentenā^eb^ti asambhinnena.

[03]^b^Kasiṇapharaṇaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0103^ea^^b^viyā^eb^ti kasiṇobhāsena pharaṇaṃ viya ^b^dissati^eb^ upaṭṭhāti, maṇipabhāpharaṇassa viya brahmaloke dhātupharaṇassa dassitattāti adhippāyo. Sarīrapabhā pana nikkhapabhāsadisāti, ^b^‘‘nikkhopamme sarīrapharaṇaṃ viya dissatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhakathā nāma natthī^eb^ti pāḷipadassa atthavaṇṇanāya nāma nicchitāya bhavitabbaṃ, avinicchitāya pana natthi viyāti akathanaṃ nāma aṭṭhakathāya anāciṇṇanti tassa vādaṃ ^b^paṭikkhipitvā^eb^. Yathā hi vattabbaṃ, tathā avatvā ‘‘viyā’’ti vacanaṃ kimatthiyanti adhippāyo. Buddhānaṃ byāmappabhā byāmappadese sabbakālaṃ adhiṭṭhāti viya tassa brahmuno ^b^sarīrapharaṇaṃ^eb^ sarīrābhāya pattharaṇaṃ ^b^sabbakālikaṃ. Cattārimāni^eb^ itarāni pharaṇāni ^b^avināsetvā^eb^ aññamaññamabhinditvā ^b^kathetabbaṃ. Pharaṇapadasseva vevacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘adhimuccaneneva pharaṇa’’nti. ^b^Pattharatī^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ pharaṇavasena pattharati. ^b^Jānātī^eb^ti adhimuccanavasena jānāti.

[03]^b^169^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena subhe saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Ābhā^eb^ti dutiyajjhānabhūmike deve ekajjhaṃ gahetvā sādhāraṇato vuttaṃ. Tato ^b^subhā^eb^ti tatiyajjhānabhūmike. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pāṭiyekkā devā natthī’’^eb^tiādi. Sādhāraṇato katāyapi patthanāya jhānaṅgaṃ parittaṃ bhāvitañce, parittābhesu upapatti hoti, majjhimañce, appamāṇābhesu, paṇītañce, ābhassaresu upapatti hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Subhā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. Heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva suviññeyyoti āha – ^b^‘‘vehapphalādivārā pākaṭāyevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kāmāvacaresu nibbattatū^eb^tiādinā saddhādīnaṃ ajjhānavipassanānaṃ kathaṃ tadadhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti āsaṅkati. Itaro saddhādīnaṃ ajjhānasabhāvattepi jhānavipassanānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ nissayapaccayādivasena sappaccayattā brahmalokūpapattiṃ nibbānañca āvahantīti dassento, ^b^‘‘ime pañca dhammā’’^eb^tiādimāha ^a^M2.0320^ea^. Tattha ^b^sīla^eb^nti sambhārasīlaṃ. Anāgāmī samucchinnaorambhāgiyasaṃyojano samāno sace sabbaso upapattiyo atikkamituṃ na sakkoti, ariyabhūmīsu eva nibbattati yathūpacitajhānakammunāti āha – ^b^‘‘anāgāmi…pe… nibbattatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uparimagga^eb^nti aggamaggaṃ bhāvetvā. ^b^Āsavakkhaya^eb^nti sabbaso āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pahānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Saṅkhārupapattisuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca anupadavaggavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^176^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kālaparicchedaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0104^ea^^a^M2.0321^ea^^b^katvā^eb^ti samāpajjantehi nāma kālaparicchedo kātabbo. Thero pana bhagavato vattakaraṇatthaṃ kālaparicchedaṃ karoti, ‘‘ettake kāle vītivatte idaṃ nāma bhagavato kātabba’’nti. So tatthakaṃyeva samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāti, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘kālaparicchedaṃ katvā’’ti. ^b^Suññatāphalasamāpattiṃ appetvā^eb^ti etena itare, ‘‘na sotāpannasakadāgāmī phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjantī’’ti vadanti, taṃ vādaṃ paṭisedheti. ^b^Suññato^eb^ti attasuññato ca niccasuññato ca saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahiṃsu. Sekkhānañhi suññatāpaṭivedho pādesiko subhasukhasaññānaṃ appahīnattā, tasmā so thero suññatākathaṃ sotukāmo jāto. ^b^Dhurena dhuraṃ paharantena viyā^eb^ti rathadhurena rathadhuraṃ paharantena viya katvā ujukameva suññatā…pe… vatthuṃ na sakkāti yojanā. ^b^Ekaṃ pada^eb^nti ekaṃ suññatāpadaṃ.

[03]^b^Pubbepāha^eb^ntiādinā bhagavā paṭhamabodhiyampi attano suññatāvihārabāhullaṃ pakāsetīti dassento ^b^‘‘paṭhamabodhiyampī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Eko^eb^tiādi therassa suññatākathāya bhājanabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Sotu^eb^nti aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbacetasā samannāharitvā sotumpi. ^b^Uggahetumpi^eb^ti yathābhūtaṃ dhammaṃ dhāraṇaparipucchāparicayavasena hadayena uggahitaṃ suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasā viya avinaṭṭhe kātumpi. ^b^Kathetumpī^eb^ti vitthārena paresaṃ dassetumpi sakkā. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti migāramātupāsāde. ^b^Kaṭṭharūpapotthakarūpacittarūpavasena katā^eb^ti thambhādīsu uttiritvā katānaṃ kaṭṭharūpānaṃ, niyyūhādīsu paṭimāvasena racitānaṃ potthakarūpānaṃ, sittipasse cittakammavasena viracitānaṃ cittarūpānañca katā niṭṭhapitā. ^b^Vessavaṇamandhātādīna^eb^nti paṭimārūpena katānaṃ vessavaṇamandhātusakkādīnaṃ. ^b^Cittakammavasenā^eb^ti ārāmādicittakammavasena. ^b^Saṇṭhitampī^eb^ti avayavabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ hutvā ṭhitampi. ^b^Jiṇṇapaṭisaṅkharaṇattha^eb^nti jiṇṇānaṃ niyyūhakūṭāgārapāsādāvayavānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇatthāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne ^a^V2.0105^ea^ rahassasaññāṇena ṭhapitaṃ. ‘‘Paribhuñjissāmī’’ti tasmiṃ ^a^M2.0322^ea^ tasmiṃ kicce viniyuñjanavasena ^b^paribhuñjitabbassa. Etaṃ vutta^eb^nti, ‘‘ayaṃ migāramātupāsādo suñño’’tiādikaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Nicca^eb^nti sabbakālaṃ rattiñca divā ca. ^b^Ekabhāvaṃ ekaṃ asuññata^eb^nti paccatte upayogavacanaṃ, ekattaṃ eko asuññatoti attho. ^b^Gāmoti pavattanavasenā^eb^ti gehasannivesavīthicaccarasiṅghāṭakādike upādāya gāmoti lokuppattivasena. ^b^Kilesavasenā^eb^ti tattha anunayapaṭighavasena. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā ‘‘pavattavasena vā kilesavasena vā uppannaṃ manussasañña’’nti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Ettha ca yathā gāmaggahaṇena gharādisaññā saṅgahitā, evaṃ manussaggahaṇena itthipurisādisaññā saṅgahitā. Yasmā rukkhādike paṭicca araññasaññā tattha pabbatavanasaṇḍādayo antogadhā, tasmā tattha vijjamānampi taṃ vibhāgaṃ aggahetvā ekaṃ araññaṃyeva paṭicca araññasaññaṃ manasi karoti. ^b^Otaratī^eb^ti anuppavisati. ^b^Adhimuccatī^eb^ti nicchinoti. ^b^Pavattadarathā^eb^ti tathārūpāya passaddhiyā abhāvato oḷārikadhammappavattisiddhā darathā. ^b^Kilesadarathā^eb^ti anunayapaṭighasambhavā kilesadarathā. ^b^Dutiyapade^eb^ti ‘‘ye assu darathā manussasaññaṃ paṭiccā’’ti imasmiṃ pade. Manasikārasantatāya, – ‘‘nāyaṃ pubbe viya oḷārikā, dhammappavattī’’ti saṅkhāradassanadarathānaṃ sukhumatā sallahukatā ca caritatthāti āha ^b^‘‘pavattadarathamattā atthī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yaṃ kilesadarathajātaṃ, taṃ imissā darathasaññāya na hotīti yojanā. Pavattadarathamattaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti, vijjamānameva atthi idanti pajānātīti yojanā. ^b^Suññatā nibbattī^eb^ti suññatanti pavatti. Suññatā sahacaritañhi suññaṃ, idha suññatāti vuttā.

[03]^b^177^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato ^b^evaṃ^eb^ idāni vuccamānākārena cittappavatti ahosi. ^b^Accantasuññata^eb^nti ‘‘paramānuttara’’nti vuttaṃ arahattaṃ desessāmīti. ^b^Araññasaññāya visesānadhigamanato^eb^ti, ‘‘araññaṃ arañña’’nti manasikārena jhānādivisesassa adhigamābhāvato, ‘‘pathavī’’ti manasikārena visesādhigamanato. Idāni tamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ti evaṃ vapite sāliādayo ^b^sampajjanti. Dhuvasevana^eb^nti niyatasevanaṃ pārihāriyakammaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Paṭiccā^eb^ti ettha ‘‘sambhūta’’nti vacanaseso icchitoti āha ^b^‘‘paṭicca sambhūta’’^eb^nti. Pathaviṃ paṭicca sambhūtā hi saññāti.

[03]^b^Pathavīkasiṇe^eb^^a^M2.0323^ea^^b^so pathavīsaññī hoti,^eb^ na pakatipathaviyaṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti pathavīkasiṇassa. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0106^ea^ gaṇḍādīhi. ^b^Suṭṭhu vihata^eb^nti yathā valīnaṃ lesopi na hoti, evaṃ sammadeva ākoṭitaṃ. Nadītaḷākādīnaṃ tīrappadeso udakassa ākaraṭṭhena kūlaṃ, unnatabhāvato uggataṃ kūlaṃ viyāti ^b^ukkūlaṃ,^eb^ bhūmiyā uccaṭṭhānaṃ. Vigataṃ kūlanti ^b^vikkūlaṃ,^eb^ nīcaṭṭhānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uccanīca’’^eb^nti. ^b^Ekaṃ sañña^eb^nti ekaṃ pathavītisaññaṃyeva.

[03]^b^182^eb^^b^.^eb^ Satipi saṅkhāranimittavirahe yādisānaṃ nimittānaṃ abhāvena ‘‘animitta’’nti vuccati, tāni dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘niccanimittādivirahito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Catumahābhūtikaṃ^eb^ catumahābhūtanissitaṃ. ^b^Saḷāyatanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ^eb^ cakkhāyatanādisaḷāyatanasahitaṃ.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vipassanāya paṭivipassana^eb^nti dhammānañca puna vipassanaṃ. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti attano paccakkhabhūtayathādhigatamaggaphalaṃ vadatīti āha – ^b^‘‘ariyamagge ceva ariyaphale cā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upādisesadarathadassanattha^eb^nti sabbaso kilesupadhiyā pahīnāya khandhopadhi avisiṭṭhā, tappaccayā darathā upādisesadarathā, taṃ dassanatthaṃ. Yasmā visayato gāmasaññā oḷārikā, manussasaññā sukhumā, tasmā ^b^manussasaññāya gāmasaññaṃ nivattetvā^eb^. Yasmā pana manussasaññāpi sabhāgavatthupariggahato oḷārikā, sabhāgavatthuto araññasaññā sukhumā, tasmā ^b^araññasaññāya manussasaññaṃ nivattetvā^eb^. Pathavīsaññādinivattane kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā suttantaresu ca vuttameva. ^b^Anupubbenā^eb^ti maggappaṭipāṭiyā. Niccasārādīnaṃ sabbaso avatthutāya accantameva suññattā ^b^accantasuññatā^eb^.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suññataphalasamāpatti^eb^nti suññatavimokkhassa phalabhūtattā, suññatānupassanāya vasena samāpajjitabbattā ca suññataphalasamāpattinti laddhanāmaṃ arahattaphalasamāpattiṃ. Yasmā atīte paccekasambuddhā ahesuṃ, anāgate bhavissanti, idāni pana buddhasāsanassa dharamānattā paccekabuddhā na vattanti, tasmā paccekabuddhaggahaṇaṃ akatvā, ^b^‘‘etarahipi buddhabuddhasāvakasaṅkhātā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Na hi buddhasāsane dharante paccekabuddhā bhavanti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Cūḷasuññatasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chavivaṇṇena^eb^^a^M2.0324^ea^^a^V2.0107^ea^^b^so kāḷo,^eb^ na nāmena. ^b^Palālasanthāroti ādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kocchacimilikākaṭasārādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. ^b^Gaṇabhikkhūna^eb^nti gaṇabandhanavasena bhikkhūnaṃ.

[03]Yadi saṃsayo nāma natthi, ‘‘sambahulā nu kho’’ti idaṃ kathanti āha ^b^‘‘vitakkapubbabhāgā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha vitakko pubbabhāgo etissāti ^b^vitakkapubbabhāgā, pucchā^eb^. Sā ‘‘sambahulā no ettha bhikkhūviharantī’’ti vacanaṃ, vitakko pana ‘‘sambahulā nu kho idha bhikkhū viharantī’’ti iminā ākārena tadā bhagavato uppanno cittasaṅkappo, tassa parivitakkassa tabbhāvajotanoyaṃ nu-kāro vuttoti dassento āha – ^b^‘‘vitakkapubbabhāge cāyaṃ nu-kāro nipātamatto’’^eb^ti. Kiñcāpi gacchanto disvā, ‘‘sambahulā no ettha bhikkhū viharantī’’ti pucchāvasena bhagavatā vutto, atha kho ‘‘na kho, ānanda, bhikkhu sobhati saṅgaṇikārāmo’’tiādi (ma. ni. 3.185) uparidesanāvasena matthakaṃ gacchante avinicchito nāma na hoti, atha kho visuṃ vinicchito eva hoti, disvā nicchinitvāva kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ tathā pucchati. Tathā hi vuttaṃ – ‘‘jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantī’’ti (pārā. 16). Tenāha ^b^‘‘ito kirā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yathā nadīotiṇṇaṃ udakaṃ yathāninnaṃ pakkhandati, evaṃ sattā dhātuso saṃsandanti, tasmā ^b^‘‘gaṇavāso nadīotiṇṇaudakasadiso’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idāni tamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ – ^b^‘‘nirayatiracchānayonī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Kuruvindādinhānīyacuṇṇāni saṇhasukhumabhāvato nāḷiyaṃ pakkhittāni nirantarāneva tiṭṭhantīti āha – ^b^‘‘cuṇṇabharitā nāḷi viyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sattapaṇṇāsa kulasatasahassānī^eb^ti sattasatasahassādhikāni paññāsa kulānaṃyeva satasahassāni, manussānaṃ pana vasena satta koṭiyo tadā tattha vasiṃsu.

[03]^b^Tato cintesi,^eb^ kathaṃ? Kāmañcāyaṃ lokapakati, mayhaṃ pana sāsane ayuttova soti āha – ^b^‘‘mayā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dhamma^eb^nti sabhāvasiddhaṃ. ^b^Saṃvego^eb^ti sahottappañāṇaṃ vuccati. ^b^Na kho panetaṃ sakkā^eb^ gilānupaṭṭhānaovādānusāsaniādivasena samāgamassa icchitabbattā. ^b^Gaṇabhedana^eb^nti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya vivecanaṃ.
[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kataparibhaṇḍa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0108^ea^^a^M2.0325^ea^ pubbe katasaṃvidhānassa cīvarassa vuttākārena paṭisaṅkharaṇaṃ. ^b^No^eb^ti amhākaṃ. ^b^Anattamano^eb^ti anārādhitacitto.

[03]Sakagaṇena sahabhāvato ^b^saṅgaṇikā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sakaparisasamodhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gaṇo^eb^ti pana idha janasamūhoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nānājanasamodhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sobhati^eb^ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamānato. Kāmato nikkhamatīti ^b^nikkhamo,^eb^ evaṃ nikkhamavasena uppannaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^. Gaṇasaṅgaṇikākilesasaṅgaṇikāhi pavivitti ^b^paviveko^eb^. Pavivekavasena uppannaṃ ^b^sukhaṃ^eb^. Rāgādīnaṃ upasamāvahaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^upasamasukhaṃ^eb^. Maggasambodhāvahaṃ sukhaṃ ^b^sambodhisukhaṃ^eb^. Nikāmetabbassa, nikāmaṃ vā lābhī ^b^nikāmalābhī^eb^. Nidukkhaṃ sukheneva labhatīti ^b^adukkhalābhī^eb^. Kasiraṃ vuccati appakanti āha – ^b^‘‘akasiralābhīti vipulalābhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sāmāyika^eb^nti samaye kilesavimuccanaṃ accantamevāti sāmāyikaṃ ma-kāre a-kārassa dīghaṃ katvā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘appitappitasamaye kilesehi vimutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kanta^eb^nti aṅgasantatāya ārammaṇasantatāya ca kamanīyaṃ manorammaṃ. ^b^Asāmāyikaṃ^eb^ accantavimuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ettāvatā^eb^tiādinā saṅgaṇikārāmassa visesādhigamassa antarāyikabhāvaṃ anvayato byatirekato ca saha nidassanena dasseti. Tattha sā duvidhā antarāyikatā vodānadhammānaṃ anuppattihetukā, saṃkilesadhammānaṃ uppattihetukā ca.

[03]Te paṭhamaṃ ‘‘saṅgaṇikārāmo’’tiādinā vibhāvetvā itaraṃ vibhāvetuṃ, ^b^‘‘idāni dosuppattiṃ dassento’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Aṭṭhiñca paṭicca nhāruñca paṭicca cammañca paṭicca maṃsañca paṭicca ākāso parivārito rūpantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.306) viya idha ^b^rūpa^eb^saddo karajakāyapariyāyoti ^b^‘‘rūpanti sarīra’’^eb^nti āha. ‘‘Nāhaṃ, ānanda…pe… domanassupāyāsā’’ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhacittānaṃ āraddhavipassakānampi asappāyavajjanasappāyasevanavasena kāyassa pariharaṇaṃ hotīti? Saccaṃ, taṃ pana yo kallasarīraṃ nissāya dhammasādhanāya anuyuñjitukāmo hoti, tasseva dhammasādhanatāvasena. Dhammasādhanabhāvañhi apekkhitvā asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyavasena posetvā suṭṭhutaraṃ hutvā ^a^M2.0326^ea^ anuyuñjanato kāyassa pariharaṇaṃ, na so kāye abhirato nāma hoti paccavekkhaṇāyattattā apekkhāya vinoditabbo tādisoti. ^b^Upāligahapatino^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘dasabalasāvakattupagamanasaṅkhātenā’’ti ānetvā yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^187^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahākaruṇāvasena ^a^V2.0109^ea^ parivutāya ^b^parisāya majjhe nisinnopi^eb^ ekantavivekajjhāsayattā ^b^ekakova^eb^. Etena satthuno pavivittassa pavivekattena vivittataṃ dasseti. Rūpārūpapaṭibhāganimittehi nivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhatanimittāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Ativiya santatarapaṇītatamabhāvena visesato sinoti bandhatīti ^b^visayo,^eb^ so eva sasantatipariyāpannatāya ^b^ajjhattaṃ^eb^. Kiṃ pana tanti āha – ^b^‘‘suññatanti suññataphalasamāpatti’’^eb^nti. Upadhivivekatāya asaṅkhatā dhātu idha vivekoti adhippetoti āha – ^b^‘‘vivekaninnenā’’^eb^tiādi. Bhaṅgamattampi asesetvā āsavaṭṭhāniyānañca dhammānaṃ tattha vigatattā tesaṃ vasena ^b^vigatantena,^eb^ evaṃbhūtaṃ tesaṃ byantibhāvaṃ pattanti pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘byantibhūtenā’’ti vuttaṃ. Uyyojanaṃ vissajjanaṃ, taṃ etassa atthi, uyyojeti vissajjetīti vā uyyojanikaṃ. Yasmā na sabbakathā uyyojanavaseneva pavattati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uyyojanikapaṭisaṃyutta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Telapākaṃ gaṇhanto viyā^eb^ti yathā telapāko nāma paricchinnakālo na atikkamitabbo, evaṃ attano samāpattikālaṃ anatikkamitvā. Yathā hi kusalo vejjo telaṃ pacanto taṃ taṃ telakiccaṃ cintetvā yadi vā patthinnapāko, yadi vā majjhimapāko, yadi vā kharapāko icchitabbo, tassa kālaṃ upadhāretvā pacati, evaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desento veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākaṃ upadhāretvā taṃ taṃ kālaṃ anatikkamitvā dhammaṃ desetvā parisaṃ uyyojento ca ^b^vivekaninneneva cittena uyyojeti. Dve pañcaviññāṇānipi^eb^ tadabhinīhatamanoviññāṇavasena ^b^nibbānaninnāneva^eb^. Buddhānañhi saṅkhārānaṃ suṭṭhu pariññātatāya paṇītānampi rūpādīnaṃ āpāthagamane pageva itaresaṃ paṭikūlatāva supākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhāti, tasmā ghammābhitattassa viya sītajalaṭṭhānaninnatā nibbānaninnameva cittaṃ hoti, tassa ativiya santapaṇītabhāvato.

[03]^b^188^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajjhattamevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0327^ea^ idha jhānārammaṇaṃ adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘gocarajjhattamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Idha niyakajjhattaṃ^eb^ suññataṃ. Apaguṇapādakajjhānañhi ettha ‘‘niyakajjhatta’’nti adhippetaṃ vipassanāvisesassa adhippetattā, ^b^niyakajjhattaṃ^eb^ nijjīvanissattataṃ, anattatanti attho. ^b^Asampajjanabhāvajānanenā^eb^ti idāni me kammaṭṭhānaṃ vīthipaṭipannaṃ na hoti, uppathameva pavattatīti jānanena.

[03]Kasmā panettha bhagavatā vipassanāya eva pādake jhāne avatvā pādakajjhānaṃ gahitanti āha – ^b^‘‘appaguṇapādakajjhānato’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na pakkhandati^eb^ sammā na samāhitattā. So pana ‘‘ajjhattadhammā ^a^V2.0110^ea^ mayhaṃ nijjaṭā nigumbā hutvā na upaṭṭhahanti, handāhaṃ bahiddhādhamme manasi kareyyaṃ ekaccesu saṅkhāresu upaṭṭhitesu itarepi upaṭṭhaheyyumevā’’ti ^b^parassa…pe… manasi karoti^eb^. Pādakajjhānavasena viya sammasitajjhānavasenapi ubhatobhāgavimutto hotiyevāti āha – ^b^‘‘arūpasamāpattiyaṃ nu kho kathanti āneñjaṃ manasi karotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na me cittaṃ pakkhandatī^eb^ti mayhaṃ vipassanācittaṃ vīthipaṭipannaṃ hutvā na vahatīti. ^b^Pādakajjhānamevā^eb^ti vipassanāya pādakabhūtameva jhānaṃ. ^b^Punappunaṃ manasi kātabba^eb^nti punappunaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ vipassanāya tikkhavisadatāpādanāya. ^b^Avahante^eb^ nipuṇābhāvena chedanakiriyāya appavattante. Samāpajjitvā vipassanāya tikkhakammakaraṇaṃ samathavipassanāvihārenāti āha – ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhāne manasikāro vahatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sampajjati me^eb^ti vīthipaṭipattiyā pubbenāparaṃ visesābhāvato sampajjati me kammaṭṭhānanti jānanena. ^b^Iriyāpathaṃ ahāpetvā^eb^ti yathā parissamo nāgacchati, evaṃ attano balānurūpaṃ tassa kālaṃ netvā pamāṇameva pavattanena iriyāpathaṃ ahopetvā. ^b^Sabbavāresū^eb^ti ṭhānanisajjāsayanavāresu. Kathāvāresu pana visesaṃ tattha tattha vadanti. ^b^Idaṃ vutta^eb^nti idaṃ, ‘‘iminā vihārenā’’tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmavitakkādayo oḷārikakāmarāgabyāpādasabhāgāti āha – ^b^‘‘vitakkapahānena dve magge kathetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāmaguṇesū^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. ^b^Kismiñcideva kilesuppattikāraṇe^eb^ti tassa puggalassa kilesuppattikāraṇaṃ ^a^M2.0328^ea^ sandhāya vuttaṃ, aññathā sabbepi pañca kāmaguṇā kilesuppattikāraṇameva. Samudācaratīti ^b^samudācāro^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘samudācaraṇato’’^eb^ti. So pana yasmā cittassa, na sattassa, tasmā vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘cetaso’’ti. Ma-kāro padasandhikaro e-kārassa ca akāro katoti āha ^b^‘‘evaṃ sante eta^eb^nti.

[03]^b^191^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anusayo^eb^ti mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayoti tividhopi anusayo ^b^pahīyati^eb^ arahattamaggena. ^b^Vuttanayenevā^eb^ti, ‘‘tato maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ, phalato vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhamāno pahīnabhāvaṃ jānāti, tassa jānanena sampajāno hotī’’ti vuttanayena.

[03]Kusalato āyātīti āyato, so etesanti ^b^kusalāyatikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kusalato āgatā’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana nesaṃ kusalāyatikattaṃ upanissayavasena hoti sahajātavasenapīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘seyyathida’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Yasmā ^a^V2.0111^ea^ pana yathāvuttadhammesu keci lokiyā, keci lokuttarā; atha kasmā visesena ‘‘lokuttarā’’ti vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘loke uttarā visiṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Tena lokiyadhammesu uttamabhāvena jhānādayo lokuttarā vuttā, na lokassa uttaraṇatoti dasseti. Yaṃ kiñci mahaggatacittaṃ mārassa avisayo akāmāvacarattā, pageva taṃ vipassanāya pādakabhūtaṃ suvikkhālitamalanti āha – ^b^‘‘jānituṃ na sakkotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eko ānisaṃso atthi^eb^ bhāvanānuyogassa sappāyadhammakathāpaṭilābho.

[03]^b^192^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etadattha^eb^nti kevalassa sutassa atthāya. ^b^Sappāyāsappāyavasenā^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu sappāyavasena dasakathāvatthūni āgatānīti? Saccametaṃ, asappāyakathāvajjanapubbikāya sappāya kathāya vasena āgatattā ^b^‘‘sappāyāsappāyavasena āgatānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sutapariyattivasenā^eb^ti sarūpena tattha anāgatānipi dasakathāvatthūni suttageyyādiantogadhattā, ^b^‘‘sutapariyattivasena āgatānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Paripūraṇavasena sarūpato āgatattā ^b^imasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā kathetabbāni. Attho^eb^ti sāmaññattho.

[03]^b^193^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anuāvattantī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0329^ea^ anuanu abhimukhā hutvā vattanti, payirupāsanādivasena anukūlayanti. ^b^Mucchanataṇha^eb^nti paccayesu mucchanākāraṃ. Taṇhāya patthanā nāma tenākārena pavattīti āha – ^b^‘‘pattheti pavattetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kilesūpaddavenā^eb^ti kilesasaṅkhātena upaddavena. Kilesā hi sattānaṃ mahānatthakaraṇato ‘‘upaddavo’’ti vuccanti. Attano abbhantare uppannena kilesūpaddavena antevāsino, upaddavo ^b^antevāsūpaddavo,^eb^ brahmacariyassa upaddavo ^b^brahmacārupaddavo^eb^ti imamatthaṃ ^b^‘‘sesupaddavesupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti iminā atidisati. ^b^Guṇamaraṇaṃ kathitaṃ,^eb^ na jīvitamaraṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Appalābhā^eb^ti appamattakalābhī visesānaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ vutto^eb^ti yathāvuttabrahmacārupaddavo dukkhavipākataro ceva kaṭukavipākataro cāti evaṃ vutto. Ācariyantevāsikūpaddavo hi bāhirakasamayavasena vutto, brahmacārupaddavo pana sāsanavasena. Durakkhāte hi dhammavinaye duppaṭipatti na mahāsāvajjā micchābhinivesassa sithilavāyāmabhāvato; svākhyāte pana dhammavinaye duppaṭipatti mahāsāvajjā mahato atthassa bāhirabhāvakaraṇato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sāsane panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^196^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmā^eb^ti idaṃ pubbaparāpekkhaṃ purimassa ca atthassa kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasananti āha ^a^V2.0112^ea^^b^‘‘yasmā’’^eb^tiādi. Mittaṃ etassa atthīti mittavā, tassa bhāvo ^b^mittavatā,^eb^ tāya. Mittavasena paṭipajjananti āha ^b^‘‘mittapaṭipattiyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sapattavatāyā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattampī^eb^ti iminā pageva itaraṃ vītikkamantoti dasseti. Sāvakesu hitaparakkamanaṃ ovādānusāsanīhi paṭipajjananti āha – ^b^‘‘tathā na paṭipajjissāmī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āmakamatta^eb^nti kulālabhājanaṃ vuccati. ^b^Nāhaṃ tumhesu tathā paṭipajjissāmī^eb^ti kumbhakāro viya āmakabhājanesu ahaṃ tumhesu kevalaṃ jānāpento na paṭipajjissāmi. ^b^Niggaṇhitvā^eb^ti nīharitvā. ^b^Lokiyaguṇāpi idha sārotveva adhippetā^eb^ lokuttaraguṇānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahāsuññatasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^197^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vibhattipatirūpakā ^a^V2.0113^ea^^a^M2.0330^ea^ ca nipātā hontīti yathārahaṃ taṃtaṃvibhattiatthadīpakā, idha paccattavacano ^b^yatra^eb^saddo, ^b^hi^eb^saddo hetuattho, ^b^nāma^eb^saddo acchariyattho, padattayassa pana acchariyatthaniddiṭṭhatāya ^b^‘‘acchariyatthe nipāto’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Ekaṃsato panetaṃ padattayaṃ. Tathā hi vakkhati, ‘‘yatrāti nipātavasena anāgatavacana’’nti. ^b^Papañca^eb^saddo heṭṭhā vutto. ^b^Chinnavaṭume^eb^ti iminā sabbakilesavaṭṭassa akusalakammavaṭṭassa ca chinnattā vipākavaṭṭassa ca upari vakkhamānattā āha – ^b^‘‘vaṭumanti kusalākusalakammavaṭṭaṃ vuccatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nipātavasena^eb^ yatrasaddayogena. ^b^Anāgatavacana^eb^nti idaṃ anāgatavacanasadisattā vuttaṃ. Anāgatatthavācī hi anāgatavacanaṃ, attho cettha atītoti. ^b^Anussarī^eb^ti idaṃ anussaritabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – ‘‘na anussarissatī’’ti saddapayogassa atītavisayattā. Yadā pana tehi bhikkhūhi yā kathā pavattitā, tato pacchāpi bhagavato tesaṃ buddhānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ hotiyeva.

[03]^b^Khattiyajaccā^eb^tiādikālato paṭṭhāya asambhinnāya khattiyajātiyā uditoditāya. ^b^Brahmajaccā^eb^ti brāhmaṇajaccā. ^b^Evaṃgotte^eb^pi eseva nayo. ^b^Lokiyalokuttarasīlenā^eb^ti pāramitāsambhūtena buddhāveṇikattā anaññasādhāraṇena lokiyena lokuttarena ca sīlena. ^b^Evaṃsīlā^eb^ti anavasesasīlānaṃ visuṃ paccavekkhaṇakaraṇena evaṃsīlāti anussarissati. Esa nayo sesesu. Yathā vijjābhāgiyā vijjāsampayuttadhammā, evaṃ samādhipakkhā samādhisampayuttadhammāpi sativīriyādayoti āha – ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahitovā’’^eb^ti. Tasmā samādhipakkhadhammavinimutto eva idha vihāro adhippetoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yathā vā aṭṭhasamāpattivipassanāmaggaphalasaṅgahitā lokiyalokuttarā samādhipaññā ‘‘evaṃdhammā evaṃpaññā’’ti padehi heṭṭhā gahitāpi yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhato muccanassa pavattivisesaṃ upādāya ‘‘evaṃvimuttā’’ti ettha puna gahitā, tathā ‘‘evaṃdhammā’’ti ettha gahitāpi samādhipakkhadhammā dibbabrahmāaneñjāriyavihārasaṅkhātaṃ attano pavattivisesaṃ upādāya, ‘‘evaṃvihārī’’ti ettha puna gahitāti vuccamāne na koci virodho. Phaladhammānaṃ pavattikālepi ^a^M2.0331^ea^ kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhi na taṃānubhāvajātā, atha kho ariyamaggena kilesānaṃ samucchinnattāti ^a^V2.0114^ea^ āha – ^b^‘‘maggānubhāvena kilesānaṃ paṭipassaddhante uppannattā’’^eb^ti. Yo yaṃ pajahati, so pahāyako pahātabbato vimuttoti vuccati visaṃsaṭṭhabhāvatoti pahānavibhāgena vuccamāne apahāyakassa nibbānassa kathaṃ vimuttatā? Visaṃsaṭṭhābhāvato eva. Tañhi pakatiyāva sabbaso kilesehi visaṃsaṭṭhaṃ vinissaṭaṃ suvidūravidūre ṭhitaṃ, tasmāssa tato nissaṭattā nissaraṇavimutti nissaraṇapahānanti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘nibbāna’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^199^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ime ^b^tathāgatassa acchariyābbhutadhammā,^eb^ na sāvakavisayā, mama pana desanā tayā sutā evāti te therasseva bhāraṃ karonto, ^b^‘‘taṃ bhiyyosomattāya paṭibhantū’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Sato sampajāno^eb^ti ettha kālabhedavasena labbhamānampi sampajānabhāvaṃ anāmasitvā gativibhāgena taṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘dve sampajaññānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ – ^b^aṭṭha vare gaṇhanto^eb^ti ettha kathaṃ varaṃ devatā deti, parassa dīyamānañca taṃ kathaṃ parassa samijjhatīti? Kammabaleneva. Yadi hi taṃ kammaṃ katokāsaṃ yassa tadapadesena phalaṃ vipaccati, evaṃ devatāya tassa varaṃ dinnaṃ, itarena ca laddhanti vohāro hotīti. Apica parassa patthitavarāni nāma vipaccamānassa kammassa paccayabhūto payogavisesoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tāni vipaccane ekantikānipi appesakkhā devatā – ‘‘ayamassa patthanā samijjhissati, no’’ti na jānanti, sakko pana paññavā tāni ekaccaṃ jānātiyeva. Tena vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘sakkena pasīditvā dinne aṭṭha vare gaṇhanto’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Paṭhamajavanavāre^eb^ti uppannassa sabbapaṭhamajavanavāre. So hi paṭisandhiyā āsannabhāvato avisado hoti, devabhāve nikantivasena uppajjanato na jānāti. ^b^Aññāhi^eb^ devatāhi ^b^asādhāraṇajānanaṃ hoti^eb^ dutiyajavanavārato paṭṭhāya pavattanato.

[03]^b^Aññepi devā^eb^tiādinā bodhisattassa tattha sampajaññeneva ṭhitabhāvaṃ byatirekamukhena vibhāveti. ^b^Āhārūpacchedena kālaṅkarontī^eb^ti idaṃ khiḍḍāpadosikavasena vuttaṃ.
