Sabbametaṃ parikappanavacanaṃ, yathā manussā paccatthikaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ kiñci kātuṃ asamatthāpi keci ālambanavasena samatthā viya attānaṃ dassenti, evaṃsampadamidanti keci. Apare pana bhaṇanti – yassidaṃ kammassavipākaṃ pīḷeti, sace tasmiṃ anokāse eva sayaṃ vipaccituṃ okāsaṃ labheyya, apāyesu eva taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ nibbattāpeyya, yasmā taṃ kammaṃ balavaṃ hutvā avasesapaccayasamavāyena vipaccituṃ āraddhaṃ, tasmā itaraṃ tassa vipākaṃ vibādhentaṃ upapīḷakaṃ nāma jātaṃ. Etadatthameva cettha ‘‘balavakammena nibbatta’’nti balavaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Kiccavasena hi nesaṃ kammānaṃ etā samaññā, yadidaṃ upapīḷakaṃ upacchedakaṃ janakaṃ upatthambhakanti, na kusalāni viya upatthambhāni honti nibbattatthāya. ^b^Pīḷetvā^eb^ti viheṭhetvā paṭighāṭanādivasena ucchutelayantādayo viya ucchutilādike vibādhetvā. ^b^Niroja^eb^nti nittejaṃ. ^b^Niyūsa^eb^nti nirasaṃ. ^b^Kasaṭa^eb^nti nissāraṃ. ^b^Parissaya^eb^nti upaddavaṃ.

[03]Idāni parissayassa upanayanākāraṃ dassentena tattha, ^b^‘‘dārakassā’’^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā bhogānaṃ vināsanākāraṃ dassetuṃ, puna ^b^‘‘dārakassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Kumbhadohanā^eb^ti kumbhapūrakhīrā. ^b^Gomaṇḍale^eb^ti goyūthe.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhusabhagamanaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0374^ea^^b^katvā^eb^ti aṭṭhausabhappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ paccatthikaṃ uddissa dhanuggaho anuyāyiṃ katvā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti saraṃ. ^b^Añño^eb^ti paccatthiko. ^b^Tattheva pāteyya^eb^ accāsannaṃ katvā sarassa khittattā. ^b^Vāḷamacchodaka^eb^nti makarādivāḷamacchavantaṃ udakaṃ.

[03]^b^Paṭisandhinibbattakaṃ kammaṃ janakakammaṃ nāma^eb^ paripuṇṇavipākadāyibhāvato, na pavattivipākamattanibbattakaṃ. ^b^Bhogasampadādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ārogyasampadādi-parivārasampadādīni gaṇhāti. Na dīghāyukatādīni hi appāyukatāsaṃvattanikena kammunā nibbattāni; aññaṃ dīghāyukatākaraṇena upatthambhetuṃ sakkoti; na atidubbaṇṇaṃ appesakkhaṃ nīcakulīnaṃ duppaññaṃ vā vaṇṇavantatādivasena. Tathā hi vakkhati, ‘‘imasmiṃ pana pañhavissajjane’’tiādi, taṃ pana nidassanavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Purimānī^eb^ti upapīḷakopacchedakāni. Upapīḷakupaghātā nāma kusalavipākapaṭibāhakāti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘dve akusalānevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Upatthambhakaṃ kusalamevā^eb^ti ettha yathā janakaṃ ubhayasabhāvaṃ, evaṃ itaresampi ubhayasabhāvatāya vuccamānāya na koci virodho. Devadattādīnañhi nāgādīnaṃ ^a^V2.0158^ea^ ito anuppavacchitānaṃ petādīnañca narakādīsu akusalakammavipākassa upatthambhanupapīḷanupaghātanāni na na sambhavanti. Evañca katvā yā heṭṭhā bahūsu ānantariyesu ekena gahitapaṭisandhikassa itaresaṃ tassa anubalappadāyitā vuttā, sāpi samatthitā hoti. Yasmiñhi kamme kate janakanibbattaṃ kusalaphalaṃ vā akusalaphalaṃ vā byādhidhātusamatādinimittaṃ vibādhīyati, tamupatthambhakaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana kate jātisamatthassa paṭisandhiyaṃ pavattiyañca vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ uppatti hoti, taṃ janakaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhāvicchedapaccayānuppattiyā upabrūhanapaccayuppattiyā ca janakasāmatthiyānurūpaṃ parivutticiratarapabandhā hoti, etaṃ upatthambhakaṃ. Tathā yasmiṃ kate janakanibbattaṃ kusalaphalaṃ akusalaphalaṃ vā byādhidhātusamatādinimittaṃ vibādhīyati, taṃ upapīḷakaṃ. Yasmiṃ pana kate janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarapabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalaṃ vicchedakapaccayuppattiyā vicchijjati, taṃ upaghātakanti ayamettha sāro.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0375^ea^ tesu kammesu. ^b^Upacchedakakammenā^eb^ti āyuno upaghātakakammena. Svāyamupaghātakabhāvo dvidhā icchitabboti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pāṇātipātinā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Na sakkoti^eb^ pāṇātipātakammunā santānassa tathābhisaṅkhatattā. Yasmiñhi santāne nibbattaṃ, tassa tena abhisaṅkhatatā avassaṃ icchitabbā tattheva tassa vipākassa vinibandhanato. Etena kusalassa kammassa āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva pāṇātipāto tādisaṃ sāmatthiyupaghātaṃ karotīti dasseti, tato kammaṃ appaphalaṃ hoti. ‘‘Dīghāyukā’’tiādinā upaghātasāmatthiyena khette uppannasassaṃ viya upapattiniyāmakā dhammāti dasseti. Upapatti niyatavisese vipaccituṃ okāse karonte eva kusalakamme ākaḍḍhiyamānapaṭisandhikaṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ appāyukatthāya niyametīti āha – ^b^‘‘paṭisandhimeva vā niyāmetvā appāyukaṃ karotī’’^eb^ti. Pāṇātipātacetanāya accantakaṭukavipākattā sanniṭṭhānacetanāya niraye nibbattati tassā atthassa khīṇābhāvato; itare pana na tathā bhāriyāti āha – ^b^‘‘pubbā…pe… hotī’’^eb^ti. Idha pana yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttasadisaṃ, taṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Manussāmanussaparissayā^eb^ti mānusakā amānusakā ca upaddavā. ^b^Purato^eb^ti pubbadvārato. ^b^Pacchato^eb^ti pacchimavatthuto. ^b^Pavaṭṭamānā^eb^ti parijanassa, devatānaṃ vā desena pavaṭṭamānā. ^b^Parehī^eb^ti purātanehi parehi. ^b^Sammukhībhāva^eb^nti sāmibhāvavasena paccakkhattaṃ. ^b^Āharitvā denti^eb^ iṇāyikā. ^b^Kammantā^eb^ti vaṇijjādikammāni. ^b^Apāṇātipātakamma^eb^nti pāṇātipātassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ kammaṃ; pāṇātipātā virativasena pavattitakammanti attho. ^b^Dīghāyukasaṃvattanikaṃ hoti^eb^ vipākassa kammasarikkhabhāvato ^a^V2.0159^ea^. ^b^Iminā nayenā^eb^ti iminā appāyukadīghāyukasaṃvattanikesu kammesu yathāvuttena taṃ saṃvattanikavibhāvananayena.

[03]^b^Viheṭhanakammādīnipī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena kodhaissāmanakamaccherathaddhāviddasubhāvavasena pavattitakammāni saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti yathā pāṇātipātakammaṃ atthato evaṃ vadati nāmāti vuttaṃ, tatheva ^b^vadamānāni viya^eb^. ‘‘Yaṃ yadevātipatthenti, sabbametena labbhatī’’ti (khu. pā. 8.10) vacanato yathā sabbakusalaṃ sabbāsaṃ sampattīnaṃ upanissayo, evaṃ sabbaṃ akusalaṃ sabbāsaṃ vipattīnaṃ upanissayoti, ^b^‘‘upapīḷanena nibbhogataṃ āpādetvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0376^ea^. Tathā hi pāṇātipātakammavasenapi ayaṃ nayo dassito. ^b^Aviheṭhanādīnī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena akkodhana-anissāmana-dāna-anatimāna-viddasubhāvena pavattakammāni saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^293^eb^^b^.^eb^ Issā mano etassāti ^b^issāmanako^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘issāsampayuttacitto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upakkosanto^eb^ti akkosavatthūhi akkosanto. ^b^Issaṃ bandhatī^eb^ti issaṃ anubandhati issāsahitameva cittaṃ anupavatteti. ^b^Appesakkho^eb^ti appānubhāvo appaññāto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na paññāyatī’’^eb^ti. Sā panassa appānubhāvatā parivārābhāvena pākaṭā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘appaparivāro’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^294^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Macchariyavasena na dātā hotī^eb^ti sabbaso deyyadhammassa abhāvena na dātā na hoti. Amaccharī hi puggalo sati deyyadhamme yathārahaṃ detiyeva.

[03]^b^295^eb^^b^.^eb^ Abhivādetabbaṃ khettavasena matthakappattaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘buddhaṃ vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Aññepi mātupitujeṭṭhabhātarādayo abhivādanādiarahā santi, tesu thaddhādivasena karaṇaṃ nīcakulasaṃvattanikameva. Na hi pavatte sakkā kātunti sambandho. Tena pavattivipākadāyino kammassa visayo esoti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭisandhimeva panā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^296^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aparipucchanenā^eb^ti aparipucchāmattena niraye na nibbattati; aparipucchāhetu pana kattabbākaraṇādīhi siyā nirayanibbattīti pāḷiyaṃ, ‘‘na paripucchitā hotī’’tiādi vuttanti dassento, ^b^‘‘aparipucchako panā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Yathānusandhiṃ pāpesī^eb^ti desanaṃ yathānusandhiniṭṭhānaṃ pāpesi. Sesaṃ vuttanayattā suviññeyyameva.
[06]Cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^298^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kammassa ^a^V2.0160^ea^ moghabhāvo nāma phalena tucchatā phalābhāvoti āha – ^b^‘‘moghanti tucchaṃ aphala’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tathaṃ bhūta^eb^nti saccasaddassa atthamāha. Paribbājako ^a^M2.0377^ea^ pana ‘‘sacca’’nti iminā tameva saphalanti vadati. Saphalañhi kammaṃ satthu abhimatamanokammanti adhippāyo. ^b^Idañca^eb^ ‘‘moghaṃ kāyakamma’’ntiādivacanaṃ. ^b^Taṃ gahetvā^eb^ti paramparāya gahetvā. ^b^Esā^eb^ti potaliputto paribbājako. ^b^Abhisaññānirodhakathaṃ sandhāya vadati^eb^. Sāpi hi titthiyānaṃ antare pākaṭā jātāti. ^b^Thero^eb^ti samiddhitthero. Yathā bhagavatā vuttaṃ, tato ca aññathāva dosāropanabhayena gahetvā tato bhagavantaṃ thero rakkhatīti adhippāyena paribbājako, ‘‘parirakkhitabbaṃ maññissatī’’ti avocāti āha – ^b^‘‘parirakkhitabbanti garahato mocanena rakkhitabba’’^eb^nti. Sañcetanā assa atthīti ^b^sañcetanikaṃ. Kamma^eb^nti sañcetanikassapi kammassa attano samaye icchitattā paribbājakena vuttaṃ.

[03]Saṅkhatasaṅkhāratāya rūpameva ^b^‘‘tilamattampi saṅkhāra’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘maṃsacakkhunāva passatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Samāgamadassanaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti katthacipi tassa dassanaṃ sandhāya, na pariññādassanaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘kuto panevarūpaṃ kathāsallāpa’’nti.

[03]^b^299^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaṭṭadukkha^eb^nti saṃsāradukkhaṃ. ^b^Kilesadukkha^eb^nti kilesasambhavarāgapariḷāhadukkhaṃ. ^b^Saṅkhāradukkha^eb^nti yadaniccaṃ, taṃ dukkhanti evaṃ vuttadukkhaṃ. ^b^Sace bhāsitaṃ bhaveyyā^eb^ti imaṃ īdisaṃ dukkhaṃ sandhāya āyasmatā samiddhinā bhāsitaṃ siyā nu bhagavā, avibhajitvā byākaraṇaṃ yuttamevāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^300^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ummaṅga^eb^nti ummujjanaṃ, kathāmuḷhena antarā aññāṇavisayapañhā ummaṅgaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pañhāummaṅga’’^eb^nti ^b^neva dibbacakkhunā^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ. Na hi taṃ ayoniso ummujjanaṃ dibbacakkhuvisayanti? Kāmañcetaṃ na dibbacakkhuvisayaṃ, dibbacakkhuparibhaṇḍañāvisayaṃ pana siyāti tathā vuttaṃ. ^b^Adhippāyenevā^eb^ti udāyittherassa adhippāyeneva gayhamānena taṃ ayoniyo ummujjanaṃ aññāsi. ^b^Sannisīdituṃ^eb^ pubbe nisinnākārena sannisīdituṃ ^b^na sakkoti^eb^. Samiddhittherena anabhisaṅkhatasseva atthassa kathitattā, ^b^‘‘yaṃ abhūtaṃ, tadeva kathessatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^a^V2.0161^ea^ ‘‘ayoniso ummujjissatī’’ti. ^b^Tisso vedanā pucchitā,^eb^ ‘‘kiṃ so vediyatī’’ti avibhāgena vediyamānassa jātitattā. Sukhāya vedanāya hitanti ^b^sukhavedaniyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^a^M2.0378^ea^ – ^b^‘‘sukhavedanāya paccayabhūta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sesesū^eb^ti, ‘‘dukkhavedaniya’’ntiādīsu.

[03]^b^Heṭṭhā tikajjhānacetanā^eb^ti ettha, ‘‘kusalato’’ti adhikārato rūpāvacarakusalato heṭṭhā tikajjhānacetanāti attho. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etesu kāmāvacararūpāvacarasukhavedaniyakammesu. ^b^Adukkhamasukhampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena iṭṭhārammaṇe sukhampīti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍeti.
[03]Yadi kāyadvāre pavattato aññattha adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti, atha kasmā, ‘‘dukkhasseva jananato’’ti vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘sā pana vedanā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Catutthajjhānacetanā^eb^ti ettha arūpāvacarakusalacetanātipi vattabbaṃ. Yathā hi ‘‘kāyena vācāya manasā’’ti ettha yathālābhaggahaṇavasena manasā sukhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyanti ayamattho arūpāvacarakusalepi labbhatīti sukhampi janeti ukkaṭṭhassa ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa soḷasavipākacittanibbattanato, ayañca nayo heṭṭhā, ‘‘adukkhamasukhampī’’ti etthāpi vattabbo. Pubbe pariyāyato dukkhavedanā vuttā, suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā hesāti idāni nippariyāyato puna dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tena ettha dukkhavedaniyaṃ pavattivaseneva vaṭṭatīti. ^b^Etassā^eb^ti dukkhavedaniyassa pavattivaseneva yujjamānattā etassa vasena sabbaṃ sukhavedaniyaṃ adukkhamasukhavedaniyañca pavattivaseneva vattuṃ vaṭṭati.

[03]^b^Ālayo^eb^ti abhiruci. ^b^Mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇa^eb^nti mahati kammavibhajane ñāṇaṃ, mahantaṃ vā kammavibhajanañāṇaṃ. Bhājanaṃ nāma niddeso, ayaṃ pana uddesoti katvā āha – ^b^‘‘katame cattāro…pe… mātikāṭṭhapana’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^301^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāṭiyekko anusandhi^eb^ yathāuddiṭṭhassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇassa abhājanabhāvato, pucchānusandhiajjhāsayānusandhīsu ca anantogadhattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Idaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā^eb^ti idha, ‘‘pāṇātipātiṃ adinnādāyi’’ntiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānena vuttaṃ kammavibhaṅgaṃ ārabbha. ^b^Imaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ dassanaṃ gaṇhantī^eb^ti idaṃ, ‘‘atthi kira, bho, pāpakāni kammāni, natthi kira, bho, pāpakāni kammānī’’ti ca ādīni hatthidassakāndhāviya diṭṭhamatte eva ṭhatvā acittakadassanañca gaṇhanti. Vīriyaṃ kilesānaṃ ātāpanavasena ^a^V2.0162^ea^^b^ātappaṃ,^eb^ tadeva padahavasena ^b^padhānaṃ,^eb^^a^M2.0379^ea^ punappunaṃ yuñjanavasena ^b^anuyogo,^eb^ tathā bhāvanāya nappamajjati etenāti ^b^appamādo,^eb^ sammā yoniso manasi karoti etenāti ^b^sammāmanasikāro^eb^ti vuccatīti adhippāyena, ^b^‘‘pañcapi vīriyasseva nāmānī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Appamādo^eb^ vā satiyā avippavāso. Yasmiṃ manasikāre sati tassa dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ ijjhati, ayamettha sammāmanasikāroti ettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Cetosamādhi^eb^nti dibbacakkhuñāṇasahagataṃ cittasamādhiṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dibbacakkhusamādhi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Aññathā^eb^ti akusalakammakaraṇato aññathā, taṃ pana kusalakammakaraṇaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘ye dassannaṃ kusalānaṃ kammapathānaṃ pūritattā’’^eb^ti ^b^diṭṭhithāmenā^eb^ti diṭṭhivasena diṭṭhibalena. ^b^Diṭṭhiparāmāsenā^eb^ti diṭṭhivasena dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parāmāsena. ^b^Adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti, ‘‘idameva saccaṃ, moghamañña’’nti adhiṭṭhāya abhinivisitvā. ^b^Ādiyitvā^eb^ti daḷhaggāhaṃ gahetvā. ^b^Voharatī^eb^ti attano gahitaggahaṇaṃ paresaṃ dīpento voharati.

[03]^b^302^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tatrānandā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. ^b^Idampī^eb^ti idaṃ vacanaṃ. ‘‘Tatrānandā’’ti evamādivacanampīti attho. ^b^Na mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇassa bhājanaṃ^eb^ tassa aniddesabhāvato. ^b^Assā^eb^ti mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇassa ^b^mātikāṭṭhapanameva^eb^ dibbacakkhukānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vasena anuññātabbassa ca dassanavasena uddesabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettha panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^ettha panā^eb^ti ‘‘tatrānandā’’tiādipāṭhe. ^b^Etesaṃ dibbacakkhukāna^eb^nti etesaṃ heṭṭhā catūsupi vāresu āgatānaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ. ^b^Ettakā^eb^ti ekacciyā saccagirā. ^b^Anuññātā^eb^ti anujānitā. ^b^Ananuññātā^eb^ti paṭikkhepitā. Idha ananuññātamukhena dīpitaṃ ananuññātabhāvamattaṃ. ^b^Tatrānandā^eb^tiādike ^b^tatrā^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummanti dassento, ^b^‘‘tesu catūsu samaṇabrāhmaṇesū’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Idaṃ vacanaṃ^eb^ ‘‘atthi kira, bho…pe… vipāko’’ti idaṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti tathāvādino samaṇabrāhmaṇassa. ^b^Aññenākārenā^eb^ti ‘‘yo kira, bho’’tiādinā vuttakāraṇato aññena kāraṇena. ^b^Dvīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti ‘‘atthi kira, bho…pe… vipāko’’ti ca, ‘‘apāyaṃ…pe… nirayaṃ upapanna’’nti ca imesu ^a^M2.0380^ea^ dvīsu pāṭhapadesesu. ^b^Anuññātā^eb^ tadatthassa atthibhāvato. ^b^Tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti ‘‘yo kira, bho…pe… nirayaṃ upapajjati’’, ‘‘yampi so…pe… te sañjānanti’’, ‘‘yampi so yadeva…pe… moghamañña’’nti imesu tīsu pāṭhapadesesu. ^b^Ananuññātā^eb^ tadatthassānekantikattā micchābhinivesato ca. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘aññathā hi, ānanda, tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇa’’nti. Yathā te appahīnavipallāsā padesañāṇasamaṇabrāhmaṇā kammavibhaṅgaṃ sañjānanti, tato aññathāva sabbaso pahīnavipallāsassa tathā āgamanādiatthena tathāgatassa sammāsambuddhassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ hotīti attho.

[03]^b^303^eb^^b^.^eb^ Iminā ^a^V2.0163^ea^ dibbacakkhukena yaṃ kammaṃ karonto diṭṭho, tato pubbeti yojanā. ^b^Tato^eb^ti tato kariyamānakammato pubbe. ^b^Khando^eb^ti kumāro. ^b^Sivo^eb^ti issaro. ^b^Pitāmaho^eb^ti brahmā. ^b^Issarādīhī^eb^ti issarabrahmapajāpatiādīhi. ^b^Visaṭṭho^eb^ti nimmito. ^b^Micchādassanenā^eb^ti micchādassanavasena. ^b^Ya^eb^nti yaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tesu pāṇātipātādivasena pavattakammesu. ^b^Diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedetīti yojanā. ^b^Upapajjitvā^eb^ti dutiyabhave nibbattitvā. ^b^Aparasmiṃ pariyāye^eb^ti aññasmiṃ yattha katthaci bhave.

[03]^b^Ekaṃ kammarāsi^eb^nti pāṇātipātādibhedena ekaṃ kammasamudāyaṃ. ^b^Ekaṃ vipākarāsi^eb^nti tasseva aṅgena ekaṃ vipākasamudāyaṃ. ^b^Iminā^eb^ti yathāvuttena dibbacakkhukena samaṇena brāhmaṇena vā adiṭṭhā. ^b^Tayo^eb^ti ‘‘pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hotī’’tiādinā vuttā tayo. ^b^Dve vipākarāsī^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammavedaniyo aparāpariyāyavedaniyoti dve vipākarāsī. Upapajjavedaniyaṃ pana tena diṭṭhaṃ, tasmā ‘‘dve’’ti vuttaṃ. Diṭṭho eko, adiṭṭhā tayoti ^b^diṭṭhe ca adiṭṭhe ca cattāro kammarāsī,^eb^ tathā diṭṭho eko, adiṭṭhā dveti ^b^tayo vipākarāsī. Imāni satta ṭhānānī^eb^ti yathāvuttāni satta ñāṇassa pavattanaṭṭhānāni. ‘‘Imassa nāma kammassa idaṃ phalaṃ nibbatta’’nti kammassa, phalassa vā adiṭṭhattā, ^b^‘‘dutiyavāre dibbacakkhukena kiñci na diṭṭha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamaṃ vuttanayena tayo kammarāsī veditabbā, idha dibbacakkhukena diṭṭhassa abhāvato, ^b^‘‘paccattaṭṭhānānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Bhavati vaḍḍhati etenāti bhabbaṃ, vaḍḍhinimittaṃ. Na bhabbaṃ ^b^abhabba^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘bhūtavirahita’’^eb^nti. Attano phale bhāsanaṃ dibbanaṃ ^b^ābhāsana^eb^nti āha – ^b^‘‘ābhāsati abhibhavati paṭibāhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Balavakamma^eb^nti mahāsāvajjaṃ kammaṃ garusamāsevitādibhedaṃ. ^b^Āsanne^eb^ti maraṇe, abhiṇhaṃ upaṭṭhānena vā ^a^M2.0381^ea^ tassa maraṇacittassa ^b^āsanne. Balavakamma^eb^nti garusamāsevitatādivasena balavaṃ kusalakammaṃ. ^b^Dubbalakammassā^eb^ti attano dubbalassa. ^b^Āsanne kusalaṃ kata^eb^nti idhāpi āsannatā pubbe vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03]^b^Upaṭṭhānākārenā^eb^ti maraṇassa āsannakāle kammassa upaṭṭhānākārena. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti tassa puggalassa. Nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti akusalanti yojanā. Titthiyā kammantaravipākantaresu akusalatāya yaṃ kiñci kammaṃ yassa kassaci vipākassa kāraṇaṃ katvā gaṇhanti hatthidassakāndhādayo viya diṭṭhamattābhinivesinoti, ^b^‘‘aññatitthiyā…pe… upaṭṭhātī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Itarasmi^eb^nti bhabbañceva bhabbābhāsañca, bhabbaṃ abhabbābhāsanti imasmiṃ dvaye ^a^V2.0164^ea^. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ paṭhamadutiyapuggalavasena purimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kammānaṃ yojanānayo vutto upaṭṭhānākāravasena. Ayameva tatiyacatutthapuggalavasena pacchimānaṃ dvinnaṃ kammānaṃ yojanānayo. Tatiyassa hi kammassa kusalattā tassa ca sagge nibbattattā tattha kāraṇabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti; tathā catutthassapi kammassa kusalattā, tassa pana niraye nibbattattā tattha nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ akusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti. Yaṃ panettha atthato avibhattaṃ, taṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mahākammavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^304^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Veditabbānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0165^ea^ ettha yathā viditāni cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni vaṭṭadukkhasamatikkamāya honti, tathā vedanaṃ adhippetanti āha – ^b^‘‘sahavipassanena maggena jānitabbānī’’^eb^ti. Tattha vipassanāya ārammaṇato maggena asammohato jānanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Mano savisesaṃ upavicarati ārammaṇe pavattati etehīti ^b^manopavicārā,^eb^ vitakkavicārā. Ārammaṇe hi abhiniropanānumajjanehi vitakkavicārehi saha cittaṃ pavattati, na tabbirahitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vitakkavicārā’’^eb^tiādi. Sattā pajjanti etehi yathārahaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vivaṭṭañcāti ^b^sattapadā^eb^^a^M2.0382^ea^, gehanissitā vaṭṭapadā. Yoggānaṃ damanāacariyā ^b^yoggācariyā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dametabbadamakāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti vuttāvasesaṃ ekasattatividhaviññāṇaṃ saphassarūpakasseva adhippetattā.
[03]^b^305^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Idhā^eb^ti imissaṃ chaviññāṇakāyadesanāyaṃ. Manodhātuttayavinimuttameva manoviññāṇadhātūti veditabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Cakkhumhi samphasso^eb^ti cakkhuṃ nissāya uppanno samphasso. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘cakkhuviñāṇasampayuttasamphassassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti.

[03]Yathā kevalena viññāṇena rūpadassanaṃ na hoti, evaṃ kevalena cakkhupasādenapīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhuviññāṇenā’’^eb^ti. Tena pāḷiyaṃ ^b^cakkhunā^eb^ti nissayamukhena nissitakiccaṃ vuttanti dasseti. ^b^Ārammaṇavasenā^eb^ti ārammaṇapaccayabhāvena. ‘‘Upavicarati’’cceva kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu tattha vitakkabyāpāropi atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi. So panettha taggatikoti āha – ^b^‘‘vitakko taṃsampayutto cā’’^eb^ti. Sampayuttadhammānampi upavicaraṇaṃ vitakkavicārānaṃyevettha kiccanti ^b^‘‘vitakkavicārasaṅkhātā manopavicārā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Somanassayutto upavicāro ^b^somanassūpavicāro^eb^ yathā ‘‘ājaññaratho’’ti āha ^b^‘‘somanassena saddhi’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^306^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upavicārānaṃ upassayaṭṭhena gehaṃ viyāti gehaṃ, rūpādayoti āha – ^b^‘‘gehassitānīti kāmaguṇanissitānī’’^eb^ti. Niccasaññādinikkhamanato nekkhammaṃ vipassanāti, ^b^‘‘nekkhammassitānīti^eb^^a^V2.0166^ea^^b^vipassanānissitānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Iṭṭhāna^eb^nti kasivaṇijjādivasena pariyiṭṭhānanti āha ^b^‘‘pariyesitāna’’^eb^nti. Piyabhāvo pana kantasaddeneva kathitoti kāmitabbānaṃ mano rametīti ^b^manoramānaṃ^eb^. Lokena āmasīyatīti ^b^lokāmisaṃ,^eb^ taṇhā. Tāya gahetabbatāya iṭṭhabhāvāpādanena paṭisaṅkhatatāya ca ^b^paṭisaṃyuttānaṃ. Atīte kataṃ uppajjati^eb^ ārammaṇikānubhavanassa asambhavatoti adhippāyo. Edisaṃ anussaraṇaṃ diṭṭhaggahaṇānussarena ca hotīti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘yathāha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Aniccākāra^eb^nti hutvā abhāvākāraṃ. ^b^Vipariṇāmavirāganirodha^eb^nti jarāya maraṇena cāti dvedhā vipariṇāmetabbañceva, tato eva palokitaṃ bhaṅgañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana yasmā uppannaṃ rūpaṃ tenevākārena na tiṭṭhati ^a^M2.0383^ea^, atha kho uppādāvatthāsaṅkhātaṃ pakatiṃ vijahati, vijahitañca jarāvatthāya tato vigacchati, vigacchantañca bhaṅguppattiyā nirujjhatīti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘pakativijahanenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha ‘‘yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya passato’’ti vuttaṃ, anubodhañāṇaṃ pana adhippetaṃ vīthipaṭipannāya vipassanāya vasenāti ^b^‘‘vipassanāpaññāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ upavicāraniddesabhāvato. Tathā hi vakkhati – ‘‘chasudvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate’’tiādi. ^b^Saṅkhārānaṃ bhedaṃ passato^eb^ti sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvaṃ vīthipaṭipannena vipassanāñāṇena passato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saṅkhāragatamhi tikkhe’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^saṅkhāgatamhī^eb^ti saṅkhāragate visayabhūte. ^b^Tikkhe^eb^ti bhāvanābalena indriyānañca samatāya tibbe. ^b^Sūre^eb^ti paṭipakkhehi anabhibhūtatāya, tesañca abhibhavanasamatthatāya visade paṭubhūte pavattante.

[03]Kilesānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena vūpasantatāya ^b^santacittassa,^eb^ saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanato ^b^bhikkhuno,^eb^ uttarimanussadhammasannissitattā ^b^amānusī ratī^eb^ti vivekarati nekkhammarati. ^b^Yato yato^eb^ti yathā yathā nayavipassanādīsu yena yena sammasanākārenāti attho. ^b^Khandhānaṃ udayabbaya^eb^nti pañcupādānakkhandhānaṃ uppādañca bhaṅgañca. ^b^Amatantaṃ vijānata^eb^nti vijānantānaṃ viññūnaṃ āraddhavipassanānaṃ taṃ pītipāmojjaṃ amatādhigamahetutāya amatanti veditabbaṃ.
[03]^b^Chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate^eb^ti rūpādivasena chabbidhe iṭṭhārammaṇe yathārahaṃ chasu dvāresu āpāthagate. Visaye cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ.

[03]^b^307^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccuppanna^eb^nti santatipaccuppannaṃ. ^b^Anuttaravimokkho nāma arahattaṃ^eb^ idha adhippetaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesena. Kathaṃ pana tattha pihaṃ upaṭṭhapeti, na hi adhigataṃ arahattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, na ^a^V2.0167^ea^ ca taṃ ārabbha pihā pavattatīti? Ko vā evamāha – ‘‘arahattaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pihaṃ upaṭṭhapetī’’ti. Anussutiladdhaṃ pana parikappasiddhaṃ arahattaṃ uddissa patthanaṃ ṭhapeti, tattha cittaṃ paṇidahati. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘kudāssu nāmāhaṃ tadāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī’’ti. ^b^Āyatana^eb^nti arahattameva chaḷaṅgasamannāgamādikāraṇabhāvato, manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato ca tathā vuttaṃ, taṃ panetaṃ domanassaṃ ^a^M2.0384^ea^ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa uppajjati patthanāya sahāvattanato. Na hi lobhadosānaṃ saha vutti atthi. ^b^Patthanāmūlakattā^eb^ti iminā upaṭṭhāpayato padassa hetuatthajotakatamāha. ^b^Eva^eb^nti ‘‘kudāssunāmā’’tiādinā vuttākārena. ^b^Ussukkāpetu^eb^nti yathā maggena ghaṭeti, evaṃ ussukkāpetuṃ.

[03]^b^308^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññāṇupekkhā^eb^ti aññāṇasahitā upekkhā asamapekkhanapavattā. Tena tena maggodhinā tassa tassa apāyagamanīyakilesodhissa anavasesato jitattā khīṇāsavo nippariyāyato odhijino nāma; tadabhāvato puthujjano nippariyāyatova anodhijino nāma; sekho pana siyā pariyāyato odhijinoti. Tampi nivattento, ^b^‘‘akhīṇāsavassāti attho’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Āyatiṃ vipākaṃ jinitvā^eb^ti appavattikaraṇavasena sabbaso āyatiṃ vipākaṃ jinitvā ṭhitattā khīṇāsavova nippariyāyato vipākajino nāma; tadabhāvato puthujjano nippariyāyato avipākajino nāma; sekho pana siyā pariyāyato vipākajinoti. Tampi nivattento ^b^‘‘akhīṇāsavassevāti attho’’^eb^ti āha. Apassantassa rūpanti pāḷito padaṃ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ pubbe ‘‘puthujjanassā’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘assutavato puthujjanassā’’ti vacanaṃ andhaputhujjanassāyaṃ upekkhā, na kalyāṇaputhujjanassāti dassanatthaṃ. Gehassitā upekkhā hi yaṃ kiñci ārammaṇavatthuṃ apekkhasseva, na nirapekkhassāti iṭṭhe, iṭṭhamajjhatte vā ārammaṇe siyāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate’’^eb^ti. Aññāṇena pana tattha ajjhupekkhanākārappatti hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘guḷapiṇḍake’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Iṭṭhe arajjantassa aniṭṭhe adussantassā^eb^ti idaṃ yebhuyyena sattānaṃ iṭṭhe rajjanaṃ, aniṭṭhe dussananti katvā vuttaṃ. Ayoniyomanasikāro hi taṃtaṃārammaṇavasena na katthacipi javananiyamaṃ karotīti vuttaviparītepi ārammaṇe rajjanadussanaṃ sambhavati, tathāpissa rajjanadussanaṃ atthato paṭikkhittamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Asamapekkhane^eb^ti asamaṃ ayuttadassane ayoniso sammohapubbakaṃ ārammaṇassa gahaṇe.

[03]^b^309^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pavattanavasenā^eb^ti uppādanavasena ceva bahulīkaraṇavasena ca. ^b^Nissāya ceva āgamma^eb^^a^V2.0168^ea^^b^cā^eb^ti āgamanaṭṭhānabhūte nissayapaccayabhūte ca ^a^M2.0385^ea^ katvā. ^b^Atikkantāni nāma honti^eb^ vikkhambhanena ussārentā samussārentā.

[03]Somanassabhāvasāmaññaṃ gahetvā, ^b^‘‘sarikkhakeneva sarikkhakaṃ jahāpetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Idhāpi pahāyakaṃ nāma pahātabbato balavameva, saṃkilesadhammānaṃ balavabhāvato sātisayaṃ pana balavabhāvaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘idāni balavatā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Balavabhāvato vodānadhammānaṃ adhigamassa adhippetattā hettha nekkhammassitadomanassānampi pahānaṃ jotitaṃ.

[03]Upekkhāya pahāyakabhāvena adhippetattā ^b^‘‘upekkhākathā veditabbā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Jhānassa alābhino ca lābhino ca pakiṇṇakasaṅkhārasammasanaṃ sandhāya, ^b^‘‘suddhasaṅkhāre ca pādake katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upekkhāsahagatā^eb^ti bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvaṃ āgamma kadāci ajjhupekkhanavasenapi hi sammasanaṃ hotīti. Pādakajjhānavasena, sammasitadhammavasena vā āgamanavipassanāya bahulaṃ somanassasahagatabhāvato ^b^‘‘vuṭṭhānagāminī pana vipassanā somanassasahagatāvā’’^eb^ti niyametvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Upekkhāsahagatā hotī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Catutthajjhānādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena arūpajjhānāni saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Purimasadisāvā^eb^ti purimasadisā eva, upekkhāsahagatā vā hoti somanassasahagatā vāti attho. ^b^Idaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti yaṃ catutthajjhānādipādakato eva upekkhāsahagataṃ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanaṃ nissāya somanassasahagatāya vipassanāya pahānaṃ, idaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Pahāna^eb^nti cettha samatikkamalakkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Etaṃ visesaṃ^eb^ vipassanāya āvajjanaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ. Vuṭṭhānagāminiyā āsanne samāpannajjhānavipassanā pādakajjhānavipassanā, sammasitadhammoti ^b^vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā. Puggalajjhāsayo^eb^ti pādakajjhānassa sammasitajjhānassa ca bhede sati paṭipajjanakassa puggalassa, ‘‘aho vata mayhaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ bhaveyya caturaṅgika’’ntiādinā pubbe pavattājjhāsayo. ^b^Tesampi vāde^eb^ti ettha paṭhamatheravāde. ^b^Ayameva…pe… niyame^eb^ti tato tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato uppannassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ ^a^M2.0386^ea^ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatā virāgabhāvanābhāvato itarassa ca atabbhāvato. Eteneva hi paṭhamatheravāde apādakapaṭhamajjhānapādakamaggā paṭhamajjhānikāva honti, itare ca dutiyajjhānikādimaggā pādakajjhānavipassanāniyamehi taṃtaṃjhānikāva. Evaṃ sesavādesupi vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tesampi vāde ayameva pubbabhāge vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāva niyametī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vuttāva,^eb^ tasmā na idha vattabbāti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^310^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nānattā^eb^di ^a^V2.0169^ea^ kāmāvacarādikusalādivibhāgato nānāvidhā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anekappakārā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nānattasitā^eb^ti rūpasaddādinānārammaṇanissayā. ^b^Ekattā^eb^ ekasabhāvā jātibhūmiādivibhāgābhāvato. ^b^Ekārammaṇanissitā^eb^ti ekappakāreneva ārammaṇe pavattā. ^b^Heṭṭhā aññāṇupekkhā vuttā^eb^ ‘‘bālassa muḷhassā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 3.308). ^b^Upari chaḷaṅgupekkhā vakkhati^eb^ ‘‘upekkhako viharatī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 3.311). ^b^Dve upekkhā gahitā^eb^ dvinnampi ekattā, ekajjhaṃ gahetabbato, nānattasitāya upekkhāya pakāsitabhāvato ca.

[03]^b^Aññāṇupekkhā aññā saddādīsu^eb^ tattha tattheva vijjamānattā. ^b^Rūpesū^eb^ti ca iminā na kevalaṃ rūpāyatanavisesā eva gahitā, atha kho kasiṇarūpānipīti āha – ^b^‘‘rūpe upekkhābhāvañca aññā’’^eb^tiādi. Ekattasitabhāvopi idha ekattavisayasampayogavaseneva icchito, na ārammaṇavasena cāti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘yasmā panā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sampayuttavasenā^eb^ti sampayogavasena. Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ nissayatīti ^b^ākāsānañcāyatananissitā,^eb^ ākāsānañcāyatanakhandhanissitā. ^b^Sesāsupī^eb^ti viññāṇañcāyatananissitādīsupi.

[03]^b^Arūpāvacaravipassanupekkhāyā^eb^ti arūpāvacaradhammārammaṇāya vipassanupekkhāya. ^b^Rūpāvacaravipassanupekkha^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. Tāya kāmarūpārūpabhedāya taṇhāya nibbattāti tammayā, tebhūmakadhammā, tesaṃ bhāvo ^b^tammayatā,^eb^ taṇhā yassa guṇassa vasena atthe saddaniveso, tadabhidhānakoti āha – ^b^‘‘tammayatā nāma taṇhā’’^eb^ti ^a^M2.0387^ea^. ^b^Atammayatā^eb^ tammayatāya paṭipakkhoti katvā. ^b^Vipassanupekkha^eb^nti, ‘‘yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ, taṃ pajahati upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.71; a. ni. 7.55) evamāgataṃ saṅkhāravicinane majjhattabhūtaṃ upekkhaṃ.

[03]^b^311^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yadariyo^eb^ti ettha ^b^da^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro, upayogaputhuvacane ca ^b^ya^eb^-saddoti dassento, ^b^‘‘ye satipaṭṭhāne ariyo’’^eb^ti āha. Kāmaṃ ‘‘ariyo’’ti padaṃ sabbesampi paṭividdhasaccānaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ, vakkhamānassa pana visesassa buddhāveṇikattā, ^b^‘‘ariyo sammāsambuddho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na hi paccekabuddhādīnaṃ ayamānubhāvo atthi. ^b^Tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti na sussūsantīti vā, ekacce na sussūsanti ekacce sussūsantīti vā, sussūsantīti vā, paṭipannāpaṭipannānaṃ sāvakānaṃ paṭipattisaṅkhātesu tīsu satipaṭṭhānesu. ^b^Satiṃ paṭṭhapento^eb^ti paṭighānunayehi anavassutattā tadubhayanivattattā sabbadā satiṃ upaṭṭhapento. Buddhānameva sā niccaṃ upaṭṭhitasatitā, na itaresaṃ āveṇikadhammabhāvato. Ādarena sotumicchā idha sussūsāti tadabhāvaṃ ^a^V2.0170^ea^ dassento, ^b^‘‘saddahitvā sotuṃ na icchantī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Na aññā^eb^ti ‘‘na aññāyā’’ti vattabbe yakāralopena niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘na jānanatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Satthu ovādassa anādiyanameva ^b^vokkamana^eb^nti āha – ^b^‘‘atikkamitvā…pe… maññantī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Gehassitadomanassavasenā^eb^ti idaṃ idha paṭikkhipitabbamattadassanapadaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nekkhammassitadomanassassapi satthu pasaṅgavasena ‘‘na ceva attamano hotī’’ti attamanapaṭikkhepena anattamanatā vuttā viya hotīti taṃ paṭisedhento – ^b^‘‘appatīto hotīti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo’’^eb^ti. Tassa setughāto hi tathāgatānaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā attamanatāpaṭikkhepoti āha – ^b^‘‘appaṭipannakesu pana anattamanatākāraṇassa abhāvenetaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Paṭighāvassavenā^eb^ti chahi dvārehi paṭighavissandanena, paṭighappavattiyāti attho. ^b^Uppilāvito^eb^ti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo uppilāvitattassa bodhimūle eva pahīnattā. ^b^Paṭipannakesū^eb^ti idaṃ adhikāravasena vuttaṃ, appaṭipannakesupi tathāgatassa anattamanatākāraṇaṃ nattheva. ^b^Etaṃ vutta^eb^nti etaṃ ‘‘attamano ceva hotī’’tiādivacanaṃ vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0388^ea^ sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā satthu anavajjāya cittārādhanāya sambhavato.

[03]^b^312^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Damito^eb^ti nibbisevanabhāvāpādanena sikkhāpito. Iriyāpathaparivattanavasena aparivattitvā ekadisāya eva sattadisāvidhāvanassa idhādhippetattā sāritānaṃ hatthidammādīnaṃ ekadisādhāvanampi anivattanavaseneva yuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘anivattitvā dhāvanto ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāyena anivattitvāvā^eb^ti kāyena aparivattitvā eva. ^b^Vimokkhavasena aṭṭha disā vidhāvati,^eb^ na puratthimādidisāvasena. ^b^Ekappahārenevā^eb^ti ekanīhāreneva, ekasmiṃyeva vā divase ekabhāgena. ‘‘Pahāro’’ti hi divasassa tatiyo bhāgo vuccati. Vidhāvanañcettha jhānasamāpajjanavasena akalaṅkamappatisātaṃ javanacittapavattanti āha ^b^‘‘samāpajjatiyevā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^313^eb^^b^.^eb^ Desetabbassa ^a^V2.0171^ea^ atthassa uddisanaṃ ^b^uddeso,^eb^ vibhajanaṃ ^b^vibhaṅgo^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘mātikañca vibhajanañcā’’^eb^ti ^b^tuleyyā^eb^tiādīni cattāripi padāni paññāvevacanāni. Atha vā ^b^tuleyyā^eb^ti tulanabhūtāya paññāya tassa dhammassa paggahādividhinā parituleyya. ^b^Tīreyyā^eb^ti tīraṇabhūtāya paññāya tattha ñāṇakiriyāsamāpanavasena tīreyya. ^b^Pariggaṇheyyā^eb^ti tathāsamāpanno ānisaṃse assādāadīnave ca vicineyya. ^b^Paricchindeyyā^eb^ti paricchindabhūtena ñāṇena atthaṃ paricchinditvā jāneyya. ^b^Ārammaṇesū^eb^ti rūpādiputhuttārammaṇesu. ^b^Nikantivasenā^eb^ti nikāmanavasena apekkhāvasena. ^b^Tiṭṭhamāna^eb^nti pavattamānaṃ. ^b^Gocarajjhatte^eb^ti jhānārammaṇabhūte. Tañhi bhāvanācittenābhibhuyya avissajjitvā gayhamānaṃ ajjhattaṃ viya hotīti ‘‘gocarajjhatta’’nti vuccati. Bhāvanaṃ āraddhassa bhikkhuno yadi bhāvanārammaṇe nikanti uppajjeyya, tāya nikantiyā upari bhāvanaṃ vissajjetvā cittasaṃkocavasena saṇṭhitaṃ nāma, tadabhāvena ^b^asaṇṭhitaṃ^eb^ nāma hotīti, ‘‘ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhita’’nti vuttanti dassento, ^b^‘‘gocarajjhatte nikantivasena asaṇṭhita’’^eb^nti ^a^M2.0389^ea^ āha. Tathā hi vakkhati – ‘‘nikantivasena hi atiṭṭhamānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ na hoti, visesabhāgiyameva hotī’’ti. ^b^Aggahetvā^eb^ti rūpādīsu kiñci taṇhādiggāhavasena aggahetvā. Tathā aggahaṇeneva hi taṇhāparitāsādivasena na paritasseyya. ^b^Avasesassa ca dukkhassā^eb^ti sokādidukkhassa. ^b^Avasesassa ca dukkhassā^eb^ti vā jātijarāmaraṇasīsena vipākadukkhassa gahitattā kilesadukkhassa ceva saṃsāradukkhassa cāti attho.
[03]^b^316^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rūpameva kilesuppattiyā kāraṇabhāvato ^b^rūpanimittaṃ^eb^. Rāgādivasena taṃ anudhāvatīti ^b^rūpanimittānusārī^eb^.
[03]^b^318^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nikantivasena asaṇṭhita^eb^nti apekkhāvasena saṇṭhitaṃ nikantiṃ pahāya pavattamānaṃ upari visesāvahatoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nikantivasena hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^320^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aggahetvā aparitassanā^eb^ti pañcupādānakkhandhe, ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā taṇhādiggāhavasena upādiyitvā taṇhāparitāsādivasena paritassanā, vuttavipariyāyena aggahetvā aparitassanā veditabbā. ^b^Kathaṃ panesā anupādāparitassanā hotī^eb^ti mahātherassa adhippāyaṃ ^a^V2.0172^ea^ vivarituṃ codanaṃ samuṭṭhapeti? ^b^Upādātabbassa abhāvato^eb^ti tassa anupādāparitassanābhāve kāraṇavacanaṃ. ^b^Yadi hī^eb^tiādi tassa samatthanaṃ. ^b^Upādāparitassanāva assa^eb^ tathā upādātabbassa tatheva upādinnattā. ^b^Eva^eb^nti niccādiākārena. ^b^Upādinnāpī^eb^ti gahitaparāmaṭṭhāpi. ^b^Anupādinnāva honti^eb^ ayoniso gahitattā, viññūsu nissāya jānitabbattā ca. ^b^Diṭṭhivasenā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhiyā gahaṇākāravasena, tassa pana ayathābhūtagāhitāya paramatthato ca abhāvato. ^b^Atthato^eb^ti paramatthato. ^b^Anupādāparitassanāyeva nāma hoti^eb^ upādātabbākārassa abhāvena taṃ anupādiyitvā eva paritassanāti katvā.

[03]^b^Parivattatī^eb^ti na tadeva rūpaṃ aññathā pavattaṃ parivattati, atha kho pakatijahanena sabhāvavigamena nassati bhijjati. ^b^Vipariṇata^eb^nti aññathattaṃ gataṃ vinaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^Kammaviññāṇa^eb^nti abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇaṃ. ‘‘Rūpaṃ attā’’tiādi micchāgāhavasena viññāṇassa rūpabhedena vuttassa ^b^bhedānuparivatti hoti^eb^. Vipariṇāmaṃ anugantvā viparivattanataṃ ārabbha pavattaṃ vipariṇāmānuparivattaṃ; tato ^a^M2.0390^ea^ samuppannā paritassanā ^b^vipariṇāmānuparivattajā paritassanā^eb^ti dassento āha – ^b^‘‘vipariṇāmassa…pe… paritassanā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Akusaladhammasamuppādā cā^eb^ti, ‘‘yaṃ ahu vata me, taṃ vata me natthī’’tiādinā pavattā akusalacittuppādadhammā. ^b^Khepetvā^eb^ti pavattituṃ appadānavasena anuppattinimittatāya khepetvā. ^b^Bhayatāsenā^eb^ti bhāyanavasenapi cittutrāsena. ^b^Taṇhātāsenā^eb^ti tassanena. ^b^Savighāto^eb^ti cittavighātanavighātena savighāto. Tato eva cetodukkhena ^b^sadukkho. Maṇikaraṇḍakasaññāyā^eb^ti rittakaraṇḍaṃyeva maṇiparipuṇṇakaraṇḍoti uppannasaññāya. ^b^Aggahetvā paritassanā^eb^ti gahetabbassa abhāvena gahaṇampi avijjamānapakkhiyamevāti aggahetvā paritassanā nāma hoti.
[03]^b^321^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammaviññāṇameva natthi^eb^ sati kammaviññāṇe rūpabhedānuparivatti siyāti kammaviññāṇābhāvadassanamukhena khīṇāsavassa sabbaso kilesābhāvaṃ dasseti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Uddesavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^323^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Gehassitavasenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0173^ea^ kilesanissitavasena anurodhavasena. ^b^Neva ukkhipeyyā^eb^ti na anuggaṇheyya. ^b^Na avakkhipeyyā^eb^ti gehassitavasena virodhavasena na niggaṇheyya. Anurodhena vinā sampahaṃsanavasena yathābhūtaguṇakathanaṃ nevussādanā vajjābhāvato; tathā virodhena vinā vivecanavasena yathābhūtadosakathanaṃ na apasādanaṃ. ^b^Sabhāvamevā^eb^ti yathābhūtasabhāvameva kassaci puggalassa anādesakaraṇavasena ^b^katheyya,^eb^ seyyathāpi āyasmā subhūtitthero. ^b^Vinicchitasukha^eb^nti, ‘‘ajjhattaṃ anavajja’’ntiādinā visesato vinicchitasukhāya hoti. ^b^Parammukhā avaṇṇa^eb^nti svāyaṃ rahovādo pesuññūpasaṃhāravasena pavatto idhādhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘pisuṇavācanti attho’’^eb^ti. Khīṇātīti ^b^khīṇo,^eb^ yo bhāsati, yañca uddissa bhāsati, dvepi hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho, taṃ khīṇavādaṃ. Svāyaṃ yasmā kilesehi ākiṇṇo saṃkiliṭṭho eva ca hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘ākiṇṇaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0391^ea^^b^saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vāca’’^eb^nti. Tena avasiṭṭhaṃ tividhampi vacīduccaritamāha. ^b^Adhiṭṭhahitvā^eb^ti, ‘‘idameva sacca’’nti ajjhosāya. ^b^Ādāyā^eb^ti paggayha. ^b^Vohareyyā^eb^ti samudācareyya. ^b^Lokasamañña^eb^nti lokasaṅketaṃ.

[03]^b^324^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ārammaṇato sampayogato kāmehi paṭisaṃhitattā ^b^kāmapaṭisandhi,^eb^ kāmasukhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāmūpasaṃhitena sukhenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sadukkho^eb^ti vipākadukkhena saṃkilesadukkhena sadukkho. ^b^Tathā sapariḷāho^eb^ti vipākapariḷāhena ceva kilesapariḷāhena ca sapariḷāho.

[03]^b^326^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vaṭṭato nissarituṃ adatvā tattheva sīdāpanato micchāpaṭipadābhāvena satte saṃyojetīti saṃyojanaṃ, visesato bhavasaṃyojanaṃ taṇhāti āha ^b^‘‘taṇhāyetaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. Na taṇhāyeva mānādayopi saṃyojanattaṃ sādhenti nāma sabbaso saṃyojanato suṭṭhu bandhanato. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ, bhikkhave, sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanāna’’nti (saṃ. ni. 2.125-126).

[03]^b^Imaṃ catukka^eb^nti, ‘‘ye kāmapaṭisandhisukhino somanassānuyogaṃ anuyuttā, ye attakilamathānuyogaṃ anuyuttā’’ti evamāgataṃ imaṃ catukkaṃ nissāya. ‘‘Etadagge ṭhapito’’ti, vatvā taṃ nissāya ṭhapitabhāvaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘bhagavato hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ussādanāapasādanā^eb^^a^V2.0174^ea^^b^paññāyanti^eb^ tathāgatena vinetabbapuggalavasena dhammadesanāya pavattetabbato. ^b^Ayaṃ puggalo…pe… ācārasampannoti vā natthi^eb^ paresaṃ anuddesakavasena dhammadesanāya pavattanato.

[03]^b^329^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Parammukhā avaṇṇa^eb^nti nindiyassa dosassa nindanaṃ. Na hi kadāci nindiyo pasaṃsiyo hoti, taṃ pana kālaṃ ñatvāva kathetabbanti āha, ^b^‘‘yuttapattakālaṃ ñatvāvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Khīṇavādepi eseva nayo^eb^ tassa rahovādena samānayogakkhamattā.
[03]^b^330^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ghātīyatī^eb^ti vadhīyati. ^b^Saddopi bhijjati^eb^ nassati, bhedo hotīti attho. ^b^Gelaññappatto^eb^ti khedaṃ parissamaṃ patto. ^b^Apalibuddha^eb^nti dosehi ananupatitaṃ.

[03]^b^331^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhinivissa^eb^^a^M2.0392^ea^^b^voharatī^eb^ti evametaṃ, na ito aññathāti taṃ janapadaniruttiṃ abhinivisitvā samudācarati. ^b^Atidhāvana^eb^nti samaññaṃ nāmetaṃ lokasaṅketasiddhā paññattīti paññattimatte aṭṭhatvā paramatthato thāmasā parāmassa voharaṇaṃ.
[03]^b^332^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aparāmasanto^eb^ti anabhinivisanto samaññāmattatova ^b^voharati^eb^.

[03]^b^333^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mariyādabhājanīya^eb^nti yathāvuttasammāpaṭipadāya micchāpaṭipadāya ca aññamaññaṃ saṅkarabhāvavibhājanaṃ. Raṇanti sattā etehi kandanti akandantāpi kandanakāraṇabhāvatoti raṇā; rāgadosamohā, dasapi vā kilesā, sabbepi vā ekantākusalā, tehi nānappakāradukkhanibbattakehi abhibhūtā sattā kandanti; saha raṇehīti ^b^saraṇo^eb^. Raṇasaddo vā rāgādireṇūsu niruḷho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sarajo sakileso’’^eb^ti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘sadukkho eso dhammo’’tiādinā āgatattā kāmasukhānuyogādayopi ‘‘saraṇo’’ti vuttāti dukkhādīnaṃ raṇabhāvo tannibbattakasabhāvānaṃ akusalānaṃ saraṇatā ca veditabbā. ^b^Araṇo^eb^tiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttavipariyāyena attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vatthuṃ sodhetī^eb^ti nirodhasamāpajjanena mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena dakkhiṇeyyavatthubhūtaṃ attānaṃ visodheti; nirodhasamāpattiyā vatthuvisodhanaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ mahākassapattherādīnaṃ dinnadakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā dīpetabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tathā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘piṇḍāya caranto’’tiādiṃ upasaṃharati. Mettābhāvanāya mudubhūtacittabahumānapubbakaṃ dentīti ^a^V2.0175^ea^, ‘‘subhūtitthero dakkhiṇaṃ visodhetī’’ti vuttaṃ. Tena dāyakatopi dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ dasseti. Vatthusodhanaṃ pana paṭibhāgato. ^b^Evaṃ pana kātuṃ sakkā^eb^ti sāvakānampi kimevaṃ lahuvuṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ sāvakesu ciṇṇavasībhāvo sambhavatīti pucchati. Itaro aggasāvakamahāsāvakesu kiṃ vattabbaṃ, pakatisāvakesupi vasippattesu labbhatīti te dassento, ^b^‘‘āma sakkā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Araṇavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^342^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aparikkhīṇāyukaṃ ^a^V2.0176^ea^^a^M2.0393^ea^ pukkusātikulaputtaṃ uddissa gamananti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘turitagamanacārika’’^eb^nti. Mama vāsupagamanena tava cittassa aphāsukaṃ aniṭṭhaṃ ^b^sace natthi. So^eb^ti pubbupagato. ^b^Dinnaṃ dinnameva vaṭṭatī^eb^ti ekavāraṃ dinnaṃ dinnameva yuttaṃ, na puna dātabbanti adhippāyo. ^b^Kataṃ katamevā^eb^ti saṅgahatthaṃ kataṃ anucchavikakammaṃ katameva, na taṃ puna viparivattetabbanti adhippāyo.

[03]Pukkusātimhi ubhayathāpi kulaputtabhāvo paripuṇṇo evāti āha – ^b^‘‘jātikulaputtopi ācārakulaputtopī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatrā^eb^ti tasmiṃ takkasīlato āgamane. ^b^Aṅke nipannadārakaṃ viya janaṃ toseti^eb^ tuṭṭhiṃ pāpeti. ^b^Ratanāni uppajjanti^eb^ pabbatasamuddādisannissitattā paccantadesassa. ^b^Dassanīya^eb^nti dassaneneva sukhāvahaṃ. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti dassanīyaṃ savanīyañca.
[03]Anagghakambale mahagghakambale. ^b^Sārakaraṇḍake^eb^ti candanasārādisāramayakaraṇḍake. ^b^Likhāpetvā^eb^ ukkirāpetvā. ^b^Lākhāya vaṭṭāpetvā^eb^ti mukhaṃ pidahitvā lākhāparikammaṃ kāretvā.

[03]^b^Anto dussabhaṇḍikaṃ atthīti aññāsi^eb^ nātigarukabhāvato. ^b^Anagghā ahesu^eb^nti vaṇṇasampattiphassasampattipamāṇamahattadunnimmāpiyatāhi mahagghā ahesuṃ, mahāpuñño rājā tassa atthevāti adhippāyo.

[03]Yadi evaṃ, ‘‘kinnu kho pesemī’’ti kasmā vīmaṃsaṃ āpajjīti āha – ^b^‘‘apica kho panā’’^eb^tiādi. Soti bimbisāro rājā. ^b^Vicinituṃ āraddho^eb^ ratanassa anekavidhattā uttaruttariñca paṇītatarādibhāvato. ^b^Suvaṇṇarajatādī^eb^ti suvaṇṇarajatapavāḷamaṇimuttāveḷuriyādi. ^b^Indriyabaddha^eb^nti cakkhādīndriyapaṭibaddhaṃ. ^b^Padesa^eb^nti guṇavasena ekadesaṃ na pāpuṇāti.

[03]Sāmaṃ saccānaṃ abhisambuddhatāsāmaññena, ^b^‘‘buddharatanampi duvidha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthi,^eb^ yasmā pana imasmiṃ loke parasmiṃ vā pana buddhena sadiso na vijjatīti. Paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ghosopī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Rājā^eb^^a^V2.0177^ea^^b^tuṭṭho cintesi,^eb^ ‘‘tattha avijjamānaṃyeva pesetuṃ laddha’’nti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā paripuṇṇaṃ ekadivasampi tasmiṃ padese buddhānaṃ āvāsapariggaho ^a^M2.0394^ea^ natthi, tasmā. ^b^Pubbadisāmukha^eb^nti pubbadisābhimukhaṃ sīhapañjaraṃ. Tenassa suvibhūtālokataṃ dasseti.

[03]Evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇassa bhagavato īdiso samudāgamoti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘evaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sampannasamudāgamassa tadanurūpā ayaṃ phalasampadāti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘tusitabhavanato’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Ariyadhammo nāma ariyamaggappadhāno, ariyamaggo ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho, te ca uddesamatteneva gahitāti āha – ^b^‘‘sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiye ekadesena likhitvā’’^eb^ti. Cūḷasīlādīni ^b^brahmajāle^eb^ (dī. ni. 1.8-9) āgatanayena veditabbāni. ^b^Chadvārasaṃvaraṃ satisampajañña^eb^nti manacchaṭṭhānaṃ dvārānaṃ saṃvaraṇavasena sattaṭṭhānikaṃ satisampajaññaṃ. Dvādasappabhedaṃ cīvarādi^b^catuppaccayasantosaṃ^eb^. Araññarukkhamūlādīnañca vibhaṅgaṃ bhāvanānukūlaṃ ^b^senāsanaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā’’tiādinā vuttaṃ ^b^nīvaraṇappahānaṃ. Parikamma^eb^nti kasiṇādiparikammaṃ. Pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena ^b^aṭṭhatiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni^eb^. Visuddhipaṭipāṭiyā ^b^yāva āsavakkhayā^eb^ imaṃ paṭipattiṃ ^b^ekadesena likhi. Soḷasavidha^eb^nti soḷasavidhabhāvanāya payogaṃ.

[03]^b^Kilañjamaye^eb^ti nānāvidhabhittivibhatte saṇhasukhumaratanaparisibbite kilañjamayasamugge. ^b^Bahi vatthena veṭhetvā^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ sukhumakambalena veṭhetvā paṭipāṭiyā tettiṃsāya samuggesu pakkhipitvā tato bahi sukhumavatthena veṭhetvā chādetvā. Tiṇagacchapahānasammajjanādinā ^b^sodhitamattakameva hotu,^eb^ kadalipuṇṇaghaṭaṭhapanadhajapaṭākussāpanādialaṅkaraṇena mā niṭṭhāpethāti attho. ^b^Rājānubhāvena paṭiyādethā^eb^ti mama rājānurūpaṃ sajjetha, alaṅkarothāti attho. ^b^Antarabhogikāna^eb^nti anuyuttarājamahāmattānaṃ. ^b^Javanadūte^eb^ti khippaṃ gacchantakadūtapurise. Tāḷehi saha avacarantīti ^b^tāḷāvacarā^eb^.

[03]Raññā paṇṇākāraṃ uddissa katapūjāsakkārassa amaccato sutattā ^b^paṇṇākāraṃ uccaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nīcāsane nisinno. Nāyaṃ aññassa ratanassa bhavissatī^eb^ti ayaṃ parihāro aññassa maṇimuttādibhedassa ratanassa na bhavissati maṇimuttādīhi abhisaṅkhatattā. ^b^Balavasomanassaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0395^ea^^b^uppajji^eb^ ciratanakālaṃ buddhasāsane bhāvitabhāvanatāya vāsitavāsanatāya ghaṭe dīpo viya abbhantare eva samujjalamānaparipakkatihetukabhāvato.

[03]^b^Dhāremī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0178^ea^ icchāmi, gaṇhāmīti attho. ^b^Dvejjhavacana^eb^nti dveḷhakabhāvo. ^b^Antaraṃ karotī^eb^ti dvinnaṃ pādānaṃ antaraṃ taṃ lekhaṃ karoti, ekena pādena atikkamīti attho. ^b^Tassā gatamaggenā^eb^ti tāya deviyā vivaṭṭamānāya nāsitāya gatamaggena. ^b^Taṃ pana lekha^eb^nti pukkusātinā katalekhaṃ. Paṇṇacchattakanti tālapattamuṭṭhiṃ.

[03]^b^Satthugāravenā^eb^ti satthari uppannapasādapemabahumānasambhavena. Tadā satthāraṃyeva manasi katvā tanninnabhāvena gacchanto, ‘‘pucchissāmī’’tipi cittaṃ na uppādesi, ‘‘ettha nu kho satthā vasatī’’ti parivitakkasseva abhāvato; rājagahaṃ pana patvā rañño pesitasāsanavasena tattha ca vihārassa bahubhāvato ^b^satthā kahaṃ vasatīti pucchi^eb^. Satthu ekakasseva nikkhamanaṃ pañcacattālīsa yojanāni padasā gamanañca dhammapūjāvasena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dhammapūjāya ca buddhānaṃ āciṇṇabhāvo heṭṭhā vitthāritoyeva. Buddhasobhaṃ pana paṭicchādetvā aññātakavesena tattha gamanaṃ tassa kulaputtassa vissatthavasena maggadarathapaṭipassambhanatthaṃ. Appaṭipassaddhamaggadaratho hi dhammadesanāya bhājanaṃ na hotīti. Tathāhi vakkhati, ‘‘nanu ca bhagavā’’tiādi.

[03]^b^Uruddha^eb^nti visālanti keci. ^b^Atirekatiyojanasata^eb^ntiādinā anvayato byatirekato ca maccheravinayane sabrahmacārīnaṃ ovādadānaṃ. ^b^Accantasukhumālo^eb^tiādinā satthu dhammagāravena saddhiṃ kulaputtassapi dhammagāravaṃ saṃsandati sametīti dasseti. Tena bhagavato katassa paccuggamanassa ṭhānagatabhāvaṃ vibhāvento aññesampi bhabbarūpānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ yathārahaṃ saṅgaho kātabboti dasseti.

[03]^b^Brahmalokappamāṇa^eb^nti uccabhāvena. ^b^Ānubhāvenā^eb^ti iddhānubhāvena yathā so sotapathaṃ na upagacchati, evaṃ vūpasametuṃ sakkoti. ^b^Avibbhanta^eb^nti vibbhamarahitaṃ nilloluppaṃ. ^b^‘‘Bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ paneta’’^eb^nti vatvā tassa vivaraṇatthaṃ, ‘‘pāsādikena iriyāpathenā’’ti vuttaṃ. Itthambhūtalakkhaṇe etaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā iriyato’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Amanāpo^eb^^a^M2.0396^ea^^b^hoti^eb^ passantānaṃ. Sīhaseyyāya nipannassapi hi ekacce sarīrāvayavā adhokhittavikkhittā viya dissanti. Kaṭiyaṃ dvinnaṃ ūrusandhīnaṃ dvinnañca jāṇusandhīnaṃ vasena ^b^catusandhikapallaṅkaṃ. Na patiṭṭhātī^eb^ti nappavattati, ‘‘kaṃsi tva’’ntiādinā apucchite kathāpavatti eva na hoti. ^b^Appatiṭṭhitāya kathāya na sañjāyatī^eb^ti tathā pana pucchāvasena kathāya appavattitāya upari dhammakathā na sañjāyati na uppajjati. ^b^Itī^eb^ti tasmā. ^b^Kathāpatiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ^eb^ kathāpavattanatthaṃ kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ vā pucchi.

[03]^b^Sabhāvameva^eb^^a^V2.0179^ea^^b^kathetī^eb^ti attano bhagavato adiṭṭhapubbattā ‘‘adiṭṭhapubbakaṃ kathamahaṃ jāneyya’’nti sabhāvameva kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayameva katheti; na pana sadevakassa lokassa supākaṭaṃ sabhāvasiddhaṃ buddharūpakāyasabhāvaṃ. Atha vā ^b^sabhāvameva kathetī^eb^ti ‘‘idameva’’nti jānantopi tadā bhagavato ruciyā tathāpavattamānaṃ rūpakāyasabhāvameva katheti appavikkhambhanti adhippāyo. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tathā hi na’’^eb^ntiādi, vipassanālakkhaṇameva paṭipadanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^343^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ akathetvā’’^eb^ti vatvā pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya akathane kāraṇaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadañca sarūpato dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘yassa hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Aparisuddhāyapi pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya vipassanā tathā na kiccakārī, pageva avijjamānāyāti, ^b^‘‘yassa hi…pe… aparisuddhā hoti’’^eb^cceva vuttaṃ. Pubbabhāgapaṭipadā ca nāma saṅkhepato pannarasa caraṇadhammāti āha – ^b^‘‘sīlasaṃvaraṃ…pe… imaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yānakiccaṃ sādheti^eb^ maggagamanena akilantabhāvasādhanattā. Cirakālaṃ paribhāvitāya paripakkagatāya hetusampadāya upaṭṭhāpitaṃ ^b^sāmaṇerasīlampi paripuṇṇaṃ^eb^ akhaṇḍādibhāvappattiyā, yaṃ pubbahetuttā ‘‘sīla’’nti vuccati.

[03]^b^Dhātuyo paramatthato vijjamānā,^eb^ paññattimattho ^b^puriso avijjamāno^eb^. Atha kasmā bhagavā arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vipassanaṃ kathento ‘‘chadhāturo’’ti avijjamānappadhānaṃ desanaṃ ārabhīti āha – ^b^‘‘bhagavā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Katthaci^eb^ ‘‘tevijjo chaḷabhiñño’’tiādīsu ^b^vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dasseti. Katthaci^eb^ – ‘‘itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī’’tiādīsu (a. ni. 1.1) ^b^avijjamānena vijjamānaṃ dasseti. Katthaci^eb^ ‘‘cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ^a^M2.0397^ea^ sotaviññāṇa’’ntiādīsu (vibha. 121) ^b^vijjamānena vijjamānaṃ dasseti. Katthaci^eb^ – ‘‘khattiyakumāro brāhmaṇakaññāya saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappetī’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.275) ^b^avijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dasseti^eb^. Idha pana vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Chadhāturo’’ti hi samāsattho avijjamāno puggalavisayattā, tassa padassa avayavattho pana appadhānattho vijjamāno, so saddakkamena appadhānopi atthakkamena padhānoti āha – ^b^‘‘vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dassento’’^eb^ti. Puggalādhiṭṭhānāyettha desanāya kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Upaṭṭhāpeyyā^eb^ti – ‘‘dhātuyo’’icceva kulaputtassa cittaṃ niveseyya tathā sañjāneyya, evaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyāti attho. ^b^Sandehaṃ kareyyā^eb^ti asati purise ko karoti? Ko paṭisaṃvedeti, dhātuyo evāti kiṃ nu kho idaṃ, kathaṃ nu kho idanti saṃsayaṃ uppādeyya? ^b^Sammohaṃ āpajjeyyā^eb^ti caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre vattamānaṃ viya desiyamāne atthe sammohaṃ āpajjeyya ^a^V2.0180^ea^. Tathābhūto ca desanāya abhājanabhūtattā ^b^desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Evamāhā^eb^ti evaṃ ‘‘chadhāturo’’ti āha.

[03]^b^Yaṃ tvaṃ purisoti sañjānāsī^eb^ti yaṃ rūpārūpadhammasamūhaṃ pabandhavasena pavattamānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavisesavisiṭṭhaṃ – ‘‘puriso satto itthī’’tiādinā tvaṃ sañjānāsi, ^b^so chadhāturo^eb^. Santesupi chadhātuvinimuttesu dhātvantaresu sukhāvaggahaṇatthaṃ tathā vuttaṃ taggahaṇeneva ca tesaṃ gahetabbato, svāyamattho heṭṭhā dassito eva. ^b^Sesapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘chaphassāyatano’’tiādipadesupi. Cattāri adhiṭṭhānāni catasso patiṭṭhā etassāti ^b^caturādhiṭṭhāno,^eb^ adhitiṭṭhati patiṭṭhahati etenāti ^b^adhiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ yesu patiṭṭhāya uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ adhigacchati, tesaṃ paññādīnaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘svāyaṃ bhikkhū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Etto^eb^ti vaṭṭato. ^b^Vivaṭṭitvā^eb^ti vinivaṭṭitvā apasakkitvā. ^b^Etto^eb^ti vā etehi chadhātuādīhi. Ettha hi niviṭṭhassa āyattassa uttamāya siddhiyā asambhavoti. ^b^Patiṭṭhita^eb^nti ariyamaggādhigamavasena suppatiṭṭhitaṃ. Evañhi sabbaso paṭipakkhasamucchindanena tattha patiṭṭhito hoti. ^b^Maññassavā nappavattantī^eb^ti chahipi dvārehi pavattamānasotāya maggena visositāya sabbaso vigatāya sabbaso vicchedappattiyā na sandanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nappavattantī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā māne ^a^M2.0398^ea^ sabbaso samucchinne asamucchinno anupasanto kileso nāma natthi, tasmā āha – ^b^‘‘muni santoti vuccatī’’^eb^ti rāgaggiādīnaṃ nibbānena ^b^nibbuto^eb^.

[03]^b^Paññaṃ nappamajjeyyā^eb^ti, ‘‘divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetī’’tiādinayappavattāya (ma. ni. 1.423; 2.24; 3.75; saṃ. ni. 4.120; a. ni. 3.15; vibha. 519; mahāni. 161) appamādappaṭipattiyā samādhivipassanāpaññaṃ nappamajjeyya. Etena pubbabhāgiyaṃ samathavipassanābhāvanamāha. ^b^Saccamanurakkheyyā^eb^ti saccānurakkhanāpadesena sīlavisodhanamāha; sacce ṭhito samādinnasīlaṃ avikopetvā paripūrento samādhisaṃvattaniyataṃ karoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vacīsaccaṃ rakkheyyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kilesapariccāgaṃ brūheyyā^eb^ti tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ pariccajanavidhiṃ vaḍḍheyya. ^b^Kilesavūpasamanaṃ sikkheyyā^eb^ti yathā te kilesā tadaṅgādivasena pariccattā yathāsamudācārappavattiyā santāne pariḷāhaṃ na janenti; evaṃ kilesānaṃ vūpasamanavidhiṃ sikkheyya ^b^paññādhiṭṭhānādīna^eb^nti lokuttarānaṃ paññādhiṭṭhānādīnaṃ. ^b^Adhigamatthāyā^eb^ti paṭilābhatthāya.
[03]^b^347^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbe^eb^^a^V2.0181^ea^^b^vuttāna^eb^nti, ‘‘caturādhiṭṭhāno, yattha ṭhitaṃ maññassavā nappavattantī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.343) evaṃ pubbe vuttānaṃ.

[03]^b^348^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vattabbaṃ bhaveyyā^eb^ti niddesavasena vattabbaṃ bhaveyya. ^b^Ādīhī^eb^ti evamādīhi. ^b^Kiccaṃ natthi^eb^ kiccābhāvato. ^b^Uppaṭipāṭidhātuka^eb^nti ayathānupubbikaṃ. ^b^Yathādhammavasenevā^eb^ti desetabbadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāveneva. ^b^Sappāyaṃ dhutaṅga^eb^nti attano kilesaniggaṇhanayoggaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ. ^b^Cittarucita^eb^nti attano cittapakatiyā ācariyehi virocetabbaṃ, cariyānukūlanti attho. ^b^Hatthipadopamasuttādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena visuddhimaggadhātuvibhaṅgādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^354^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayampetthā^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena ‘‘athāparaṃ upekkhāyeva avasissatī’’ti uparidesanaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Sopi hi pāṭiyekko anusandhīti. Nanu cāyaṃ yathāuddiṭṭhāya viññāṇadhātuyā niddesopi ^a^M2.0399^ea^ bhavissatīti yathānusandhinayo vijjatīti? Na, viññāṇadhātuniddesanayena desanāya appavattattā tenāha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhato’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yaṃ vā panā^eb^tiādinā pana desanāya sānusandhitaṃ vibhāveti. Na hi buddhā bhagavanto ananusandhikaṃ desanaṃ desenti. ^b^Āgamanīyavipassanāvasenā^eb^ti yassā pubbe pavattattā āgamanīyaṭṭhāne ṭhitā vipassanā, tassā vasena. ^b^Kammakārakaviññāṇa^eb^nti ‘‘netaṃ mama nesohamasmi, na meso attā’’ti evaṃ vipassanākiccakārakaṃ vipassanāsahitaṃ viññāṇaṃ. ^b^Viññāṇadhātuvasenā^eb^ti yathāuddiṭṭhāya viññāṇadhātuyā bhājanavasena. ^b^Satthu kathanatthāyā^eb^ti satthārā uddesameva katvā ṭhapitattā niddesavasena kathanatthāya. Akathitabhāvo eva hissa avasiṭṭhatā kathanatthāya paṭivijjhanatthāya ca. Paṭipakkhavigamena tassa cittassa parisuddhatāti āha ^b^‘‘nirupakkilesa’’^eb^nti. Upakkilesānaṃ pana pahīnabhāvato ^b^pariyodātaṃ^eb^. Samudayavasena ^b^udayadassanatthañceva^eb^ paccayanirodhavasena ^b^atthaṅgamadassanatthañca^eb^. Kāraṇabhāvena sukhāya vedanāya hitanti ^b^sukhavedaniyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sukhavedanāya paccayabhūta’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^360^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rūpakammaṭṭhāna^eb^mpi catudhātuvavatthānavasena, ^b^arūpakammaṭṭhānampi^eb^ sukhadukkhavedanāmukhena ^b^paguṇaṃ jātaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Satthu kathanatthaṃyeva avasissatī^eb^ti, ‘‘kulaputtassa paṭivijjhanattha’’nti vuttamevatthaṃ nisedheti, tasmā vuttamevatthaṃ samatthetuṃ, ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Kulaputtassa rūpāvacarajjhāne^eb^ti kulaputtena adhigatarūpāvacarajjhāne. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘bhikkhu paguṇaṃ tava idaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāna’’^eb^nti. Yaṃ kiñci suvaṇṇatāpanayogyaṃ ^a^V2.0182^ea^ aṅgārabhājanaṃ idha ‘‘ukkā’’ti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘aṅgārakapalla’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sajjeyyā^eb^ti yathā tattha pakkhittasuvaṇṇañca tappati, evaṃ paṭiyādiyeyya. ^b^Nīhaṭadosa^eb^nti vigatībhūtakāḷakaṃ. ^b^Apanītakasāva^eb^nti apagatasukhumakāḷakaṃ.

[03]Ariyamagge patiṭṭhāpetukāmena nāma sabbasmimpi lokiyadhamme virajjanatthāya dhammo kathetabboti adhippāyena, ^b^‘‘kasmā panā’’^eb^tiādinā codanā katā. Vineyyadamanakusalena bhagavatā veneyyajjhāsayavasena tāva catutthajjhānupekkhāya vaṇṇo kathitoti tassa parihāraṃ vadanto, ^b^‘‘kulaputtassā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^361^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tadanudhamma^eb^nti ^a^M2.0400^ea^ tassa arūpāvacarassa kusalassa anurūpadhammaṃ, yāya paṭipadāya tassa adhigamo hoti, tassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘rūpāvacarajjhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Taggahaṇā^eb^ti tassa gahaṇena tassā paṭipattiyā paṭipajjamānena. ^b^Ito uttari^eb^nti ‘‘viññāṇañcāyatana’’ntiādīsu.

[03]^b^362^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tassevā^eb^ti arūpāvacarajjhānassa. Etaṃ pana savipākaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ samecca sambhuyya paccayehi katattā ^b^saṅkhataṃ. Pakappita^eb^nti paccayavasena savihitaṃ. ^b^Āyūhita^eb^nti sampiṇḍitaṃ. ^b^Karontena karīyatī^eb^ti paṭipajjanakena paṭipajjīyati saṅkharīyati. Nibbānaṃ viya na niccaṃ na sassataṃ. Atha kho khaṇe khaṇe bhijjanasabhāvatāya ^b^tāvakālikaṃ^eb^. Tato eva cavanādisabhāvanti sabbametaṃ rūpāvacaradhammesu ādīnavavibhāvanaṃ. ^b^Dukkhe patiṭṭhita^eb^nti saṅkhāradukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ. ^b^Atāṇa^eb^nti cavanasabhāvāditāya tāṇarahitaṃ. ^b^Aleṇa^eb^nti tato arakkhattā līyanaṭṭhānarahitaṃ. ^b^Asaraṇa^eb^nti appaṭisaraṇaṃ. ^b^Asaraṇībhūta^eb^nti sabbakālampi appaṭisaraṇaṃ.

[03]Samattapattavise khandhādīsu gahite duttikicchā siyāti, ^b^‘‘khandhaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā gahetuṃ adatvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Evamevā^eb^ti etthāyaṃ upamāsaṃsandanā – cheko bhisakko viya sammāsambuddho. Visavikāro viya kilesadukkhānubandho, bhisakkassa visaṃ ṭhānato cāvetvā upari āropanaṃ viya bhagavato desanānubhāvena kulaputtassa kāmabhave nikantiṃ pariyādāya arūpajjhāne bhavanaṃ. Bhisakkassa visaṃ otāretvā pathaviyaṃ pātanaṃ viya kulaputtassa orambhāgiyakilesadukkhāpanayanaṃ.

[03]^b^Asampattassā^eb^ti arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ anadhigatassa. ^b^Appaṭiladdhassevā^eb^ti tassa vevacanaṃ. ^b^Sabbameta^eb^nti ^a^V2.0183^ea^ ‘‘aniccaṃ adhuva’’ntiādinā vitthārato vuttaṃ sabbametaṃ ^b^ādīnavaṃ. Ekapadeneva ‘‘saṅkhatameta’’nti kathesi^eb^ saṅkhatapadeneva tassa atthassa anavasesato pariyādinnattā.

[03]^b^Nāyūhatī^eb^ti bhavakāraṇacetanāvasena byāpāraṃ na samūheti na sampiṇḍeti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘na rāsiṃ karotī’’^eb^ti. Abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ nāma cetanābyāpāroti āha – ^b^‘‘na abhisañcetayatī’’^eb^ti. Taṃ pana phaluppādanasamatthatāya phalena kappananti āha ^b^‘‘na kappetī’’^eb^ti. Sace abhisaṅkhāracetanā uḷārā, phalamahattasaṅkhātāya vuḍḍhiyā hoti, anuḷārā ca avuḍḍhiyāti āha – ^b^‘‘vuḍḍhiyā vā parihāniyā vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Buddhavisaye ṭhatvā^eb^ti bhagavā ^a^M2.0401^ea^ attano buddhasubuddhatāya sīhasamānavuttitāya ca desanaṃ ukkaṃsato sāvakehi pattabbaṃ visesaṃ anavasesento tathā vadati, na sāvakavisayaṃ atikkamitvā attano buddhavisayameva desento. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhī’’^eb^ti. Yadi kulaputto attano…pe… paṭivijjhi, atha kasmā bhagavā desanāya arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā nāmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Ito pubbe^eb^ti ito anāgāmiphalādhigamato uttari upari. ^b^Assā^eb^ti kulaputtassa. ^b^Kathentassa^eb^ bhagavato dhamme ^b^neva kaṅkhā na vimati^eb^ paṭhamamaggeneva kaṅkhāya samucchinnattā. ^b^Ekaccesu ṭhānesū^eb^ti tathā vineyyaṭhānesu. Tathā hi ayampi kulaputto anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ sañjāni. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yato anenā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^363^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anajjhositā^eb^ti anajjhosanīyāti ayamatthoti āha – ^b^‘‘gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahetuṃ na yuttā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^364^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rāgova anusayo ^b^rāgānusayo,^eb^ so ca paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahoti vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘sukhavedanaṃ ārabbha rāgānusayo uppajjeyyā’’^eb^ti. Na pana tassa uppādanaṃ atthi khaṇattayasamāyogāsambhavato. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Itara^eb^nti adukkhamasukhavedanaṃ. ^b^Visaṃyutto^eb^ti kenaci saññojanena asaṃyuttatāya eva niyatavippayutto. Kāyassa koṭi paramo anto etassāti ^b^kāyakoṭikaṃ. Dutiyapade^eb^ti ‘‘jīvitapariyantika’’nti imasmiṃ pade. ^b^Visevanassā^eb^ti upādānassa. ^b^Sītībhavissantī^eb^ti padassa ‘‘nirujjhissantī’’ti attho vutto, kathaṃ pana vedayitānaṃ dvādasasu āyatanesu nirujjhanaṃ sītibhāvappattīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha – ^b^‘‘kilesā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Samudayapañhenā^eb^ti mahāsatipaṭṭhāne (dī. ni. 2.400; ma. ni. 1.133) samudayasaccanirodhapañhena. Nanu sabbaso kilesapariḷāhavigame sītibhāvo ^a^V2.0184^ea^ nāma vedanānirodhamattena adhippeto; tena idha vedayitāni vuttāni, na kilesāti vedayitānaṃ accantanirodhasaṅkhāto sītibhāvopi kilesasamucchedenevāti āha ^b^‘‘vedayitānipī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^365^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0402^ea^^b^opammasaṃsandana^eb^nti ettha saññojanā dīpasikhā viya, adhiṭṭhānakapallikā viya vedanāya nissayabhūtā cattāro khandhā, telaṃ viya kilesā, vaṭṭi viya kammavaṭṭaṃ, upaharaṇakapuriso viya vaṭṭagāmī puthujjano, tassa sīsacchedakapuriso viya arahattamaggo santānassa samucchedakaraṇato, anāhārāya dīpasikhāya nibbāyanaṃ viya kammakilesānaṃ anantarapaccayato anāhārāya vedanāya anupādisesavasena nibbāyanaṃ.

[03]^b^Ādimhi samādhivipassanāpaññāhī^eb^ti pubbabhāgapaṭipadābhūtā tayā paguṇasamādhito arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtavipassanāpaññāto ca. ^b^Uttaritarā^eb^ti visiṭṭhatarā. ^b^Evaṃ samannāgato^eb^ti ettha ^b^evaṃ^eb^-saddo idaṃsaddatthavacanoti āha – ^b^‘‘iminā uttamena arahattaphalapaññādhiṭṭhānenā’’^eb^ti. Sabbaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ khepetīti ^b^sabbadukkhakkhayo,^eb^ aggamaggo, taṃpariyāpannatāya tattha ñāṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘sabbadukkhakkhaye ñāṇaṃ nāma arahattamagge ñāṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Arahattaphale ñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ^eb^ vuttanayena sabbadukkhakkhaye sante tannimittaṃ vā uppannañāṇanti katvā. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti, ‘‘evaṃ samannāgato bhikkhu iminā paramena paññādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato hotī’’ti vuttabhikkhuno.

[03]^b^366^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Hī^eb^ti yasmā. ^b^Vimuttī^eb^ti arahattaphalavimutti, tasmā sabbadukkhakkhaye ñāṇanti arahattaphalañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^Saccanti paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ,^eb^ na maggasaccaṃ. Kāmaṃ arahattaphalavimutti paṭipakkhehi akopanīyatāya akuppā, ‘‘sacce ṭhitā’’ti pana vacanato, ^b^‘‘akuppārammaṇakaraṇena akuppāti vuttā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Vitatha^eb^nti naṭṭhaṃ, jarāya maraṇena ca vipariṇāmetabbatāya yādisaṃ uppādāvatthāya jātaṃ, tato aññādisanti attho. Tathā hi taṃ jarāmaraṇehi parimusitabbarūpatāya ‘‘musā’’ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘mosadhammanti nassanasabhāva’’^eb^nti. ^b^Taṃ avitatha^eb^nti taṃ vuttanayena avitathaṃ nāma, ^b^taṃ sabhāvo^eb^ sabbakālaṃ teneva labbhanato. ^b^Samathavipassanāvasena vacīsaccato^eb^ti samathavipassanāvasena yaṃ visuddhimattaṃ vacīsaccaṃ, tato. ^b^Dukkhasaccasamudayasaccehi^eb^ tacchavipallāsabhūtasabhāvehi. Iti nesaṃ yathāsakaṃ sabhāvena avitathabhāve amosadhammatāya tehipi avitathabhāvā paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānameva ^b^uttaritaraṃ. Tasmā^eb^ti nibbānasseva uttaritarabhāvato.

[03]^b^367^eb^^b^.^eb^ Upadhīyati ^a^V2.0185^ea^^a^M2.0403^ea^ ettha dukkhanti ^b^upadhī,^eb^ khandhā kāmaguṇā ca. Upadahanti dukkhanti ^b^upadhī,^eb^ kilesābhisaṅkhārā. ^b^Paripūrā gahitā parāmaṭṭhā^eb^ti pariyattabhāvena taṇhāya gahitā diṭṭhiyā parāmaṭṭhā. ^b^Samathavipassanāvasena kilesapariccāgato^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena tadaṅgappahānavasena ca kilesānaṃ pariccajanato. ^b^Uttaritaro^eb^ visiṭṭhatarassa pahānappakārassa abhāvato.

[03]^b^368^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Āghātakaraṇavasenā^eb^ti cetasikāghātassa uppajjanavasena. ^b^Byāpajjanavasenā^eb^ti cittassa vipattibhāvavasena. ^b^Sampadussanavasenā^eb^ti sabbaso dussanavasena. ^b^Tīhi^eb^ padehi yadi arahattamaggena kilesānaṃ pariccāgo cāgādhiṭṭhānaṃ, arahattamaggeneva nesaṃ vūpasamo upasamādhiṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti. Ettha visesena pariccāgo sampajahanaṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ cāgo, tathā pana pariccāgena yo so nesaṃ tadā vūpasantatāya abhāvo, ayaṃ upasamoti ayametesaṃ viseso.

[03]^b^369^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Maññita^eb^nti maññanā, ‘‘etaṃ mamā’’tiādinā kappanāti attho. Avijjāvibandhanataṇhāgāhādīnaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvato ^b^ayamaha^eb^nti ettha ^b^aha^eb^nti diṭṭhimaññanādassanaṃ, sā pana diṭṭhi mānamaññanāya attaniyagāhavasena hotīti sveva ‘‘aya’’nti iminā gahitoti āha – ^b^‘‘ayamahanti ekaṃ taṇhāmaññitameva vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ābādhaṭṭhenā^eb^ti paṭipīḷanaṭṭhena. Maññanāvasena hi sattānaṃ tathā hoti. ^b^Antodosaṭṭhenā^eb^ti abbhantaraduṭṭhabhāvena. Maññanādūsitattā hi sattānaṃ attabhāvo dukkhatāmūlāyatto, kilesāsucipaggharaṇato uppādanirodhabhaṅgehi uddhamuddhaṃ pakkapabhinno hotīti phalūpacārena ‘‘maññitaṃ gaṇḍo’’ti vutto. ^b^Anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhenā^eb^ti anupavisitvā hadayamāhacca adhiṭṭhānena. Maññitañhi pīḷājananato antotudanato duruddharaṇato sallaṃ. ^b^Khīṇāsavamuni^eb^ sabbaso kilesānaṃ santattā, tato eva pariḷāhānaṃ parinibbutattā vūpasantattā ^b^santo^eb^ upasanto ^b^nibbutoti vuccati. Yattha ṭhita^eb^nti yasmiṃ asekkhabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Yadi bhagavā attano desanāñāṇānurūpaṃ desanaṃ pavattāpeyya, mahāpathaviṃ pattharantassa viya, ākāsaṃ pasārentassa viya, anantāparimeyyalokadhātuyo paṭicca tesaṃ ṭhitākāraṃ ^a^M2.0404^ea^ anuppūraṃ vicinantassa viya desanā pariyosānaṃ na gaccheyya. Yasmā panassa vineyyajjhāsayānurūpameva desanā pavatti, na tato paraṃ aṇumattampi vaḍḍhati. Tasmā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘sabbāpi dhammadesanā saṃkhittāva, vitthāradesanā nāma natthī’’^eb^ti. Nanu sattapakaraṇadesanā vitthārakathāti? Na sāpi vitthārakathāti āha – ^b^‘‘samantapaṭṭhānakathāpi saṃkhittāyevā’’^eb^ti. Sannipatitadevaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpameva hi tassāpi pavatti, na satthudesanāñāṇānurūpanti. ^b^Yathānusandhiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0186^ea^^b^pāpesi^eb^ yathāuddiṭṭhe anupubbena anavasesato vibhajanavasena desanāya niṭṭhāpitattā. ^b^Vipañcitaññū…pe… kathesi^eb^ nātisaṅkhepavitthāravasena desitattā.

[03]^b^370^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aṭṭhannaṃ parikkhārāna^eb^nti nayidamanavasesapariyādānaṃ, lakkhaṇavacanaṃ panetaṃ, aññatarassāti vacanaseso. Tathā hi, ‘‘mayhaṃ iddhimayaparikkhāralābhāya paccayo hotū’’ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā pattacīvaraṃ, pattaṃ, cīvarameva vā dinne carimabhave iddhimayaparikkhāro nibbattatīti vadanti. ^b^Adinnattā^eb^ti kecivādo, tenāha ^b^‘‘kulaputto’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Okāsābhāvato^eb^ti upasampadālakkhaṇassa asambhavato. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘kulaputtassa āyuparikkhīṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Udakatittha…pe… āraddho^eb^ paramappicchabhāvato.
[03]^b^Vibbhantā^eb^ti bhantacittā. ^b^Siṅgena vijjhitvā ghātesi^eb^ purimajātibaddhāghātatāyāti vadanti.
[03]^b^Mānusaṃ yoga^eb^nti manussattabhāvaṃ. Attabhāvo hi yujjati kammakilesehīti ‘‘yogo’’ti vuccati. ^b^Upaccagu^eb^nti upagacchiṃsu. ^b^Upako^eb^tiādi tesaṃ nāmāni.
[03]^b^Gandhakaṭṭhehī^eb^ti candanāgarusaḷaladevadāruādīhi gandhadārūhi. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Dhātuvibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^371^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ācikkhanā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0405^ea^^a^V2.0187^ea^ – ‘‘idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasacca’’nti ādito kathanaṃ. ^b^Desanā^eb^ti tasseva atthassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ. ^b^Paññāpanā^eb^ti pakārehi ñāpanā, sā pana yasmā itthamidanti veneyyānaṃ paccakkhato dassanā, tesaṃ vā santāne patiṭṭhāpanā hoti, tasmā āha – ^b^‘‘dukkhasaccādīnaṃ ṭhapanā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭṭhapanā^eb^ti patiṭṭhāpanā. Yasmā paṭṭhapiyamānasabhāvā desanā bhājanaṃ upagacchantī viya hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ – ‘‘paññāpanā’’ti, jānāpanāti attho. ^b^Vivaṭakaraṇā^eb^ti desiyamānassa atthassa vivaṭabhāvakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Vibhāgakiriyā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa atthavibhāgassa vitthārakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Pākaṭabhāvakaraṇa^eb^nti agambhīrabhāvāpādanaṃ. Aparo nayo – catusaccasaññitassa atthassa paccekaṃ sarūpato dassanavasena idanti ādito sikkhāpanaṃ kathanaṃ ^b^ācikkhanā,^eb^ evaṃ parasantāne pabodhanavasena pavattāpanā ^b^desanā,^eb^ evaṃ vineyyānaṃ cittaparitosajananena tesaṃ buddhiparipācanaṃ ^b^‘‘paññāpanā’’^eb^ti vuccati. Evaṃ paññāpentī ca sā desiyamānaṃ atthaṃ veneyyasantāne pakārato ṭhapeti patiṭṭhapetīti ^b^‘‘paṭṭhapanā’’^eb^ti vuccati. Pakārato ṭhapentī pana saṃkhittassa vitthārato paṭivuttassa punābhidhānato ^b^‘‘vivaraṇā’’^eb^ti, tassevatthassa vibhāgakaraṇato ^b^‘‘vibhajanā’’^eb^ti, vuttassa vitthārenābhidhānato vibhattassa hetudāharaṇadassanato, ^b^‘‘uttānīkamma’’^eb^nti vuccati. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pākaṭabhāvakaraṇa’’^eb^nti, hetūpamāvasenatthassa pākaṭabhāvakaraṇatoti attho.

[03]^b^Anuggāhakā^eb^ti anuggaṇhanakāmā. Svāyamanuggaho saṅgahavatthuvasena pākaṭo hotīti āha ^b^‘‘āmisasaṅgahenā’’^eb^tiādi. Janetā janettīti āha ^b^‘‘janikā mātā’’^eb^ti. Vuddhiṃ parisaṃ āpādetīti ^b^āpādetā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘posetā’’^eb^ti. Idāni dvinnaṃ mahātherānaṃ yathākkamaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ bhagavatā vuttehi janikaposikamātuṭṭhāniyehi saṅgāhakataṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘janikamātā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Paratoghosena vināpi uparimaggādhigamo hotīti ^b^‘‘paccattapurisakārenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Paṭhamamaggo eva hi sāvakānaṃ ekantato ghosāpekkhoti. ^b^Pattesupī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddena pageva appattesūti dasseti. Bhavassa ^a^M2.0406^ea^ appamattakatā nāma ittarakālatāyāti āha ^b^‘‘accharāsaṅghātamattampī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Janetā^eb^ti janako, thero pana ariyāya janayitā. ^b^Āpādetā^eb^ti vaḍḍhetā paribrūhetā. Purimasmiṃ saccadvaye sammasanaggahaṇaṃ lokiyattā tassa, itarasmiṃ tassa aggahaṇaṃ lokuttarattā.

[03]Kāmehi ^a^V2.0188^ea^ nikkhanto saṅkappo ^b^nekkhammasaṅkappo^eb^. Svāyamassa tato nikkhamanattho tesaṃ paṭipakkhabhāvato tehi visaṃsaggato virajjanato samucchindanato sabbaso vivittabhāvato ca hotīti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhenā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^kāmapadaghāta^eb^nti yathā kāmo padaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ na labhati, evaṃ hananaṃ, kāmasamucchedanti attho. Kāmehi sabbaso vivittattā kāmavivitto, ariyamaggo, tassa anto, ariyaphalaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^kāmavivittante. Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā ‘‘byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhenā’’tiādiyojanaṃ atidisati. Sabbe cete nekkhammasaṅkappādayo nānācittesu labbhantīti yojanā. Yadi ekacitte labbhanti, kathaṃ tividhamicchāsaṅkappānaṃ samugghātoti āha ^b^‘‘tatra hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Na nānā labbhatī^eb^ti iminā tividhakiccakāritaṃ sammāsaṅkappassa dasseti. Kiccavasena hi tassa nāmassa lābho. Sammāvācādīnampi maggakkhaṇe ekacitte labbhamānānampi catukiccakāritāya catubbidhanāmāditā veditabbā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Saccavibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā samattā.

[03]^b^376^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahāpajāpatigotamī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0189^ea^ ettha ^b^gotamī^eb^ti tassa gotamagottato āgataṃ nāmaṃ, mahāpajāpati pana guṇato. Taṃ vivarituṃ, ^b^‘‘nāmakaraṇadivase panassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Mahatiṃ uḷāraṃ pajaṃ jananaposanehi parirakkhatīti ^b^mahāpajāpati^eb^. Paribhogavasena na haññatīti ^b^ahataṃ. Sippikāna^eb^nti tantavāyānaṃ. ^b^Vāyanaṭṭhāna^eb^nti vīnaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Tāni maṃ na tosenti^eb^ kāyikassa puññassa abhāvato. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘sahatthā katameva^eb^^a^M2.0407^ea^^b^maṃ tosetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pisitvā^eb^ nibbattanaṃ katvā. ^b^Pothetvā^eb^ti sukhumabhāvāpādanatthaṃ dhanukena netvā. ^b^Kālānukālañca dhātigaṇaparivutā gantvā vemakoṭiṃ aggahesi^eb^ ekadivasanti adhippāyo. Evañhi ‘‘ekadivasaṃ pana…pe… akāsī’’ti purimavacanena taṃ na virujjheyya.

[03]^b^Cha cetanā^eb^ti chabbidhā cetanā. Na hi tā chayeva cetanāti. ^b^Saṅghe gotami dehi…pe… saṅgho cā^eb^ti idameva suttapadaṃ. ^b^Saṅghe gotami dehī^eb^ti saṅghassa dānāya niyojesi, tasmā saṅghova dakkhiṇeyyataroti ayamevettha attho. ^b^Yadi eva^eb^ntiādinā tattha byabhicāraṃ dasseti. ^b^Rājamahāmattādayo^eb^tiādinā tattha byatirekato nidassanaṃ āha. ^b^Mahantatarā bhaveyyu^eb^nti ānubhāvādinā mahantatarā bhaveyyuṃ, na ca taṃ atthīti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā guṇavisiṭṭhahetukaṃ dakkhiṇeyyataṃ anapekkhitvā attano dīyamānassa dāpanaṃ labhati, tasmā. ^b^Mā evaṃ gaṇhā^eb^ti sammāsambuddhato saṅghova dakkhiṇeyyo’’ti mā gaṇha.

[03]Tattha nicchayasādhakaṃ suttapadaṃ dassento, ^b^‘‘nayimasmiṃ loke…pe… vipulaphalesina’’^eb^nti āha. Svāyamattho ratanasutte (khu. pā. 6.3; su. ni. 226), ‘‘yaṃ kiñci vitta’’nti gāthāya, aggapasādasuttādīhi (itivu. 90) ca vibhāvetabboti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘satthārā uttaritaro dakkhiṇeyyo nāma natthī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Gotamiyā antimabhavikatāya dānassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya anuppādanato na taṃ garutaraṃ saṅghassa pādāpane kāraṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘pacchimāya janatāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Vacanatopī^eb^ti tassa vatthayugassa satthu eva paṭiggahaṇāya vacanatopi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Satthā^eb^^a^V2.0190^ea^^b^saṅghapariyāpannova^eb^ īdise ṭhāne aggaphalaṭṭhatāya aṭṭha-ariyapuggalabhāvato, sace panassa na sayaṃ saṅghapariyāpannatā, kathaṃ saṅghe pūjite satthā pūjito nāma siyāti adhippāyo. ^b^Tīṇi^eb^ saraṇagamanāni tayo eva aggapasādāti vakkhatīti adhippāyo. Abhidheyyānurūpāni hi liṅgavacanāni. ^b^Na ruhati^eb^ ayāthāvapaṭipattibhāvato, na gihivesaggahaṇādinā gihibhāvassa paṭikkhipitattā. ^b^Na vattabbametaṃ ‘‘satthā saṅghapariyāpanno’’^eb^ti satthubhāvato. Sāvakasamūho hi saṅgho ^a^M2.0408^ea^. Saṅghagaṇe hi satthā uttaritaro anaññasādhāraṇaguṇehi samannāgatabhāvato mūlaratanabhāvato ca.
[03]^b^377^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sampatijātassa mahāsattassa sattapadavītihāragamanaṃ dhammatāvasena jātaṃ, paraṃ tadaññadaharasadisī paṭipattīti āha – ^b^‘‘hatthapādakiccaṃ asādhentesū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^378^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccūpakāraṃ na sukaraṃ vadāmi^eb^ anucchavikakiriyāya kātuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Abhivādenti etenāti ^b^abhivādanaṃ^eb^. Vandamānehi antevāsikehi ācariyaṃ ‘‘sukhī hotū’’tiādinā abhivādenti nāma. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘abhivādana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tadabhimukho…pe… vanditvā nipajjati,^eb^ seyyathāpi āyasmā sāriputto. Kālānukālaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ bījayanapādasambāhanādi ^b^anucchavikakammassa karaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma. ^b^Anucchavikaṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotiyeva,^eb^ yasmā ācariyena katassa dhammānuggahassa antevāsinā kariyamāno āmisānuggaho saṅkhampi kalampi kalabhāgampi na upetiyevāti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na suppatikāraṃ vadāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^379^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāṭipuggalikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ ārabbha samuṭṭhitaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘taṃ me bhagavā paṭiggaṇhatū’’ti mahāpajāpatigotamiyā vacanaṃ nimittaṃ katvā desanāya uṭṭhitattā. Na kevalañca tassā eva vacanaṃ, atha kho ^b^ānandattheropi…pe… samādapesi,^eb^ tasmā vibhāgato ^b^cuddasasu…pe… hotīti dassetuṃ, imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi^eb^. Tattha patipaccekaṃ puggalaṃ dīyatīti ^b^pāṭipuggalikaṃ^eb^. Paṭhamasaddo yathā aggattho, evaṃ seṭṭhapariyāyopīti āha ^b^‘‘jeṭṭhakavasenapī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aggā^eb^ uttame khette pavattattā. ^b^Dutiyatatiyāpi paramadakkhiṇāyeva^eb^ sabbaso sammāvikkhambhitarāgādikilesattā. Rāgādayo hi adakkhiṇeyyabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ. Tenevāha – ‘‘tiṇadosāni khettāni, rāgadosā ayaṃ pajā’’tiādi (dha. pa. 356). Yasmā pana savāsanaṃ sabbaso samucchinnakilesehi tato eva sabbaso appaṭihatañāṇacārehi anantāparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhārehi sammāsambuddhehi sadiso sadevake loke koci dakkhiṇeyyo natthi. Tasmā ^b^‘‘paramadakkhiṇāyevā’’^eb^ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati. Yasmā pañcābhiñño aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī eva ^a^M2.0409^ea^ hoti lokiyābhiññānaṃ aṭṭhasamāpattiadhiṭṭhānattā, tasmā ^b^‘‘lokiyapañcābhiññe’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ, na ‘‘aṭṭhasamāpattilābhimhī’’ti tāya avuttasiddhattā. ^b^Gosīladhātuko^eb^ti ^a^V2.0191^ea^ gosīlasabhāvo, sīlavatā sadisasīloti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asaṭho’’^eb^tiādi. Tena na alajjidhātuko pakatisiddho idha puthujjanasīlavāti adhippetoti dasseti.

[03]^b^Paricchindanto^eb^ti ettakoti paccekappamāṇato tato eva aññamaññaṃ asaṅkaratova paricchindanto. Kathaṃ pana asaṅkhyeyyabhāvena vuccamāno vipāko paricchinno hoti? Sopi tassa paricchedo eva itarehi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvadīpanato, etadatthameva pubbe asaṅkaraggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. ^b^Guṇavasenā^eb^ti lakkhaṇasampannādiguṇavasena. ^b^Upakāravasenā^eb^ti bhogarakkhādiupakāravasena. ^b^Yaṃ posanatthaṃ dinnaṃ, idaṃ na gahitaṃ^eb^ dānalakkhaṇāyogato. Anuggahapūjanicchāvasena hi attano deyyavatthupariccāgo dānaṃ bhayarāgaladdhukāmakulādivasena sāvajjābhāvato. ^b^Tampi na gahitaṃ^eb^ ayāvadatthatāaparipuṇṇabhāvena yathādhippetaphaladānāsamatthabhāvato. ^b^Sampattassā^eb^ti santikāgatassa. Tena sampattipayojane anapekkhataṃ dasseti. ^b^Phalaṃ paṭikaṅkhitvā^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ me dānamayaṃ puññaṃ āyatiṃ sukhahitabhāvāya hotū’’tiādinā phalaṃ paccāsīsitvā. Tenassa phaladāne namiyataṃ dasseti, ^b^yāvadattha^eb^nti iminā paripuṇṇaphalataṃ. ^b^Sataguṇā^eb^ti ettha ^b^guṇa^eb^saddo na ‘‘guṇena nāmaṃ uddhareyya’’ntiādīsu (dha. sa. aṭṭha. 1313; udā. aṭṭha. 53; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 1.1.76; netti. aṭṭha. 4.38) viya sampattiattho, ‘‘taddiguṇa’’ntiādīsu viya na vaḍḍhanattho, ‘‘pañca kāmaguṇā loke, manochaṭṭhā paveditā’’tiādīsu (su. ni. 173) viya na koṭṭhāsattho, ‘‘antaṃ antaguṇa’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.377; ma. ni. 1.110; khu. pā. 3) viya na antabhāgattho, atha kho ānisaṃsatthoti dassento, ^b^‘‘satānisaṃsā’’^eb^ti āha, te ānisaṃse sarūpato dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘āyusata’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Sataguṇā^eb^ti vā satavaḍḍhikāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Nipparitasaṃ karotī^eb^ti āyuādīnaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ aparittāsaṃ karoti. Atha vā ^b^nipparitasaṃ karotī^eb^ti āyuādinimittaṃ aparittāsaṃ karoti. Atha vā ^b^nipparitasaṃ karotī^eb^ti āyuādīni tato ^a^M2.0410^ea^ uttarimpi āhārādihetu aparittāsaṃ karoti. Attabhāvavinimuttasañcaraṇassa abhāvā, ^b^‘‘bhavasatepi vutte ayamevattho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti, ‘‘puthujjanadussīle’’tiādīsu sabbavāresu. ^b^Nayo netabbo^eb^ti, ‘‘āyusahassaṃ vaṇṇasahassa’’ntiādiko nayo.

[03]Sāsanāvataraṇaṃ nāma yāvadeva vaṭṭadukkhanittharaṇatthaṃ, tañca maggapaṭivedhanaṃ, tasmā nibbedhabhāgiyasaraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāpadasamādānaṃ pabbajjā upasampadā sīlaparipūraṇaṃ adhicittasikkhānuyogo vipassanābhāvanāti sabbāpesā sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipatti eva hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘tisaraṇaṃ gato upāsakopī’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha yathā nibbedhabhāgiyo samādhi tāva nāma paramparāya ariyamaggādhigamassa paccayabhāvato upanissayo; tathā nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ ^a^V2.0192^ea^ sīlaparipūraṇaṃ upasampadā pabbajjā upāsakassa dasasu pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhānaṃ antamaso saraṇādigamanampi nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ ariyamaggādhigamassa upanissayo hotiyevāti, ‘‘sabbāpesā sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipattī’’ti vuttā. Tattha anaññasādhāraṇa-vijjācaraṇādi-asaṅkhyeyyāparimeyya-guṇa-samudayapūrite bhagavati saddhamme ariyasaṅghe uḷāratarabahumānagāravataṃ gato. ‘‘Sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’’ti tapparāyaṇatādiākārappatto ñāṇaparisodhito pasādo saraṇagamananti tena vatthugatena pasādena paribhāvite santāne kataṃ puññakkhettasampattiyā mahapphalaṃ mahānisaṃsameva hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘tasmiṃ dinnadānampi asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyya’’^eb^nti. Tayidaṃ saraṇaṃ vatthuttaye pasādabhāvena ajjhāsayasampattimattaṃ, tādisassa pana pañcasīlaṃ ajjhāsayasampattiupathambhito kāyavacīsaṃyamoti tattha dinnaṃ tato uttari mahapphalanti, dasasīlaṃ pana paripuṇṇuposathasīlaṃ, tattha dinnaṃ mahapphalanti, ^b^‘‘tato uttari mahapphala’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Sāmaṇerasīlādīnaṃ pana uttari visiṭṭhatarādibhāvato tattha tattha dinnassa visesamahapphalatā vuttā.

[03]Maggasamaṅgitā nāma maggacittakkhaṇaparicchinnā, tasmiñca khaṇe kathaṃ dātuṃ paṭiggahetuñca sambhavatīti codeti ^b^‘‘kiṃ pana maggasamaṅgissa sakkā dānaṃ dātu’’^eb^nti. Itaro tādise sati samayeti dassento, ^b^‘‘āma sakkā’’^eb^ti paṭijānitvā, ^b^‘‘āraddhavipassako’’^eb^tiādinā tamatthaṃ vivarati. ^b^Tasmiṃ khaṇe^eb^ti tasmiṃ pakkhipanakkhaṇe. Yadi aṭṭhamakassa sotāpannassa dinnadānaṃ ^a^M2.0411^ea^ phalato asaṅkhyeyyameva, ko nesaṃ visesoti āha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. Tena satipi asaṅkhyeyyabhāvasāmaññe atthi nesaṃ appabahubhāvo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī asaṅkhyeyyamahākappāsaṅkhyeyyānaṃ viyāti dasseti. Maggasamaṅgīnaṃ tena tena odhinā saṃkilesadhammānaṃ pahīyamānattā vodānadhammānaṃ vaḍḍhamānattā apariyositakiccattā aparipuṇṇaguṇatā, pariyositakiccattā phalasamaṅgīnaṃ paripuṇṇaguṇatāti taṃtaṃmaggaṭṭhehi phalaṭṭhānaṃ khettātisayatā veditabbā. Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimehi pana maggaṭṭhehi uparimānaṃ maggaṭṭhānaṃ phalaṭṭhehi phalaṭṭhānaṃ uttaritaratā pākaṭā eva. Tathā hi uparimānaṃ dinnadānassa mahapphalatā vuttā.

[03]^b^380^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmañcettha buddhappamukhe ubhatosaṅghe kevale ca bhikkhusaṅghe dānaṃ atthi eva, na pana buddhappamukhe bhikkhusaṅghe, taṃ pana buddhappamukhaubhatosaṅgheneva saṅgahitanti aviruddhaṃ. ^b^Na pāpuṇanti^eb^ mahapphalabhāvena sadisatampi, kuto adhikataṃ.

[03]‘‘Tathāgate parinibbute ubhatosaṅghassa’’ icceva vuttattā – ^b^‘‘kiṃ panā’’^eb^tiādinā codeti ^a^V2.0193^ea^. Itaro parinibbute tathāgate taṃ uddissa gandhapupphādipariccāgo viya cīvarādipariccāgopi mahapphalo hotiyevāti katvā paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘ubhatosaṅghassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ‘‘Ettakāyeva, bhikkhū uddisathā’’ti evaṃ paricchedassa akaraṇena upacārasīmāpariyāpannānaṃ khettapariyāpannānaṃ vasena ^b^aparicchinnakamahābhikkhusaṅghe^eb^.

[03]^b^Gottaṃ^eb^ vuccati sādhāraṇanāmaṃ, ^b^matta^eb^saddo luttaniddiṭṭho, tasmā samaṇāti gottamattaṃ anubhavanti dhārentīti ^b^gotrabhuno^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nāmamattasamaṇā’’^eb^ti. Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato samaṇagaṇo ^b^saṅgho,^eb^ tasmā saṅgho dussīlo nāma natthi. ^b^Guṇasaṅkhāyā^eb^ti ānisaṃsagaṇanāya, mahapphalatāyāti attho. ^b^Kāsāva…pe… asaṅkhyeyyāti^eb^ vuttā saṅghaṃ uddissa dinnattā. Yathā pana saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ hoti, taṃ vidhiṃ dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^cittīkāra^eb^nti gāravaṃ.

[03]^b^Saṅghato^eb^ na puggalato. ^b^Aññathattaṃ āpajjatī^eb^ti ‘‘imassa mayā dinnaṃ saṅghassa dinnaṃ hotī’’ti evaṃ cittaṃ anuppādetvā, ‘‘saṅghassa dassāmī’’ti deyyadhammaṃ ^a^M2.0412^ea^ paṭiyādetvā sāmaṇerassa nāma dātabbaṃ jātanti aññathattaṃ āpajjati; tasmā tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na hotiyeva puggalavasena cittassa pariṇāmitattā. ^b^Nibbematiko hutvā^eb^ti ‘‘kiṃ nu kho mayā imassa dinnaṃ hoti vā na vā’’ti vimatiṃ anuppādetvā, ‘‘yo panā’’tiādinā vuttākārena karoti.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^tiādinā vuttassevatthassa pākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ vatthuṃ nidasseti, ^b^‘‘parasamuddavāsino’’^eb^tiādinā. ^b^Opuñjāpetvā^eb^ paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā, haritagomayena upalimpitvāti attho. ^b^Kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghassā^eb^ti kāsāvakaṇṭhasamūhassa. ^b^Ko sodhetī^eb^ti mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena ko visodheti. Mahapphalabhāvāpattiyā hi dakkhiṇā visujjhati nāma. Tattha yesaṃ hatthe dinnaṃ, tesaṃ vasena paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāya visuddhattā, – ‘‘tadāpāhaṃ, ānanda, saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyaṃ vadāmī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.380) ca vuttaṃ, tasmā kammavaseneva dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ pucchati. Itaro ariyasaṅghe dinnadakkhiṇāya nibbisiṭṭhaṃ katvā vuttattā matthakappattasseva ariyasaṅghassa vasena dakkhiṇāvisuddhiṃ dassento, ^b^‘‘sāriputta…pe… sodhentī’’^eb^ti vatvā puna, ‘‘ye keci arahanto sodhentī’’ti dassento, ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Therā ciraparinibbutā^eb^ti idaṃ ajjatanānampi ariyānaṃ sāvakataṃ dassentena maggasodhanavasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na uddissa puññakaraṇe sati akaraṇappattiyā.
